author: Playsaurus
title: Take some load off your fingers with this brand new special edition Zombie Auto-Clicker.

name: Clicker Heroes: Boxy & Bloop Auto Clicker
author: Playsaurus
title: Take some load off your fingers with this brand new special edition Boxy & Bloop Auto Clicker. You will receive 1 Auto Clicker and the special Boxy & Bloop skin. Get it Now! You can assign the Auto Clicker to do the following: - Automatically click on monsters 10 times a second. - Continuously level up a hero.

name: Brawlhalla - Collectors Pack
author: Blue Mammoth Games
title: The Brawlhalla Collectors pack includes 3500 Mammoth Coins | The All Legends Pack | Collectors "Asgardian Elite" Weapon Skins (for all current and future weapons) | Collectors "Champion of the Brawl" Bodvar Skin | Collectors "Flames of Ragnarok" KO special effect | Collectors Edition Nameplate | Steampunk Sid

name: Box Maze - Unlock All Levels
author: GamersHype Productions
title: Unlocks all current and future levels in Box Maze. (Playing the game will unlock each level as you complete it, this DLC does not unlock additional content, it allows the player to choose levels without needing to unlock them first)

name: Fate/EXTELLA - Deep Crimson Dress
author: Marvelous Inc.
title: Deep Crimson Dress

name: Fate/EXTELLA - Flower Co-ordinator
author: Marvelous Inc.
title: Flower Co-ordinator

name: Ship It - Official Soundtrack
author: Think On Labs
title: The addictive and heart pounding official soundtrack for Ship It contains 5 unique songs composed by Bryan Minus.

name: Tails - Free Demo
author: Dreamcave Studio
title: Master the evergrowing dragon in virtual reality. Tails is a roomscale VR game for the HTC Vive. Collect lanterns in order to grow the tail of your dragon. The game is easy to pick up but hard to master, and ensures a fun challenge for the whole family. This is the demo version!

name: Final Quest
author: RPG Video
title: A time of change is coming. One small boy, the last of a long line of Gem Warriors, will soon discover the true power of his heritage. In so doing, he will embark upon a Final quest to free the people and to find his long lost father.

name: Tank Defense Division
author: Caleb Hooper
title: Tank Defense Division is an arcade-like strategy game. In which players battle foreign tanks to test their own mettle. The game coming with both a single player campaign and coop. Along with a diverse selection of Levels, Enemies, and Game modes to Explore, Battle, Build upon, and Share.

name: Volleying
author: Gestalt Development Studio
title: Tired of sports games in which the computer doesn’t respect your commands? As a physics-based game, Volleying gives the players more control over their moves, as well as delivers unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

name: Glass Masquerade
author: Onyx Lute
title: Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to unveil clocks and themes exhibited by various cultures of the world at the 'International Times Exhibition' - an interactive electronic show.

name: Beachhead 2002
author: Digital Fusion Inc.
title: BEACHHEAD 2002 follows on the success of BEACHHEAD 2000 with ease of use and hard-core, non-stop 3D shooting action in a photorealistic and accurate environment. Players will be assigned to an inland defense perimeter, protecting a command post to repel an expected airborne assault.

name: Business tour. Football: Coach
author: Creobit
title: You can sculpt everything with the soft clay... So the coach creates the player. And the best coach creates the best player! He offers a chance for you to become his clay and to sculpt the winner of Business Tour! You will stand on top, execute your signature move and remove all obstacles in your path.

name: Echoes of the Fey - The Fox's Trail
author: Woodsy Studio
title: Echoes of the Fey: The Fox's Trail is a visual novel that blends the magic of high fantasy and the mystery of a classic detective story. Play as Sofya Rykov, a private investigator with a secret of her own—the power to turn into a cat—as she searches for the truth behind a missing Leshin soldier.

name: UNCORPOREAL - Holographic Photography Demo
author: Uncorporeal Systems
title: Have you ever wanted to step INSIDE a photograph? With Uncorporeal's holographic photography demo you can! Transport yourself around the world and move your head to feel the true scale of each location in Virtual Reality!

name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 13
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules.

name: SkyBoats
author: BrainGoodGames
title: Ahoy SkyBoat captains! Today is your chance to learn to sail the skies, take control of the winds and discover vast riches up in the clouds. Even better, as you improve your skill at the game, SkyBoats will use your evolving rank to consistently give you a satisfying strategic challenge.

name: Hybrid Wars Upgrade Pack
author: Extreme Developers
title: Enhance your Hybrid Wars experience with some awesome extras. How about challenging a few contracts with a new character? Or why not take the Hybrid Wars soundtrack with you on the go while checking out the official art book packed with concept images and a character profile?

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - Third Eye Blind - Never Let You Go
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Never Let You Go" by Third Eye Blind on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - Variety Song Pack VI
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Stray Cat Strut" by Brian Setzer, “F.C.P.R.E.M.I.X.” by The Fall of Troy, “Hey Jealousy” by Gin Blossoms and "Suffragette City" by David Bowie on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition – Remastered – blink-182 - “First Date”
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "First Date" by blink-182 on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition – Remastered – Variety Song Pack VII
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Counting Stars", “Wherever You Will Go”, “I Melt With You” and "Take the Power Back" on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 - FUN. - Some Nights
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Some Nights" by FUN. on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 - Anniversary Song Pack
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Suspicious Minds", "I Want You Back", “Three Little Birds”, “Drops of Jupiter”, “Hey Ya!”, and "Some Nights" on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - UBI30: 1986 Song Pack
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Talk Dirty To Me" by The Poison, “Danger Zone” by Kenny Loggins, “Nobody’s Fool” by Cinderella , “Addicted To Love” by Robert Palmer and "Burning Heart" by Survivor on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - Stevie Ray Vaughan & Double Trouble - Cold Shot
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Cold Shot" by Stevie Ray Vaughan & Double Trouble on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - Stevie Ray Vaughan & Double Trouble Song Pack
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Pride and Joy", "Texas Flood", “Cold Shot”, “Scuttle Buttin’” and "Couldn’t Stand the Weather" by Stevie Ray Vaughan & Double Trouble on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: TRESPASS - Episode 1
author: VRotein
title: A room escape adventure, Having lost his memories and without knowing his whereabouts, assist the protagonist in escaping locations related to his past through searching for clues and solving for puzzles. Along the way, find old memories that will shed more light on his mysterious past.

name: Treasure of a blizzard Demo
author: Flaming Firefly
title: "Treasure of blizzard" is a fantasy themed visual novel inspiring with beautiful arts and interesting game characters. The fate of the protagonist completely depends on your choice. Probably your character may meet his partner in life; however he may also meet the end of his life. You’re the ones to choose.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 12
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules.

name: Deus Ex Machina, Game of the Year, 30th Anniversary Collector’s Edition
author: Potassium Frog Limited
title: Back by popular demand, the legendary video game and first ever interactive movie, starring Jon Pertwee (Doctor Who), Ian Dury (the Godfather of Punk), and Frankie Howerd (comic genius). Hailed as a breakthrough in the development of video games, Deus Ex Machina won Game Of The Year, and is currently the subject of movies, books,...

name: Scrap Garden - The Day Before
author: Egidijus Bachur
title: A new chapter of charming 3D platformer about the little rusty robot C4N who unwittingly finds himself in the midst of momentous events in Robo Land. In order to solve the new riddle, Canny will once again need to run and jump a lot, solve puzzles, and fight against enemies who are much bigger and stronger than he is.

name: Tower Island Soundtrack
author: Team of Light Mecia LLC
title: Tower Island features an all original music soundtrack that consists of 31 pieces of catchy music designed to not only immerse you in the game but to keep you playing well into the night. Not only will you undoubtedly have a favorite puzzle, but you will also have a favorite song or two as well. This isn't some cheesy, 8-bit soundtrack.

name: Trimmer Tycoon
author: Improx Games
title: Trimmer Tycoon is a fast survival game. You’re the new owner of a beard-trimming salon - Shavy. Customers start flowing in with absurd wishes for their beards. Can you satisfy their beardy dreams and keep up with the ever-increasing rent?

name: FORTIFY
author: RTK Entertainment
title: Fortify is a base designer for Rust. Quickly plan your base with lots of helpful tools and up to 3 other friends. See the stability, blow it up with C4/rockets/satchels, get the resource count and upkeep. Frequently updated to include Rust changes and to add new features.

name: Fantasy Grounds - B02: Happiness in Slavery (5E)
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A 5th Edition compatible adventure for six to eight PCs of levels 4-6The PCs are just bedding down for the night when the village is attacked by raiders. What at first appear to be simple bandits turns out to be more frightening when they discover the ‘raiders’ are not mere brigands, but foul Orcs. Worse, they have taken captives.

name: The Unwelcomed
author: The Unwelcomed Studios
title: The Unwelcomed is an escape the room (EtR) type game created for VR and was inspired by such classics as Crimson Room. The Unwelcomed starts by inviting you to come to your late uncle's mansion to claim it as your own. Once you arrive, however, it's going to be hard to leave...

name: Lew Pulsipher's Doomstar
author: Large Visible Machine
title: Doomstar, the hidden unit board game of strategy and cunning, is a new exclusive release from Large Visible Machine and legendary designer Lew Pulsipher (Britannia, Dragon Rage, Sea Kings). Play the AI or against friends or online opponents with fully asynchronous online multiplayer.

name: Manual Samuel - Anniversary Edition
author: Perfectly Paranormal
title: Meet Samuel, he’s handsome, wealthy and most importantly – dead. A deal with Death gives Samuel one last chance to live again if he can survive a whole day doing everything manually.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Adventure #01 - To End All Wars & Chaos on Crete (Savage Worlds)
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Welcome to a brave new world of Pulp action!Triple Ace Games presents the first instalment of Daring Tales of Adventure. Get the adventure and download the pre-generated heroes for free direct from our website and start playing!

name: imprint-X Soundtrack
author: Morgondag
title: The original soundtrack from imprint-XMusic composed by Tom CrokeThe Soundtrack will be placed in your game folder in the Steam Directory:…Steam SteamApps common imprint-X SoundtrackTracklist :1. The Puzzlers Domain 2. Geometric Bane3. The Light Patterns4. Tactical Rescue5. A Thought from Clone6. Blue Neon Waves7. Boss Track8.

name: A Week of Circus Terror Demo
author: Richard Haraším
title: A hand-drawn, point & click horror game about the haunted house and his owner. During the day, you have to search for some informations, but when the night comes, you have to understand, why are the possessed toys trying to kill you. You have to find a way to go through them and save your life!

name: Black Hat Cooperative
author: Team Future LLC
title: Black Hat Cooperative is a two player coop stealth game. One player is in VR, sneaking past enemies and collecting treasure. The other player is on the computer and keyboard, with access to a full view of the map and hacking superpowers. Work together to survive and complete the levels! Local multi-player supported.

name: Sentry Knight Tactics
author: Tyler Myers
title: Sentry Knight Tactics is a charming, cute action-strategy RPG adventure. Set in a land under siege by a transdimensional evil, you command your team of powerful heroes through various realms as you slaughter enemy hordes, complete quests, upgrade your gear and save the world.

name: Save the Universe, Please!
author: Hodeaka Studio
title: Take command of the crew of the ESS Shyp, explore planets, and deal with friendship, betrayal and maybe love! It's up to you to Save the Universe! It's your choice, so Please, don't let the Universe down!

name: Kitty Cat: Jigsaw Puzzles
author: EnsenaSoft
title: Kitty Cat: Jigsaw Puzzles is the puurfect game to cat lovers and jigsaw puzzle game enthusiasts. The game includes 84 challenging jigsaw puzzles with beautiful pictures of sweet, irresistible and adorable cats and kittens.

name: FSX: Steam Edition - Night Environment: New Jersey Add-On
author: Chris Bell – Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: New Jersey for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas. Thousands of lights clearly illuminate highways that connect cities and smaller roads which link neighbourhoods.

name: Train Simulator: North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines Route Add-On
author: Dovetail Games
title: Train Simulator’s North Jersey Coast & Morristown Lines route brings you more than 100 multi-track route miles of challenging and diverse NJ TRANSIT® railroading -- and the hands-on experiences of working on one of North America’s busiest contemporary commuter railroads!

name: FSX Steam Edition: AH-64D Apache Longbow Add-On
author: Virtavia
title: Legendary in its capabilities and immediately identifiable from its design, the AH-64 Apache™ has been developed into an unbeatable combat aircraft since it first entered service in the mid-1980s. The Longbow™ variant is a modern development of this unrivalled design and is characterised by its distinctive AN/APG-78 "Longbow"...

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars
author: Reverie World Studios
title: Rewrite medieval history through bloody siege combat in a fusion of RTS and Grand Strategy genres. Rule, build, and serve your King as a minor lord in medieval Europe. Experience siege, field and naval combat with an unseen degree of brutality. Rogue-like progression, epic towns and battles await…

name: SHINRAI - Broken Beyond Despair
author: Gosatsu Visual Novels
title: A secluded mountain resort, 10 friends, 1 murderer. Investigate, interrogate and present evidence as you solve various mysteries throughout the night. Will you be able to reach the truth and uncover the culprit’s identity? Or will your deductions lead you to blame someone completely innocent...?

name: Tomato Jones
author: HA Studio Ltd.
title: It is just a red tomato with a stupid hat. He tries to look like a cool tomb raider, rolling and jumping all over the maps. Help him find all the treasures in the mystic castle or watch him die...in many painful ways.

name: The Shadowland
author: Bloodcraft Dev
title: EN Little Reaper finds himself lost in grim otherworld. Help him find the way back through treacherous obstacles and threatening foes.Prepare to rely heavily on your reflexes to complete 30+ levels spanning through 6 locations, and beat 3 unique bosses. RU Маленький жнец потерялся в мрачной потустороннем мире.

name: DUO
author: NiVision
title: DUO is an arcade game designed from the ground up for virtual reality. Now you can immerse yourself in a virtual world with a classic retro game."This could be Vive’s best brick breaker. Give it a go."

name: Pro Strategy Football 2016
author: Kerry Batts
title: Attention! PSF 2020 will be released in early September! With a full in-game editor, the ability to run multiple careers and season campaigns, full Play by Play of all games, and more, PSF 2020 is a massive update to the Pro Strategy Football series!

name: A Week of Circus Terror
author: Richard Haraším
title: A hand-drawn, point & click indie horror game about the haunted house and his owner. During the day, you have to search for some informations, but when the night comes, you have to understand, why are the possessed toys trying to kill you. You have to find a way to go through them and save your life!

name: I Am The Hero
author: Crazyant
title: I Am The Hero is a pixel art, beat 'em up, fighting game that tells the story of a "Hero" with a glorious but mysterious past. Is he the hero he thinks he is or is there a another side to this legendary figure?

name: Depths of Dread
author: Mindmuscle Games
title: There is something unusual about the source of monsters coming from the depths below. Having been summoned by the king to investigate a dungeon beneath an old abandoned town, you are to put together a team that will purge the dungeon of evil before it spreads and consumes the land.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: Florida Add-On
author: Chris Bell – Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator. Hundreds of thousands of lights clearly show how highways connect to cities and how smaller roads meander through neighbourhoods.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: New York Add-On
author: Chris Bell - Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: New York for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas. Thousands of lights clearly illuminate highways that connect cities and smaller roads which link neighbourhoods.

name: Blight of the Immortals
author: Iron Helmet Games
title: A plague of undead creatures threatens to overwhelm the land and with the fall of each town to the Blight, more walking dead rise and the zombie apocalypse draws nearer. Innovative turn based single player, slow-real-time co-op multiplayer!

name: Unbreakable Vr Runner
author: Miikka Åsnabrygg
title: Fun and a great cardio workout game for HTC Vive. This is a coin catcher game in which the player collects coins or candies and dodges obstacles at the same time. If the players headset hits an obstacle player lose. 4 totally different levels with same game style. The game works wonderfully in vr enviroment. Needs 1.5x2m space.

name: Mystery Case Files: Ravenhearst - French
author: Big Fish Games
title: Percez les secrets d'un mystère terrifiant : les rumeurs qui entourent l'histoire du manoir de Ravenhearst circulent depuis des dizaines d'années. Seul le journal intime d'Emma Ravenhearst détient la clé pour résoudre ce mystère vieux d'un siècle, mais toutes les pages ont disparu.

name: Awakened
author: Jesper Michael Petersen
title: In this indie horror game dubbed - Awakened, you'll be playing sidescroller levels, first person view 3D environments, top down stealth levels, puzzles and more. You see, it's a series of minigames within the game and they're all tied together by a growing and riveting storyline that'll entertain you, challenge you, scare you, and keep...

name: Dynasty Feud
author: Kaia Studios
title: Dynasty Feud is a competitive, team-based, fast-paced platform brawler for 2-4 players. Play either local or online and show off your skills with 40 characters, one-hit kills, multiple fighting skills and a lot of style.

name: Assetto Corsa - Red Pack
author: Kunos Simulazioni
title: KUNOS Simulazioni and 505 Games are proud to present the "RED PACK", the DLC package for ASSETTO CORSA that includes seven legendary Italian sports cars and Austria’s RedBull Ring circuit. Since the birth of modern motorsports, Red has historically been the colour of choice for Italian Manufacturers & competitive teams.

name: Figment
author: Bedtime Digital Games
title: Figment is an action-adventure game that invites you to explore a unique surreal universe filled with music, humor and multi layered narrative. Join Dusty and his ever-optimistic friend, Piper, on an adventure through the different sides of the mind seeking to restore the courage that's been lost.

name: Rocksmith 2014 - 2010s Mix Song Pack
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark (Light Em Up)” by Fall Out Boy, "Sweater Weather” by The Neighbourhood, and “Burn Nice and Slow (The Formative Years)” by Hail The Sun on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 - Misfits - Die, Die My Darling
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Die, Die My Darling" by Misfits on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Rocksmith 2014 - Misfits Song Pack
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Last Caress”, “Die, Die My Darling", "Where Eagles Dare", and "Halloween" by Misfits on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Craft The World - Sisters in Arms
author: Dekovir Entertainment
title: About the Update Sisters in Arms is an official update to Craft the World that features new characters, special items, weapons, and decor, as well as creatures with new abilities. Primary features: ● New characters: Female dwarves. The hard-working dwarves will be joined by their charming sisters in arms.

name: Shonen Idle Z
author: Zakos Games
title: Do you like Anime and Manga? Would you like to be the main character of your own story? In Shonen Idle Z you can create your own character and be the hero! Train hard, improve your martial skills and advance through the world getting rid of the evil Kurowashi and his army of monsters.

name: Blasters of the Universe
author: Secret Location Inc.
title: Blasters of the Universe is the first of its kind, bringing the bullet hell genre into first person VR. Intense gameplay is heavily reliant on physical movement, requiring the player to duck, dodge, twist, turn, and maneuver their way through tons of enemies and hundreds of bullets.

name: Mugen Souls Z - Overwhelming Ticket Bundle
author: Idea Factory
title: Includes the following DLC packs:Overwhelming Ticket Set 1Overwhelming Ticket Set 2Overwhelming Ticket Set 3Overwhelming Ticket Set 4* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.

name: Mugen Souls Z - Character Clothing Bundle
author: Idea Factory
title: Includes the following DLC packs: Honor Student Goddess Priest SetFire and Ice Combo Set* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.

name: Mugen Souls Z - Ultimate Unlocks Bundle
author: Idea Factory
title: Includes the following DLC packs:Unlock Clothing Restrictions.Unlock All Voices.Unlock All Physical Parts.Unlock All Clothing.* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.

name: Hide and Secret Treasure of the Ages
author: Anarchy Enterprises
title: The villain Jacques has stolen the Treasures of the Ages so he can harness their mystical powers in his evil plan to rule the world. You must help Will Scout and Anna Graham on their quest to defeat him and rescue the treasures!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War
author: Proxy Studios
title: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius – Relics of War brings you to a world of terror and violence. Four factions will engage in a brutal war for dominance over the planet’s resources. In the first turn-based 4X strategy game set in Warhammer 40,000 you will lead one of four unique factions.

name: iGrow Game
author: iDev Games
title: iGrow Game is a single player cannabis growing game for windows PC. iGrow game is the only cannabis growing game available in 3D and in first person. Start your own cannabis growing factory in a grimy tower block based in the UK. Your goal is to take over and become the best grower around using the best equipment.

name: Sling Ming
author: Good Night Brave Warrior
title: Hook up to the Oxylane, a transit system that lets you fly through the air, swing around corners and defy gravity. Embark on an intergalactic adventure, solve physics-based puzzles and save your kingdom from the never-ending earthquakes!

name: God's Trigger
author: One More Level
title: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities to inflict violence in the most graphic way possible.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: Legendary Beginnings: The Bandit's Cave
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A Marvelous Treasure Gone Missing!The people of Corbin Village are hardy folk, familiar with the dangers of the region. But when a band of orcs raids the village, Sheriff McBride realizes she has more troubles than she can handle and calls on a group of heroes to bring the orcs to justice.

name: Valcarta: Rise of the Demon
author: Blacksword Games
title: Valak, a young man, is thrust into adventure on a seemingly normal day. This adventure changes depending on a single choice he is forced to make. What path will you choose? What side will you represent? Jump into the world of Valcarta and help Valak change its fate forever.

name: Galaxy in Turmoil
author: Frontwire Studios, LLC
title: Galaxy in Turmoil's conceptual Early Access game is a FREE multiplayer combined-arms game set in a brand-new universe, created by a team of volunteers. It’s all about endless arms races, corporate espionage, and, most of all, blasting up on the enemy faction and taking their stuff.

name: Age of Empires II (2013): Rise of the Rajas
author: SkyBox Labs
title: Welcome to Age of Empires II HD: The Rise of the Rajas; the third new official expansion for the Age of Empires II universe in over 17 years. Challenge friends with four additional civilizations, new units, technologies, and build your empire on both water and land.

name: The Dope Game Demo
author: CoaguCo Industries
title: To escape the city of Starkham and start your new life, you get your friend Preston to set up a meeting with the local loanshark, Sweaty Mike. After foolishly borrowing $2,000 to start your fledging drug dealing career, you embark on a timed mission to sell as many drugs as possible throughout the city.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 3.5E/PFRPG: SH1: The Ties That Bind
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: The first Pathfinder compatible adventure in the Shattered Heart Adventure Path, designed for four to five PCs of 6th level.Still reeling from the twin disasters of the Great Schism and the Hoyrall Wars, the halfings of Picollo are a people cast adrift from ancient traditions.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 3.5E/PFRPG: A24: Return to the Crypt of the Sun Lord
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A24 (PFRPG): Return to the Crypt of the Sun LordAAW GamesThe temple bells rang out, their crystal hollow-overtones calling gently to the dispersed worshipers dwelling within the underground sun temple. The Temple of the Sun was itself an enigma, a place dedicated to the sun but hidden far underground, shielded from the mighty rays of the...

name: Heirs And Graces
author: Winter Wolves
title: Play as Marcel and determine whether or not he has the skills to become Lord Sandor's heir and whether or not he forms a romantic attachment to one of four potential love interests: an ex-gladiator turned gardener, a perfectionist butler, the local doctor, or a mischievous elven Lord.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: Goblin Cave
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A 5th Edition compatible adventure for four to six PCs of Levels 1-2The village of Svor has a problem, travelers on the main road are being robbed by bandits. The magistrate has requested assistance from the king, but help will take weeks to arrive. In the meantime the PCs are called upon to investigate the robberies.

name: Final Approach: Pilot Edition
author: Phaser Lock Interactive
title: Feel the wind in your hair and the roar of the engine in Final Approach: Pilot Edition! Grab your gamepad as you expertly pilot aircraft through treacherous landscapes, fly combat missions and solve various challenges in this seated, Virtual Reality action-packed flying adventure. You own the skies!

name: Slap Village - Reality Slap
author: MonkeyToons
title: Set in an anachronistic Western with multitude of characters and adventures to discover, Slap Village mixes up the past and the present time within a context full of humour and mystery. Immerse yourself in this wild adventure and find out about the story of Lurditas and her inseparable friend Rasta.

name: Moatboat
author: Moatboat
title: In Moatboat, whatever you say happens. Use your voice to bring ideas to life inside virtual reality. Moatboat is an experimental tool that lets you create and command the world around you by simply saying your ideas out loud. Create living worlds from scratch or explore existing worlds for inspiration.

name: Fantasy Grounds - War of the Dead Chapter 2 Map Pack
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: War of the Dead Chapter 2 Map PackThis is a map pack for Chapter 2 of the awesome War of the Dead setting. While it follows the encounters from the chapter, most of the maps are generic enough to fit into any zombie game.

name: Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Free Edition
author: Clickteam
title: Game and software creation has never been easier or quicker than with Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Discover the tool used by so many multimedia professionals, game creators, and creative people from all walks of life.

name: Teaching You Road Signs - Driving Test Success
author: Focus Multimedia
title: Signs, signals and road markings play a key role in directing and informing traffic, so it's essential that we ALL know what they mean and how to safely respond to it.

name: Shoppe Keep - Original Soundtrack
author: Strange Fire
title: Sit back, relax and boot up your vinyl player to listen to the soothing melodies of the Shoppe keep official soundtrack. Containing the original musical score and a bonus Christmas pack. Original soundtrack: 1. A big bright Marketful Day 2. After Hours 3. Battle Over The Barbarians 4. Bring Your items and Your Brooms! 5.

name: Car Car Crash Hands On Edition
author: Chocolatefudge Games
title: Car Car Crash invites you to play with toy cars like you always imagined. Peak around the corners of building as the cars zip by on the streets of the miniature towns and cities! Stand tall to get a birds eye view to see it all!

name: The Incredible Baron OST
author: FlatRedBall
title: The complete original soundtrack for The Incredible Baron, composed by Esselfortium. Songs will appear as high quality MP3s in the The Incredible Baron folder on your computer (steamapps common The Incredible Baron Esselfortium - The Incredible Baron Soundtrack).Includes 24 tracks:1. The Incredible Baron - Main Theme 01:392.

name: Eclipse --- Defending the motherland Demo
author: NezhaGames
title: This is a fantastic FPS Sci-Fi game. You can challenge yourself. Thousands of Monsters run to you, can you really get through it? Endless level, Endless monsters, if you are a man, just have a try!

name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: Tarin's Crown
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: An island adventure for 6th level characters in search of plunder and fame!The treacherous jungle island known as Crown Isle was marked on every map for danger, as the verdant vegetation itself rose up to devour many who sought landing there until the infamous Captain Jared Tarin hacked out a refuge upon the mountain's hilly crest and...

name: She Remembered Caterpillars Demo
author: jumpsuit entertainment UG (haftungsbeschraenkt)
title: She Remembered Caterpillars is a fungipunk fantasy about love, loss, and holding on, told in the format of a color-based puzzle game. A tale as the bond between parent and child, this lush and bewildering title will have players testing their wits against a variety of challenges, all beautiful and very strange.

name: Angel Express [Tokkyu Tenshi]
author: Easy Game Station
title: Welcome to the realm of magic, monsters and fast-delivery-mail. Like every Messenger, you hope to join the elite ranks of the Angel Express. However, it won’t be as simple as outrunning the competition. You'll need to be quick on your feet and mindful of traps and other messengers. Only the quickest and nimblest Messengers will make it.

name: Shattered Throne
author: Checkmark Games
title: Shattered Throne is a turn based fantasy strategy game that will challenge your skills as a general. No luck to blame, only your ability to master the unique units and leaders to exploit the combo system will decide if you are victorious.

name: Crush Your Enemies Demo
author: Vile Monarch
title: Go back to the days when you thought real time strategy games were awesome. Crush Your Enemies has everything you like in strategy games - planning, choosing different types of units, managing resources, taking enemy territory and outwitting your opponent with the ingenious formations of your men.

name: Felt Tip Circus Workshop Tool
author: Alpha Wave Entertainment
title: If you ever thought Felt Tip Circus could use a little more dazzlement and derring-do... Why not add it yourself?This DLC package provides you with everything you need to start creating new madcap VR adventures and make them a living part of the circus experience.

name: Tabletop Simulator - Darkrock Ventures
author: Berserk Games
title: Only the host needs to own this DLC. 2-5 Players (1-5 Variant available) | Ages 14 & Up 30-45 MinutesAbout Darkrock VenturesDarkrock Ventures is a worker placement board game about deep-space asteroid mining. Each player takes control of their own Asteroid Mining operation with little more than a ship and a skeleton crew.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Salvation of the Lost Collector's Edition
author: AMAX Interactive
title: Escape from a mystical cemetery!

name: Shaolin vs Wutang
author: J.Bowman
title: Shaolin vs Wutang is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

name: Styx: Shards of Darkness - The Akenash Set
author: Cyanide Studio
title: Enhance your gaming experience in Styx: Shards of Darkness! The Akenash Set DLC gives you access to the iconic Akenash Outfit and the Akenash Dagger.- The Akenash Outfit: here's the one-and-only, classic outfit from Styx's first adventure! Whenever Styx summons a clone, its duration before disappearing is increased.

name: Hero Siege - Zombie Hunter (Skin)
author: Elias Viglione
title: Developing Hero Siege takes alot of time, effort and sleepless nights. Buy us some Energy Drinks and help us with server costs so we can keep on supporting this great game!Show your commitment to us and get this awesome skin you can brag about to your friends!

name: Hiiro
author: Jon Tiburzi
title: Hiiro is a 2D platform game focused on ambient exploration and puzzle solving. Discover a grand world filled with mysterious artifacts and forgotten ruins. Become immersed in relaxing gameplay and meditative music. Remain observant as you unravel an explanation for your solitude.

name: Don Bradman Cricket 17 Demo
author: Big Ant Studios
title: The Don Bradman Cricket Academy allows gamers to build their dream cricket team and get prepared for when the full game launches in December 2016. Create and customise players with an unprecedented level of control, alter players' roles, mentalities and numerous skills to create the ultimate superstar.

name: Fury Unleashed
author: Awesome Games Studio
title: Shoot your way through the pages of an ever-changing comic book in this fast-paced roguelike. Play solo, in local or online co-op, expand your weaponry, and upgrade your hero with each run. All that to find out why has your creator lost his faith in you and to prove him wrong.

name: Chicku Demo
author: Gatling Goat Studios
title: Chicku is a nail bitingly hard platformer in which the player has to escape the Barrington farm. You’ll be forced to dodge saws, spikes and many other deadly traps in order to save your brethren and rise against the evil Dr. Barrington. Play alone or with friends in this epic adventure and save millions of chickens along the way.

name: OH! GUIDE!
author: RosePortal Games
title: Need help? Get the official STRATEGY GUIDE!Extensive and illustrated 65-page strategy guide for OH! RPG!The contents include:A full extensive walkthrough on the main storyline and all side-questsTips and tricksTreasure chest locationsBoss battle strategiesEnemy informationCompare your User Rank to other players!

name: SoundTrack
author: Oointah
title: Oointah Games are happy to release the Death by Game Show soundtrack.  These seven tracks have been added to the game by Will Phillips in patch 1.03 and have a quirky, orchestral sound that is both fun and uniquely Death by Game Show.

name: Gleipnir
author: SANDLOT
title: A super weapon that can only be used by Wing Divers with mastery of the Psionic Link. Press and hold the attack button to increase the throwing distance, and release it to discharge. (The path is indicated by a red line.)

name: Empires of the Undergrowth
author: Slug Disco Studios
title: Ant colony management game, in a fast-paced real-time strategy style. The player excavates their nest underground, constructing tunnels and chambers to store food and raise brood. On the surface, the ants claim territory, gather resources, overwhelm fearsome arachnids and clash with other colonies.

name: Super Cloudbuilt
author: Coilworks
title: Rocket-powered 3D parkour platformer, built for speed running and exploration. Defeat enemies and overcome obstacles as you hurtle with break-neck momentum above a vast abyss. Collect power-ups, drop checkpoints and take your place on the international leaderboards.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Lorebook
author: Fatshark
title: It’s time to dig into the rich lore of the Warhammer Fantasy world in this FREE DLC for Vermintide: the Lorebook. Hidden and strewn around the various missions of Vermintide and its DLCs, you will find unique Lorebook pages.

name: Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead
author: Bohemia Interactive
title: Three years after the conflict in Chernarus, portrayed in the original Arma 2, a new flashpoint explodes in the Green Sea Region. Coalition forces led by the US Army are deployed to Takistan to quickly restore peace and prevent further civilian casualties.

name: SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis Classics
author: D3T Limited
title: SEGA’s collection of Mega Drive & Genesis Classics comes to a new generation, now updated with even more features: online multiplayer, achievements, mirror mode, rewind, save states, VR and more! Over 50 classic games in one great package. Get into the classics!

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
author: Valve
title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago. CS: GO features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes, and delivers updated versions of the classic CS content (de_dust2, etc.).

name: PlanetSide 2
author: Rogue Planet Games
title: PlanetSide 2 is an all-out planetary war, where thousands of players battle as one across enormous continents. Utilize infantry, ground and air vehicles, and teamwork to destroy your enemies in this revolutionary first-person shooter on a massive scale.

name: Shadowrun Returns
author: Harebrained Schemes
title: The unique cyberpunk-meets-fantasy world of Shadowrun has gained a huge cult following since its creation nearly 25 years ago. Now, creator Jordan Weisman returns to the world of Shadowrun, modernizing this classic game setting as a single player, turn-based tactical RPG.

name: Sumeru_ArtBook
author: BigCheeseGames
title: Sumeru Digital Paintings & HD Wallpaper & Level design manuscript

name: Rocket League®
author: Psyonix LLC
title: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Rocket League includes casual and competitive Online Matches, a fully-featured offline Season Mode, special “Mutators” that let you change the rules entirely, hockey and...

name: South Park™: The Stick of Truth™
author: Obsidian Entertainment
title: From the perilous battlefields of the fourth-grade playground, a young hero will rise, destined to be South Park’s savior. From the creators of South Park, Trey Parker and Matt Stone, comes an epic quest to become… cool. Introducing South Park™: The Stick of Truth™.For a thousand years, the battle has been waged.

name: The Witcher Adventure Game
author: CD PROJEKT RED
title: The Witcher Adventure Game is a digital adaptation of CD PROJEKT RED’s board game set in the brutal fantasy universe of monster slayer Geralt of Rivia. Travel across the beautifully rendered world of The Witcher and complete a variety of quests — hunt deadly beasts, solve ancient mysteries and more.

name: This War of Mine
author: 11 bit studios
title: In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.

name: Templar Battleforce
author: Trese Brothers
title: An addictive mix of strategic combat and army building, with the precision of an RPG. Design your squad members' exact build of equipment and talents to create unique fireteam combinations. Step into the pilot suit of a Leviathan mech, lead the Templar Knights in turn-based tactical warfare.

name: The Culling
author: Xaviant
title: Battle Royale is back! In a remote island paradise, 16 contestants have 25 minutes to explore, scavenge items, craft weapons, build traps, hunt and kill each other. Only one will be crowned the winner, do you have the guts to survive?

name: Redout: Enhanced Edition
author: 34BigThings srl
title: Redout is a tribute to the old racing monsters such as F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, and POD. It is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

name: HITMAN™ 2
author: IO Interactive A/S
title: Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in HITMAN™ 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world’s most creative assassin, Agent 47 in the ultimate spy thriller story.

name: Vagrus - The Riven Realms
author: Lost Pilgrims Studio
title: Embark on a perilous journey across a realm forsaken by the gods and devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, an award-winning turn-based post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG.

name: Divinity: Original Sin (Classic)
author: Larian Studios
title: Gather your party and get ready for a new, back-to-the-roots RPG adventure! Discuss your decisions with companions; fight foes in turn-based combat; explore an open world and interact with everything and everyone you see. Join up with a friend to play online in co-op and make your own adventures with the powerful RPG toolkit.

name: Half-Life: Source
author: Valve
title: Winner of over 50 Game of the Year awards, Half-Life set new standards for action games when it was released in 1998. Half-Life: Source is a digitally remastered version of the critically acclaimed and best selling PC game, enhanced via Source technology to include physics simulation, enhanced effects, and more.

name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Enhanced Edition
author: CD PROJEKT RED
title: A time of untold chaos has come. Mighty forces clash behind the scenes in a struggle for power and influence. The Northern Kingdoms mobilize for war. But armies on the march are not enough to stop a bloody conspiracy...

name: Neverwinter
author: Cryptic Studios
title: Neverwinter is a free, action MMORPG based on the acclaimed Dungeons & Dragons fantasy roleplaying game. Epic stories, action combat and classic roleplaying await those heroes courageous enough to enter the fantastic world of Neverwinter!

name: Hero Siege - Wrath of Mevius
author: Elias Viglione
title: The Wrath of Mevius - Expansion SetFight your way through Astral Plains, Corrupted Deserts to the Mansion of Mevius and face him in an epic battle that determines the fate of mankind!- Unlocks ACT VII- New enemies- New Bosses- New relic pool- New Classes (Demon Slayer & Demonspawn)Demon Slayer[/img]Gunslinger skillsExecutioner...

name: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition
author: Gunfire Games
title: The ultimate DARKSIDERS II experience! 1080p native resolution. Reworked and tuned game balancing and loot distribution. Improved Graphic Render Engine for even higher visual quality, lighting and shadows. Improved and reworked level, character and environment graphics.

name: KurtzPel
author: KOG
title: "KurtzPel is an anime-styled, action battle game from a third-person perspective. Players can battle it out in both PvP and PvE mission-based battle modes with massive boss monsters. Players utilize Karmas (the method used to indicate weapon and class types) when charging into battle. Each character gets to use two types of Karmas.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
author: Rockstar Games
title: Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
title: Hace cinco años Carl Johnson huyó de los rigores de vivir en LS, San Andreas... una ciudad asolada por las bandas, las drogas y la corrupción, en la que las estrellas de cine y los millonarios hacen lo posible por evitar a los traficantes y a los pandilleros. Corren los 90 y Carl debe regresar.

name: Counter-Strike: Condition Zero
author: Valve
title: With its extensive Tour of Duty campaign, a near-limitless number of skirmish modes, updates and new content for Counter-Strike's award-winning multiplayer game play, plus over 12 bonus single player missions, Counter-Strike: Condition Zero is a tremendous offering of single and multiplayer content.

name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion® Game of the Year Edition
author: Bethesda Game Studios
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion® Game of the Year Edition является одной из лучших RPG в истории. Шагните в самый яркий и проработанный игровой мир. Вы можете пойти только по основной сюжетной линии или погрузиться в этот мир с головой и найти для себя множество интересных и разнообразных заданий.

name: Ball of Wonder
author: White Rabbit Games
title: Come with us to the magnicifent world of circuses.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization® IV
author: Firaxis Games
title: With over 6 million units sold and unprecedented critical acclaim from fans and press around the world, Sid Meier's Civilization is recognized as one of the greatest PC game franchises of all-time. Now, Sid Meier and Firaxis Games will take this incredibly fun and addictive game to new heights by adding new ways to play and win, new...

name: Gothic 1
author: Piranha Bytes
title: War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana. Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed a lot of ore to forge enough weapons, should his army stand against this threat. Whoever breaks the law in these darkest of times is sentenced to serve in the giant penal colony of Khorinis, mining the so much needed...

name: STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™
author: BioWare
title: STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™ is a free-to-play MMORPG that puts you at the center of your own story-driven saga. Play as a Jedi, Sith, Bounty Hunter, or one of many other iconic STAR WARS roles in the galaxy far, far away over three thousand years before the classic films.

name: No More Room in Hell
author: No More Room in Hell Team
title: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.

name: Cubic Castles
author: Cosmic Cow LLC
title: Your blocks, your castle, your world! Build anything you can dream up and explore with other players! Cubic Castles is a mini-MMO that combines the best of block-building and 3D platform action! Create fantastic parkour challenges, explore worlds made by other players, or even make friend!

name: Plazma Being
author: Felix Wunderlich
title: Take control of Zeb in this puzzle/platformer. He is a small energy based life form from space, known as a Plazma Being. While journeying through space to his home, Zeb was surprised to find that he was being kidnapped by aliens. They took him back to their planet and unceremoniously threw him into captivity.

name: Tactical Craft Online
author: Crematorium of Time
title: Tactical Craft Online - MMO sandbox with tactical role-playing elements with a large open fully destructible world, with clans, trade between players, construction limited to the players imagination, various crafting, mining of multiple ores, farming, fishing, a massive tech tree etc.

name: SCP: Secret Laboratory
author: Northwood Studios
title: Deep within the SCP Foundation during a containment breach, many of the anomalies have bypassed security and escaped from their chambers - without peaceful intentions. Become site personnel, a re-containment agent, or an anomalous entity and fight to take control of or escape the facility!

name: My Lands: Black Gem Hunting
author: Gravvit Ltd
title: My Lands is a free online RTS where dark and light forces fight for Black Gem and dominion in a vast fantasy world. Cooperation between players, joint economy development, creation of clans and alliances and elaboration of a team strategy serve as the very foundation of the game.

name: DayZ
author: Bohemia Interactive
title: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources. Will you team up with strangers and stay strong together? Or play as a lone wolf to avoid betrayal? This is DayZ – this is your story.

name: Litil Divil
author: Gremlin Interactive
title: Welcome to the Underworld, where you guide Mutt, the bad luck Litil Divil, through the Labyrinth of Chaos to retrieve the Mystical Pizza of Plenty. Our “hero” takes a fateful step through the Mortal Portal to prowl five hellish levels of treacherous tunnels with more than 50 raucous rooms of gameplay.

name: Squishy the Suicidal Pig
author: Tomi Maarela
title: From the creators of Hero Siege, Squishy the Suicidal Pig is a puzzle platformer with a counterintuitive goal where you play as Squishy, a pig wearing a yellow sweater who's trying to reach his parents in animal heaven by completing his deal with the devil.You asked for a challenge, now you have it!

name: Infestation: The New Z
author: Fredaikis AB
title: The New Z is a FREE TO PLAY multi-game mode experience. SURVIVE with friends and gather loot, stash and trade. Go into wars against other groups in a massive OPEN WORLD or face them 5 v 5 in COMPETITIVE.

name: Of Guards And Thieves
author: Subvert Games
title: Of Guards and Thieves is a multiplayer stealth game in which high-powered guards face off against fast and elusive thieves in a contest of wits. Outsmarting the enemy and shooting your way through to the goal are equally valid strategies.

name: Geneshift
author: Nik Nak Studios
title: Geneshift is a GTA2-inspired shooter that merges battle royale and roguelite mechanics. Shoot, loot and drive through an army of enemies as you level up your mutant powers and try to survive. Play singleplayer or ride shotgun with friends firing car bombs, trip-wires, invisibility and more!

name: Mr. Prepper: Prologue
author: Rejected Games
title: Mr. Prepper: Prologue is a free standalone version of the game Mr. Prepper, featuring an essential part of the story.

name: Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator
author: Brilliant Game Studios
title: Here is a sandbox like no other. Create massive battles with absolutely no limits. Want to see 10,000 chickens fight an army of Romans?? Sure, why not. Want to see a company of WW2 U.S soldiers fight 11,000 Medieval soldiers?? There are simply no limits to the carnage you can achieve in UEBS.

name: A Story About My Uncle
author: Gone North Games
title: A Story About My Uncle is a first person platforming adventure game about a boy who searches for his lost uncle, and ends up in a world he couldn’t imagine existed. The movement is a crucial part of the games core gameplay – focusing on swinging through the world with a grappling hook that gives the player a wonderful sense of speed and...

name: Kraven Manor
author: Demon Wagon Studios
title: Turn out the lights, take a deep breath, and prepare yourself. Explore the depths of the immersive, atmospheric world of Kraven Manor. Uncover its secrets, solve its mystical puzzles, and face its growing threat. Face your fears and see if you have what it takes...the doors of Kraven Manor await you.

name: Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee®
author: Oddworld Inhabitants
title: Selected by the fickle finger of fate, Abe™, floor-waxer first class for RuptureFarms, was catapulted into a life of adventure when he overheard plans by his boss, Molluck the Glukkon™, to turn Abe and his fellow Mudokons into Tasty Treats as part of a last-ditch effort to rescue Molluck's failing meat-packing empire.

name: SUPER DISTRO
author: KITATUS STUDIOS
title: "SUPER DISTRO" is a hard-as-nails 2D platformer in the style of retro games such as Megaman, Super Mario Bros 2: The Lost Levels and other such rage-inducing classics. Taking "Difficult gameplay" to a whole new level - SUPER DISTRO is not for the faint-of-heart. The weak need not apply.

name: City of Chains
author: Astronomic Games
title: City of Chains is a dark sci-fi RPG set in a dystopian city. Take control of a small group of escaped fugitives and lead them to their freedom. Decide whether to fight head on or to avoid combat, to help others or to go your own way, to show mercy or to kill. Your actions could affect the fate of the city.

name: Stationeers
author: RocketWerkz
title: Stationeers puts you in control of the construction and management of a space station to run by yourself or online with your friends. Complex atmospheric, electrical, manufacturing, agriculture, and gravitational systems require your thought and management at all times!

name: Savage Resurrection
author: S2 Games, LLC
title: The rebirth of the classic action FPS / RTS hybrid "Savage 1" is here! Experience fast-paced combat and cunning strategic gameplay in glorious Unreal 4 environments. Engage in epic 16v16 front-line combat, or take Command to outplay and outmaneuver your team's way to victory.

name: Little Nightmares
author: Tarsier Studios
title: Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears! Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.

name: Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance
author: Gas Powered Games
title: The last days of man are at hand.. Two years after the Infinite War the once great warring nations now lie in ruins, and humanity’s hope for a brighter future is nothing but a bitter memory. A new, seemingly unstoppable enemy, supported by the zealots of The Order, now seeks to eradicate mankind: UEF, Aeon Loyalist, and Cybran alike.

name: Jet Gunner
author: Sinclair Strange
title: Jet Gunner is a 2D platform action indie game that's full of Nestalgia. Full of action, gunfights, bosses and explosions so if you're into the whole 8-Bit vibe you should love this. From the sound, to the graphics to the flicker, this should pay tribute to those classic hard as nails, run 'n' gun games.

name: Space Hack
title: Space Hack is a sci-fi hack and slash action RPG dungeon crawler. A strange anomaly appears and the colony ship you are traveling on is quickly overtaken by aliens that prey on the helpless colonists. It is up to you to save as many of them as you can and to clear your ship of the alien invaders.

name: Friday the 13th: The Game
author: IllFonic
title: Jason is back! Jason Voorhees is unleashed and stalking the grounds of Camp Crystal Lake! Friday the 13th: The Game is one of the most highly-anticipated horror titles of all time. You will finally be able to take on the role as Jason Voorhees and Camp Crystal Lake counselors.

name: Coffee Crisis
author: Mega Cat Studios
title: Coffee Crisis is an neo-rogue brawler that puts you in the shoes of the only baristas on Earth with enough heavy metal in their veins to fend off an alien assault. Play solo or join up with a friend to fight across eight locations ranging from your Coffee House HQ to the far reaches of outer space.

name: Planet Explorers
author: Pathea Games
title: Planet Explorers is an open world sandbox adventure RPG game set on a distant planet. The game uses a new OpenCL calculated voxel system to allow players to change the terrain in any way, create new objects such as weapons, vehicles, objects, and do it anywhere.

name: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
author: New Game Order
title: The Uncertain is an story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Experience the mysterious vibe of each of carefully explored locations, solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the whole truth being kept from you.

name: Theatre of War
author: 1C Entertainment
title: Command a special task force composed of different kinds of units, including tanks, APCs, field guns, mortars, various infantry regiments and will also have an opportunity to call for artillery and air support.

name: Two Worlds Epic Edition
author: Reality Pump Studios
title: ... 300 years after Aziraal has been banished, a brother and sister are drawn into the conflict which has flared up between the Orcs and the free world. Kyra, the hero's younger sister, suddenly disappears in mysterious circumstances.«...If my family really belongs to the chosen ones, why then have we always been as poor as church mice?

name: The I of the Dragon
author: Primal
title: The world of Nimoa is as beautiful as the morning dew, but only at first glance. Under the surface of hills and fertile valleys lurks an old and eternal evil. Living as a mould, stretching threads through an infected area like deadly toadstools. The center of this "being?" deep in the under world is the giant daemon, Skarborr.

name: Hitman: Contracts
author: Io-Interactive A/S
title: Enter the world of a HITMAN - a world of crime, sin and greed. Delve into the mind of Agent 47 and encounter his greatest adversaries, completing the work that made him so brutally efficient and shaped him as an assassin. Eliminate your targets by any means necessary. There are no rules... only the contract, signed in blood.

name: Allods Online RU
author: IT Territory
title: Tighten the ranks on your path to glorious victories in Allods Online! Team up with your friends to explore the dangers of the mysterious Astral. Together you will prevail!

name: Emily Wants To Play
author: Shawn Hitchcock
title: It’s 11pm and the last house on your route. The windows are boarded up, the yard is overgrown, but the lights are on and the front door is open… strange place to deliver a pizza. You’re getting soaked from the rain, so you hesitantly step inside the house. You shouldn’t have done that.

name: Endless Fables: The Minotaur's Curse
author: Sunward Games
title: Face off against the Minotaur!

name: Alveari Demo
author: BeehiveBob
title: A collection of VR mini-games! Slow motion action!

name: Birdsketball
author: Waynetron
title: Local multiplayer basketball with birds.

name: Dashing Rogue Bundle
author: Wicked Fun, Inc.
title: Unlock 1000 shards plus this premium Dashing Rogue skin voiced by Owen Thomas, the talent behind “Twisted Fate” in League of Legends. Experience Tarkin’s lighter side, before the weight of being a vigilante got him down in the dumps!

name: Berserker Bundle
author: Wicked Fun, Inc.
title: Purchase the “Berserker Bundle” to get a head start on the competition with 600 shards plus Berserker Aura!

name: Initia: Elemental Arena
author: Gentle Ghouls
title: Initia: Elemental Arena is a new take on online arena shooters. It blends frantic team-based game play of first person Arena shooters like Unreal Tournament & the FPS Magic mechanics of Skyrim. It combines it all with strategic objectives and tactical team play.

name: The Dweller
author: Villainous  Games
title: The Dweller is a puzzle game where you play as the MONSTER! It's time to get rid of all those pesky archaeologists snooping around in your lair. SCARE them, CRUSH them, DEVOUR them! ELIMINATE THE INTRUDERS!

name: Shadow Over Isolation
author: Naughty Shinobi
title: “If you’re reading this, chances are it’s too late” Shadow Over Isolation is a First-Person Adventure Horror game INSPIRED by the storytelling style of H.P. Lovecraft and Visual Acuity & Artist Style of Stanley Kubrick. All without the stereotypical Haunted House gameplay saturating the adventure gaming market.

name: Selenon Rising - Episode 2
author: Fastermind Games
title: Episode 2 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Selenon Rising - Episode 3
author: Fastermind Games
title: Episode 3 continues the story of Selenon Rising.

name: Solitairica
author: Righteous Hammer Games
title: Solitairica takes RPG combat and challenging roguelike progression to a fresh new place—the world of solitaire! Using a variety of magical items and powerful spells, battle your way through a horde of ever-changing enemies and defeat the horrible Emperor Stuck.

name: The Vanishing of Ethan Carter Redux
author: The Astronauts

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - Zombies
Tiny Bridge: Ratventure
author: Estelion
title: This mind-bending game will challenge you to create complex structures to get your woodland creatures over vast chasms. In a bridge-builder first, you'll guide your creatures and construct your bridges in real time. Use the weight of various creatures to balance your structures as you build them.

name: Clicker Heroes
author: Playsaurus
title: Ever wondered what one quadrillion damage per second feels like? Wonder no more! Embark on your quest to attain it today!

name: Rolling Sun
author: Mystik'Art
title: Rolling Sun takes advantage of the latest version of CRYENGINE, with best in class physics, lighting and water effects. Discover ancient magic as you guide your Sun Stone through lost Incan and Mayan civilizations.

name: DARK SOULS™ III
author: FromSoftware, Inc.
title: Dark Souls continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. Prepare yourself and Embrace The Darkness!

name: Three Heroes
author: Cats Who Play
title: A magic world, epic heroes, bright graphics, excellent humor and absorbing gameplay – “Three Heroes”!

name: Sakura Clicker
author: Winged Cloud
title: The latest entry in the Sakura series is more action-packed than ever before! Sakura Clickers is a fast-paced, exciting adventure, full of content, in which you defeat your foes with the power of your mouse!

name: Brawlhalla
author: Blue Mammoth Games
title: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over fifty Legends.

name: Mitos.is: The Game
author: Freakinware Studios
title: The only one cell game with Guild Wars and Competitive Mode, Friends list with messenger, invites, guild chatroom and much more!

name: Dota 2 Player Profiles
author: Valve
title: Meet the players behind the biggest Dota2 tournament, The International. This series of interviews explores the lives of professional Dota 2 players from around the world, giving a glimpse of the sacrifice, dedication, and camaraderie needed to be among the best of the best.

name: Dota 2 Player Profiles: EG - Suma1L
title: From team EG, learn more about SumaiL

name: Dota 2 Player Profiles: Na'Vi - XBOCT
title: From team NAVI, learn more about XBOCT

name: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition – Remastered – blink-182 - “I Miss You”
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "I Miss You" by blink-182 on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Broken Armor
author: Jonathan Tindell
title: A knight exiled from his kingdom must find the holy grail if he is to return.

name: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition – Remastered – blink-182 - “Adam’s Song”
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "Adam’s Song" by blink-182 on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Glass Wing
author: From Soy Sauce LLC
title: The adventure of a young, scared, but smart girl.

name: The Agency of Anomalies: Mystic Hospital Collector's Edition
author: Orneon
title: Explore haunted military hospitals!

name: TS Marketplace: ÖBB Sgns Container Wagon Pack
author: Skyhook Games
title: The ÖBB Sgns Container Wagon Pack recreates the modern and versatile style of multimodal freight vehicles increasingly used across Europe. Each wagon is capable of accepting containers of various types and sizes. Their multimodal concept results in faster turnaround times and more flexible working arrangements for the hauliers.

name: TS Marketplace: DB Sgns Container Wagon Pack
author: Skyhook Games
title: The DB Sgns Container Wagon Pack recreates the modern and versatile style of multimodal freight vehicles increasingly used across Europe. Each wagon is capable of accepting containers of various types and sizes. Their multimodal concept results in faster turnaround times and more flexible working arrangements for the hauliers.

name: TS Marketplace: Gresley Coach Pack 04 Add-On
author: Matrix Trains
title: Gresley Coach Pack 04 for Train Simulator recreates different versions of the Gresley articulated dining coaches in Blood & Custard, BR Marron and LNER Teak liveries. Gresley Coach Pack 04 for Train Simulator includes the following coach types: Kitchen3rd Restaurant1st Restaurant

name: Rainbow Six Siege - Kapkan Assassin's Creed Skin
author: Ubisoft Montreal
title: The Kapkan Assassin’s Creed set is now available. Represent the Creed with Kapkan’s AC headgear and charm.

name: The Crew Calling All Units
author: Ivory Tower in collaboration with Ubisoft Reflections
title: Racers have been owning the place until today. Time to set the record straight in THE CREW® CALLING ALL UNITS, the latest expansion of the revolutionary MMO driving game The Crew®!

name: Double Fine Adventure: Ep01 - A Perfect Storm For Adventure
title: The launch of the Kickstarter campaign! We’ve said before that no one was expecting the Kickstarter to be so successful, and when things really took off we found ourselves scrambling to capture as much as possible.

name: Hero Boy
author: Crowned Daemon Studios
title: Hero Boy is a 2D horror/brawler set in the notebook of an 8 year old boy during a zombie outbreak. Fight through hordes of enemies, imaginary and real, to face your fears and protect your family!

name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 15
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules.

name: Multiscreens
author: Phylliida
title: A program in VR that lets you have as many virtual monitors as you want.

name: 69 Ways to Kill a Zombie
author: Wadup Games
title: Experience the innovative "LOCO" motion VR movement system to grind through hordes of physics-based zombies! Weapons? We give you over 60 tools to unleash Your creativity - guns, explosives, traps, swords, bows, spears! A true first peek into the future of VR movement.

name: Wave Magic VR
author: Overrun Games
title: Be a mage in virtual reality. Learn and cast powerful magic spells to fight off the golems, an army of mindless creatures left behind from the battles of the past. Fight with a variety of control schemes including: Vive Wands and Leap Motion.

name: Looterkings - ProGamer Skins
author: Looterkings
title: This is the Looterkings-Skin package called ironically "ProGamer-Pack", as it is a reference to three german Youtubers (Gronkh, Sarazar, SgtRumpel) who are not exactly known to be the best players. Also, they are the partners of Looterkings GmbH, the game-dev behind Looterkings.

name: Zombie Estate 2
author: Sad Spaghetti Entertainment
title: One of the highest rated Xbox Indie Games is now available for PC! How long can you survive in this online co-op wave based shooter? Featuring 35 characters, over 100 weapons, 30 stat-boosting hats, and 6 levels, Zombie Estate 2 is a frantically fun experience to share with friends!

name: ARK: Scorched Earth - Expansion Pack
author: Studio Wildcard
title: Stranded naked, parched and starving in a vast desert, even seasoned ARK survivors must use all their skills to stand a chance of survival. Tame, breed, and ride the desert’s mysterious new creatures including... DRAGONS!

name: Cursed West
author: GoeX GameS
title: Cursed West contains the spirit of Glories of the past, Holding aspects such as Difficulty and Mechanics. Adding more modern visuals in both, levels with traditional 2d gameplay, as in the 3d levels

name: HoCWar
author: HoCWar
title: Immerse yorself into the harsh world of ruthless card battles!

name: Reigns - OST
author: Nerial
title: The official soundtrack for Reigns with music by Mateo Lugo and Disasterpeace.

name: Reigns - Companion book
author: Nerial
title: This Book of Mystery will not answer many questions but it will be a companion for your journey through the age of Kings. The Devil is waiting.

name: Reigns - Songs of Reigns
author: Nerial
title: SONGS OF REIGNS is the semi-interactive soundtrack of the game Reigns. Put your headphones on and relax.

name: VR Gallery
author: HolmCom
title: VR Gallery enables you to explore your images in virtual reality, providing an immersive experience like no other.

name: Winter Novel - Screensaver
author: DeXP
title: Winter Novel based screensaver for your Windows!

name: Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat
author: RGCD.DEV
title: Developed in a top secret lab over the course of the past eighteen months, RGCD.DEV's Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat is a rhythm-synchronised, old-school, score-chasing arcade game that plays like some alien coin-op from another dimension.

name: Velocidevorium
author: Really Slick
title: The ultimate casual 3D snakelike with perpetually morphing claymation levels.

name: Reproduction Man
author: David Kilmer
title: Reproduction Man is a 2D puzzler where you help some very simple-minded sperm get to the egg. This cult classic of the Windows shareware era was brought back for its 20th anniversary with all-new graphics, animation and sound. Its outward cuteness belies some very tough puzzles.

name: Handsome Mr. Frog OST
author: Cowboy Color
title: The Handsome Mr. Frog Official Soundtrack by ZBWmusic

name: The Dwarvenaut
author: Raving Cyclops Studios
title: A dreamlike glimpse into the visionary mind of Brooklyn-based artist and entrepreneur Stefan Pokorny, a classically trained art prodigy obsessed with Dungeons and Dragons. Follow Pokormy as he attempts to bring his most sprawling, ambitious work yet to life through Kickstarter, where he has raised over $6.

name: Spaceman
author: Podium Pictures
title: From the exec producer of ‘Bull Durham’ and ‘White Men Can't Jump’ comes SPACEMAN, the mostly-true story of former all-star MLB pitcher Bill “Spaceman'” Lee. One of baseball’s all-time great eccentrics, Lee (Josh Duhamel) finds himself blackballed by the rest of the league for his outspoken politics and notoriously enthusiastic drug use,...

name: Gravity Shot
author: William Meadows
title: Sling shot explosive nuclear warheads into collision course with your planetary assassination targets. Using the gravitation of a planet against itself, while navigating your payload around asteroids, moons and even Black Holes for devastating effect!

name: Doorways: Holy Mountains of Flesh Demo
author: Saibot Studios
title: Doorways: Holy Mountains of Flesh is an Immersive Horror Adventure, featuring a Complex Story and Deep Atmosphere.

name: Kite
author: Lab Cat games
title: Fight to regain control of secret weapons base Arch City and rescue the scientists trapped inside. Overcome rogue defense systems and discover the corruption's source. Equip your Human Operated Remote Droid - H.O.R.D. - with technology reclaimed from battle and build the ultimate soldier.

name: 8-Bit Generation: The Commodore Wars
author: Junk Food
title: 8bit Generation is a labor of love, from people who love the 8bit era, for people who are passionate or simply curious about it.

name: Box Maze
author: GamersHype Productions
title: Jump into the life of Cubert, and help him reach his true love as you find your way through unique levels without being destroyed by your enemies as well as other obstacles, encounter new enemies and bosses as you climb the levels, collect cupcakes for your love along the way as you find hidden secrets.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Vikings Scenario Pack
author: Firaxis Games
title: Bring Europe under your rule as the mightiest Viking lord in the most detailed scenario released yet for Sid Meier’s Civilization VI. The Viking Scenario Pack also includes three new Natural Wonders and six new City-States, two of which grant new tile improvements.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Poland Civilization & Scenario Pack
author: Firaxis Games
title: Jadwiga rules Poland in Sid Meier's Civilization VI! Religious and expansionist, Poland can gain control of other civ's tiles when they fortify their borders, and Jadwiga makes Relics more valuable and Holy Sites more effective.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Australia Civilization & Scenario Pack
author: Firaxis Games
title: The Australia Civilization & Scenario Pack includes the Australian civilization with John Curtin, the Digger unique unit, Outback Station unique improvement, a new Natural Wonder and the new Outback Tycoon scenario.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Persia and Macedon Civilization & Scenario Pack
author: Firaxis Games
title: Alexander leads Macedon and Cyrus leads Persia in Sid Meier’s Civilization VI! Macedon’s abilities will let you conquer the whole world, and Persia can grow rich and cultured, or launch surprise invasions with incredible ease.

name: Stay! Stay! Democratic People's Republic of Korea!
author: DEVGRU-P
title: Try and navigate your way through one of the world's most tightly controlled dictatorships, with two cute soldiers by your side. Avoid getting shot, executed, black-bagged, or tried for treason as you explore Pyongyang's most famous tourist attractions.

name: Hue Defense
author: Brave Wolf Studio
title: With stylized graphics, Hue defense is a game based on real life events, when you are called to fight against the worst kind of enemy, the politicians and their supporters. Its time to defend the nation!

name: Fancy Skiing VR
author: 哈视奇科技
title: Fancy Skiing is developed by HashVR Studio built with the Unity Engine.The game's structure is based on real skiing that players use the handles just as ski poles to get power and lean left or right to control the direction, which brings players a strong immersion.

name: Off the Record: The Italian Affair Collector's Edition
author: Eipix Entertainment
title: Catch a ‘Foxy’ thief!

name: ChuSingura46+1 S - Chapter 4 & 5
author: インレ
title: The second DLC package from ChuSingura46+1 S which contains the last two chapter, b]Revenge blooms, settling old scores[/b] which is the story of Shimizu Ichigaku and the life of Suguha living in Edo. And we also have Of loyalty and heroism which is the story of Yatou Emoshichi.

name: Nakiti Generations
author: Diablohead
title: 2D action adventure game set in the far future on a mysterious abandoned planet with yourself as the only survivor.

name: SMILE GAME BUILDER Trial Version
author: SmileBoom Co.Ltd.
title: Great News!! We know you’re really excited to see the world of SMILE GAME BUILDER by yourself. There is a trial version available for you to experience the world of SMILE GAME BUILDER before the release date! So, HERE YOU GO!

name: Swordlord
author: Justin Varghese
title: Swing the sharp end of your pixelated weapon into your enemies! Use momentum, your body and your wits to slay your enemies!

name: 507研究所
author: SketchTech
title: Take out your compass to find the tombs hidden deeply in the forest,LinHai Snowland and Gobi desert by your knowledge.Guns are your best friends.The rile,shot gun,machine gun with different swords can help you to defend various of enemies.

name: Nightshade
author: Red Entertainment
