title: A romance visual novel game made in collaboration with D3P and Red Entertainment.Character design and illustrations are by the popular illustrator Teita. The romance revolves around Ninjas who have lived through the Sengoku Period. This game has published in 2016 as PS Vita in Japan.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Fantastic Maps: Pirates!
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Fantastic Maps: Pirate ShipHard a'starboard and cram on full sail! Chase down those scurvy dogs and send them to a watery grave.Jonathan Roberts, cartographer for Kobold Quarterly, Sunken Empires, and Adventures in the Hyborian Age, presents another Fantastic Map: "Pirate Ship".

name: Trickster VR
author: Superstatic
title: A procedurally generated fantasy adventure, starring floating islands, epic loot and a horde of orcs! Try your skills against orcish combat expertise, ancient magic and ragtag airships!

name: Sally's Law
author: Nanali Studios
title: Follow along with Sally, an extraordinarily lucky girl for whom nothing can stand in her way, as she journeys home to see her critically-ill father in this indie award-winning puzzle-platformer! Could Sally's luck be a mere coincidence?

name: Duckpocalypse
author: Capitola VR
title: In the future, intelligent robot ducks have become smarter than humans, they took our jobs, and took control of our world! You can't cope with being second in the food chain, so this is how your duck hunt starts.

name: Oh...Sir! The Insult Simulator
author: Vile Monarch
title: A Hilarious Insult-‘em up in which players must verbally take-out their friends and family in different game modes. Assemble witty insults using different word strings, and employ combos, criticals, continuations and more to battle your opponents both offline and online across multiple devices.

name: Avalon Legends Solitaire 2
author: Anawiki Games
title: Harness the power of the cards as you travel across Avalon through 300 meticulously crafted levels of engaging solitaire to collect the resources you need to restore the kingdom to glory.

name: Home - A VR Spacewalk
author: BBC Media Applications Technologies Limited
title: Home puts you at the center of the story, taking you on an emotional and personal journey while delivering beautiful, heart-stopping, and memorable moments.

name: Goblins and Grottos - Original Music
author: Psychic Software
title: This is the full original 13-song music soundtrack from the game.

name: Unbox
author: Prospect Games
title: Unbox: Newbie's Adventure is a 90s style 3D platformer about the ultimate postal service, self-delivering cardboard boxes! Unbox: Newbie's Adventure has giant worlds full of challenges, collectibles and boxy boss battles!

name: TS Marketplace: LMS P3 Coaches Pack 04 Add-On
author: Matrix Trains
title: The LMS P3 Coaches Pack 04 recreates variants of LMS coaches in use from 1933 (Design Period 3) as they appeared in LMS Maroon livery and British Railways Crimson & Cream livery. The LMS P3 Coaches Pack 04 includes the following variants: Brake FirstInspection SaloonKitchen

name: TS Marketplace: BR Porthole Coach Pack 01 Add-On
author: Matrix Trains
title: Built after the Second World War but predating the first British Railways designs, the LMS-styled ‘Porthole’ coaches are so named because of their distinctive circular toilet window designs. Features which provide a clue as to the type’s post-war build era include later-style ventilators and window vents.

name: TS Marketplace: BR Porthole Coach Pack 02 Add-On
author: Matrix Trains
title: Built after the Second World War but predating the first British Railways designs, the LMS-styled ‘Porthole’ coaches are so named because of their distinctive circular toilet window designs. Features which provide a clue as to the type’s post-war build era include later-style ventilators and window vents.

name: Aleph Null
author: Aleph=Null
title: Aleph Null is a story based platformer/puzzler for the HTC Vive. Engage in the story mode or Challenge yourself to 4 difficulty levels Beginner, Intermediate, Expert, and Master to reach the end in the quickest time possible. Charge your shots and manage ammo to improve yourself!

name: CrossWorlds: Escape
author: Another Reality
title: CrossWorlds: Escape is a hardcore game in which you will have to deploy all your skills to survive in a huge open world that is susceptible to changes in weather, seasons and various natural phenomena.

name: Last Year: The Nightmare
author: Elastic Games
title: Serial killers are chasing you as you try to escape from your high school. You play as one of The Teenagers on the run, or play as one of The Killers doing the hunting. Last Year: The Nightmare feels like surviving through a haunted house with your friends.

name: Offworld Trading Company - The Ceres Initiative DLC
author: Mohawk Games
title: Expand and exploit your way to Ceres to improve your fortunes. Use new buildings, technologies and resources in this new challenging environment for Offworld Trading Company.

name: Unaided: 1939
author: Drix Studios
title: Unaided: 1939 is a hardcore Top-Down shooter with stealth elements, set in the year 1939 before the start of World War II. Germany has not yet attacked Poland but tensions have already risen in central Europe.

name: Echoes of the Past: Kingdom of Despair Collector's Edition
author: Orneon
title: Escape the witch's kingdom!

name: Malavision: The Origin
author: Waraní Studios
title: A politician runs away upon sued corruption acts against him were proved. He gets in a private property located in the Paraguayan Chaco. As his assistant disappears, he decides to go into his quest. What is awaiting him to live has existed only in the imagination, myth and superstition.

name: Nanuleu
author: Selva Interactive
title: Nanuleu is a strategy game where you control a network of magical trees that protect the land from an invading dark force. Gather resources and grow trees to repel the invaders. Each tree has a different role to play in this battle to protect the land.

name: MoonQuest
author: Wizard Mode
title: A procedurally-generated adventure game! Explore unique worlds with wild forests, ice-capped mountains and ancient ruins. Talk to giant snails, seek out magical items, and forge the weapons that will help you on your journey!

name: World of Golf
author: Krazy Studios
title: World of Golf is a virtual reality game that allows you to play golf right at home. Grab your full set of clubs and play our 18 hole course without leaving your living room. With full swing physics you are in complete control of every shot.

name: NIGHTSTAR: STARFIGHTER
author: SOLIDMESH
title: This VR title is a unique room-scale third-person shooter. Control the Nightstar by moving your Motion Controller in space, shooting a vast variety of enemies, and avoiding obstacles and enemy fire. Play through 8 levels of non-stop action and immortalize your name on the global leaderboard!

name: Space Jones VR
author: VikingVRStudio
title: Space Jones is a FPS VR game. Story: At an era of human space colony expansion, a bounty hunter (the player) accidently picked up a mysterious treasure named “Star Box”. Therefore, the bounty hunter has been targeted by multiple space pirates. A major war will be triggered at any time.

name: Adventure Of Thieves
author: Binarystudio 54
title: Platformer Lovers !!! Dare to accept the challenge? Player vs Player addicted? Train your skills in single player and join in PvP arena.

name: Max, an Autistic Journey
author: Professional Imagination
title: Max, an Autistic Journey is a retro style top-down turn-based RPG filled with mini games, monsters and most of all, heart. Developed by a devoted dad who made a game with his son about his son's autism.

name: TANE DLC: GT GP9 2 Pack
author: N3V Games
title: The 2 pack comes with the GT GP9 Black and Blue livery. The session lets you jump straight in and drive the GT GP9 using 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.

name: Fate/EXTELLA
author: Marvelous Inc.
title: In the digital realm of SE.RA.PH, the Holy Grail War is over, but the land’s new ruler faces challenges and threats from all sides. The servants now find themselves drawing up tense and unlikely alliances, preparing for a conflict that may tear SE.RA.PH apart...or destroy it entirely.

name: Duck Force
author: Andreas Aust
title: Experience an amazing adventure in the rough stone age, where the bunny people under rule of a maniacal leader strives for the absolute power. Fly through dry deserts and rocky canyons full of challenges and evolve from a lame duck to a majestic flight artists.

name: Ship It
author: Think On Labs
title: Fast-paced block stacking VR fun in a playful factory setting. Pack a box with colorful shapes, then ship it to earn your wage. Filling VR boxes is physically satisfying as you grab blocks, rotate them with you hands, and smash them home.

name: Duck Force Demo
author: Andreas Aust
title: Experience an amazing adventure in the rough stone age, where the bunny people under rule of a maniacal leader strives for the absolute power. Fly through dry deserts and rocky canyons full of challenges and evolve from a lame duck to a majestic flight artists.

name: Airborne Empires
author: Stenkross Studios
title: Tabletop war gaming has come to life as a fully immersive VR experience! As the supreme leader of your own miniature army, you must use all your wits and cunning to outsmart your opponent on the battlefield.

name: Gal*Gun: Double Peace
author: INTI CREATES CO., LTD.
title: A rail shooter, with a difference, replacing bullets with pheromone shots, and enemies with giddy love-obsessed school girls. Every love letter and advancing kiss drains your energy! Repel them while upgrading your power ups and take part in outrageously lewd mini-games to find your true love!

name: Devastated
author: Mikkotheque
title: Devastated is a post-apocalyptic action adventure game with role-playing game elements. You take control of an experimental supersoldier, and are sent to huge wasteland with only one goal: find the man responsible for the apocalypse and enslavement of the survivors, and take him down.

name: One Day in London - Chapter 3
author: Owl Studio
title: The third chapter continues the story of the visual novel One Day in London. Find out what happens after the events in the Bethlehem hospital...

name: One Day in London - Chapter 4
author: Owl Studio
title: The long-awaited Fourth Chapter of the visual novel One Day in London! When the enemy seems to have already won, will Jeremy be able to continue to fight?

name: One Day in London - Chapter 5
author: Owl Studio
title: The final chapter of visual novel One Day in London! Trapped enemy is the most dangerous... It's time for extreme measures!

name: Retro Football Boss
author: 1888 Games
title: Retro Football Boss is a historical football management simulation featuring the English professional leagues from 1888 to 1998 (with German leagues coming soon). This is your chance to take a trip down memory lane or right the wrongs of the past.

name: ONRAID
author: Pragmatix Ltd
title: Onraid is a challenging 2D shooter game, where you are free to develop your own play style and tactics to destroy your enemies.

name: CHEXS
author: Turnopia
title: CHEXS is an evolution of chess, a new take on the old classic. It is a strategy game played on a hexagonal board where both sides move all of its pieces within a single turn, then all movements are solved simultaneusly.

name: Le Havre: The Inland Port
author: DIGIDICED
title: Build a prosperous port in Uwe Rosenberg’s award winning two-player board game!

name: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots
author: Robert Potter
title: VR Ultimate Paintball: Heartbreak, Regret & Paintbots focuses on an arcade style of gameplay. Containing four different game modes: wave based shooter, competitive target practice, challenging stage based trial map and an episodic story.

name: Fairy Maids
author: Spark Plug Games
title: Become the cleaning fairy!

name: Fantasy Grounds - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Volume 14
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules.

name: Thirst
author: RLTY CHK
title: A battle rages over the last of the worlds water. Your transport train is the only hope for thousands. Protect the train - Humanity's survival depends on it!

name: Moto Racer 4 - Season Pass
author: Artefacts Studio
title: In a world where freestyle and risk-taking dominate, impose your riding style all around the world. Impress your opponents and win races with class!

name: HVR Demo
author: Andre Le
title: HVR puts you inside of an armored suit and straps jetpacks to your hands that let you fly, dodge, and shoot in all directions! Live your dreams of being a superhero and take on a horde of enemy fighter jets that won’t give up without a fight.

name: Puzzling Rooms VR
author: Gordon Roberts
title: 12 Rooms filled with 48 Puzzles and Mysteries to solve Classic Logic Puzzles(Sokoban/Sudoku/Lights Out/Jigsaw/Sliding Tiles/Tangrams), Hidden Objects, Tower Defense, Physical Challenges

name: LooWarVR
author: CrystalGame
title: 《LooWarVR》 is a casual shooting game, Background, a boy went to his grandpa’s house in summer vocation, in the toilet he got many unexpected visitors- flies. So the battle began. we exaggeratory restored the battle filed just as we are in the toilet shooting the flies when we were young, to help players to remember their childhood .

name: TAIKER
author: Team 4U
title: TAIKER is a platformer RPG. Peggy and her robot assistant Chopy will explore various area. Obtain skills to beat enemy and solve puzzles.

name: MANIC MINERS
author: maddma
title: Welcome to "MANIC MINERS" - just imagine, "Lemmings" meets "Boulderdash" ... with TNTs, fuse bombs, lasers and flamers tossed-in-too! Deploy your Tiny Miners (TM) to collect, and safely return home, as many jewels as possible. But, be very, very, aware - there's a million ways to die daan there!

name: The Shape Of Heart
author: Dragon Whisper Game
title: Have you ever tried to save your lunch money in order to buy a game or comic book? After so many years, you have grown up, but your colorful life costs all your energies. The unlimited pressure makes you exhausted. Is there anything that could fulfill the void of your heart?

name: DodgeBall Blitz
author: C3 Games Inc
title: Lead your team to victory in this fast-paced, action, sports game! Use Power ups, and avoid attacks, as you fight to claim your glory! It's up to you to choose the team that suits you and your talents. Then hone your skills and master the techniques worthy to be called the best in the league!

name: SHINRAI - Broken Beyond Despair Soundtrack
author: Gosatsu Visual Novels
title: Complete soundtrack for the murder mystery visual novel SHINRAI - Broken Beyond Despair.

name: ikenie
author: Akumu Games
title: Embark on a journey into the unknown. ikenie is a 2D action-adventure/puzzle game for PC featuring challenging and unique mechanics, multiple paths, and original soundtrack in a dark themed world. Can you change your fate?

name: Galaxy Reavers: Titan DLC
author: Good Games
title: A paid DLC for “Galaxy Reavers”, allowing commanders to unlock the giant warship “Titan” and build up a more diverse and powerful fleet to challenge higher level stages!

name: Galaxy Reavers: Flames-type Aircraft Carrier DLC
author: Good Games
title: A pain DLC for “Galaxy Reavers” that unlocks the warship “Flames-type Aircraft Carrier” as well as the “Shadow IV” and “Lightning IV” tactical devices, which will bring commanders more tactical choices in game.

name: New York Mysteries: The Lantern of Souls
author: FIVE-BN GAMES
title: As a journalist, Laura James is again brought in to investigate a strange murder. What starts as a routine investigation quickly takes a dark turn. New York Mysteries: The Lantern of Souls is an adventurous hidden object game with puzzles and mini-games.

name: Cubway
author: Armnomads LLC
title: Cubway is a journey with an abstract story of lifecycle of rebirth, called Samsara. Guide the cube through the long way full of dangers and difficulties, visit many interesting and mysterious places.

name: Vanguard Princess Soundtrack and Artwork
author: Tomoaki Sugeno
title: This multimedia collection of art and music that is a must have for all Vanguard Princess fans! Listen to over 130 minutes of full-length music from all versions of Vanguard Princess. There's also a collection of hi-res and visually striking artwork comprised of production work, and game stages.

name: Graveyard Shift
author: Galavalomka Games
title: A cute and spooky FPS

name: The Last
author: Mateusz Kuliś
title: The Last is a survival game with a twist, Your main objective is to stay alive and making your camp bigger. The game focuses on the player camp and player made buildings, as a player you will be able to build plenty of different structures to suit your needs on this lonely island.

name: Gone In November Collector's Edition Content
author: Florastamine
title: Gone In November Collector's Edition Content includes: - Game's source code - Uunused contents - Behind-the-scene images

name: Hexoscope OST
author: Studio Binokle
title: The Hexoscope soundtrack composed by Dmitriy "Cyberworm" Vasilyev (high quality MP3).

name: Hexoscope Collector's Edition Content
author: Studio Binokle
title: The Hexoscope artwork: desktop wallpapers (PNG) and prints for T-shirts and cups (EPS).

name: Farm Life: Natures Adventure
author: BlockheadGames
title: Grow, Harvest, Nurture, Explore, Fish, Shop, Love, Mine and Events - Farm Life: Natures Adventure is full of everything from the small things like running your farm to becoming the town mayor and changing the town.

name: Mr. Massagy
author: Green Lava Studios
title: Use your dating skills to get a well-earned Massage through your gamepad controller! (Skills not included)

name: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition – Remastered – blink-182 - “The Rock Show”
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "The Rock Show" by blink-182 on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Wrath Of The Fire God
author: Gamaya Inc
title: Wrath of the Fire God is a fast-paced VR action shooter. Venture down into the realm of the Fire God using your archery skills to retrieve the 4 magical gems stolen from your village.

name: Pozzo Jello Crusade
author: GZ Storm
title: Developed by ToG, POZZO JELLO CRUSADE is the highly anticipated remake to the gruelling 2005 breakout hit. The unique old-school puzzle experience captivated imaginations of gamers worldwide with incredible challenge and intense emotional reward.

name: Base Raid
author: Sageose
title: Base Raid is a 2D base build and defence strategy game. In the game your goal is to build the best base to crush the enemy before it crushes you. You have a specific amount of in-game money to build your base and use it to fight against enemy bases.

name: The Hex
author: Daniel Mullins Games
title: In a creaky old tavern, in a forgotten corner of the video-game universe, a storm is raging. An anonymous caller suggests that there is a murder plot. Six video game protagonists are the only plausible suspects...

name: Stacks On Stacks (On Stacks)
author: Herringbone Games
title: Stacks On Stacks (On Stacks) is a zany 3D tower builder. Play as the Master Stacker, Rockit, who must use her psychic helmet to clean up the colorful bricks falling all over her madcap world.

name: The Last Sniper VR Demo
author: Robert Weaver
title: Travel back in time to WW2 and experience what it was like to fight as a soldier in room space Virtual Reality. The Last Sniper aims to simulate the sounds, visuals and feel of what it might have been like to be a soldier in a truly massive and horrifying war.

name: WWE 2K17
author: Visual Concepts
title: Now on PC! Welcome to Suplex City, courtesy of cover Superstar Brock Lesnar! WWE 2K17 returns as the reigning, defending, champion of fighting video games!

name: Little Red Lie
author: WZOGI
title: A contemporary adventure game about debt, family, and the truth about honesty.

name: 8-Bit Hordes - Soundtrack
author: Petroglyph
title: 8-Bit Hordes game soundtrack from renowned Command & Conquer composer, Frank Klepacki.

name: Long Gone Days
author: BURA
title: A modern-day RPG that imagines the world of war that's coming for us, with a focus on language barriers and the human cost of these conflicts.

name: Congo Merc
author: Dreamwalker Games
title: During the 1960s the newly independent Congo was the scene of constant warfare. Congo Merc puts you in the middle of that fighting with a task force of elite commandos. You conduct breakneck advances into the heart of enemy territory, seize critical objectives and, just as important, return to home base.

name: CURSE
author: Stormlord Games
title: CURSE is a point-and-click horror game that throws the player into the world of paranormal investigations.

name: Okhlos - Soundtrack
author: Coffee Powered Machine
title: The original soundtrack for Okhlos from A Shell in the Pit aka the best soundtrack in Ancient Greece!

name: D: The Game
author: WARP
title: Los Angeles, 1997. There has been a mass murder at a general hospital on the outskirts of downtown. Richter Harris has shut himself up in the hospital and taken hostages, leaving the police helpless and unable to move in.

name: Blade Ballet Soundtrack
author: DreamSail Games
title: Blade Ballet – a Dance of Destruction – a Serenade of Spin. The music for Blade Ballet is inspired by majestic dances and captivating rhythms from throughout history, and by the colorful, chaotic characters that populate this post-human battlefield. Lovingly created by Alec Galambos, DreamSail Games, and our cast of whirling bots.

name: Koi-Koi Japan : UKIYOE tours Vol.1
author: Zoo Corporation
title: Ukiyoe woodblock prints in Collection mode! "53 Stations of the Tokaido".

name: THOTH
author: Carlsen Games
title: THOTH is a challenging twin-stick shooter you can conquer alone or cooperatively with a friend. Each stage is handcrafted to test coordination and puzzle-solving skills. Colorful minimalist graphics combine with an intense unnerving soundtrack, making for an exciting mix of art and arcade.

name: Soccer Manager 2017
author: Soccer Manager Ltd
title: Soccer Manager 2017 - Play for Free, Compete for Real. The most diverse FREE 2 PLAY football management simulator in the world. Take on a top flight club and test your management skills against the best or help a struggling, lower division team fight for glory.

name: Dungeons & Darkness Demo
author: Yamiuchi Project
title: This is the DEMO version of Dungeons & Darkness.

name: Eventide 2: The Sorcerers Mirror
author: The House of Fables
title: Discover the magic of slavdom!

name: Big Bang Empire
author: Playata GmbH
title: Conquer the blue movie Olympus in this fun & kinky RPG. Collect ludicrous items, level up your stats and compete with other stars!

name: Re Angel
author: Studio GU
title: Re Angel is a 2nd visual novel created by Studio GU, an indy game developer from Thailand.

name: Yesterday Origins Demo
author: Pendulo Studios
title: John Yesterday becomes immortal following an occult ritual. However, not everything goes to plan. He and his girlfriend Pauline must embark on an investigation to try to reproduce the immortality ritual. But his former acquaintances have other plans for him...

name: Armor Clash VR
author: Windforce
title: Armor Clash VR is an RTS game of modern warfare. In the virtual reality environment, you can build a base, command units above the sky. You will find it is also fun to play an RTS game in VR.

name: Bloxiq VR
author: Blot Interactive
title: Manipulate blocks in 3D to connect four or more of the same color above, below, beside or even through. Conquer obstacles such as bombs, locks and hidden blocks in devilishly clever and addicting challenges. Bloxiq VR is the perfect combination of beauty and challenge. Prepare to be stumped!

name: Grim Seventh
author: Grimoire Games
title: Grim Seventh is a 3D Arcade Hack 'n' Slash game with a unique geometrical art style.

name: Konrad the Kitten - a virtual but real cat
author: FusionPlay
title: Immerse yourself in the virtual world of Konrad the Kitten and experience the first virtual cat that feels like a real one. Look after him daily and care for him as though he were a real furry friend. Satisfy his needs and desires, play mini-games full of action, and unlock more than 50 accessories!

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition - Remastered - Third Eye Blind - How's It Going To Be
author: Ubisoft - San Francisco
title: Play "How’s It Going To Be" by Third Eye Blind on any electric guitar or bass. This song includes a new Authentic Tone.

name: Dino Run DX OST & Supporter Pack
author: Pixeljam
title: The bone-pounding OST to your favorite pixelated prehistoric racer, plus wallpapers, icons, early design sketches, GIFs and other goodies.

name: Bolt Riley, A Reggae Adventure - Chapter 1 Soundtrack
author: Adventure Mob
title: This is the Soundtrack for Bolt Riley - A Reggae Adventure and includes all tracks in various formats, MP3, FLAC, and WAV. The wonderful soundtrack was composed by the talented Omri Lahav.

name: Citadel 1986
author: George Allan
title: The Citadel. Built in 1986 by a lunatic and left undiscovered, decomposing for 30 long years. You are its first victim.

name: Mars 2030
author: FMG Labs
title: MARS 2030 is a virtual reality simulation where players explore the Red Planet and make discoveries across 40 square kilometers of open Martian terrain, accurately-mapped and -modeled using NASA satellite data. Produced in collaboration with NASA.

name: Temple of the Apsara
author: Attraction Studios
title: Temple of the Apsara is a VR exploration adventure puzzle experience unlike any other for the HTC VIVE.From the breathtaking mountainside to the depths of the ancient ruins, Temple of the Apsara is a journey unlike any other you’ve ever been on.

name: NightmareZ
author: Anamik Majumdar
title: NightmareZ is a side-scrolling platform action game with multiple enemies, lots of fancy features and retro visuals. This is a retro styled platform and action game which will immerse you in a unique world full of good and evil demons.

name: Transmission
author: Cardboard Sword
title: In Transmission, you’re an overnight courier in an open world of chilled-out synthwave vibes. Think Euro Truck Simulator meets Jalopy on a rainy summer night in 1986 .

name: Pinga Ponga
author: Mustache Games
title: Pinga Ponga is a improved Pong game with many extras and different game modes.

name: A Matter of Murder
author: Worthing & Moncrieff
title: A Matter of Murder is a point-and-click puzzle game with rogue-like elements. The details of each murder are procedurally generated, so each case is different every time you play with progressively more challenging logic puzzles.

name: You Have 10 Seconds
author: tamationgames
title: You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade style platformer game with over 40 levels.

name: Punch Bomb
author: Chris Folea
title: DO YOU LIKE TO PUNCH THINGS?!Punch Bomb is a virtual reality arcade game where you punch things! Two fully playable game modes with more coming during Early Access!

name: Shiperoids
author: Frizzank
title: Shiperoids is a 2D space shooter inspired by the vector based arcade classics from the 80's. How long can you survive?

name: Eternal Destiny - The Salem Witches: Those who Devour Fear
author: Office 5656
title: Second DLC for Eternal Destiny, with a new story and dungeons for the newly released cards.

name: New Yankee in King Arthur's Court 2
author: Rionix
title: Return to the days of magic, maidens, goblins and gold to help an unwitting knight and his feisty wife find the Fountain of Living Water! Only those players who figure out the quickest way through each level will win the gold!

name: Modding Tool Add-on - Power & Revolution DLC
author: Eversim
title: With the Power & Revolution modding tool, you can create your own game scenarios (mods), share them with other players and play all shared mods. Since its release, the mod library already has more than 250 scenarios.

name: PostCollapse
author: Ambiera
title: PostCollapse is a survival simulation game set after the collapse of civilization. Gather items from the ruins, construct tools, grow your own food, go fishing and hunting. Single player only. No Zombies.

name: Fire Arrow Plus
author: Team Grybanser Fox
title: Fire Arrow and Fire Arrow X are time attack style shooters with a heavy emphasis on scoring. Otherwisely, you can call them coffee break shmups.

name: The Last Weekend
author: KEXBOY
title: «The Last Weekend» - This weekend you'll never forget.

name: The Last Weekend Demo
author: KEXBOY
title: This weekend you'll never forget.

name: Super Grav
author: DemonStudios
title: Super Grav is a retro gravity cave flyer for 1-4 players, featuring single player or co-op multiplayer missions, racing and dogfighting. Back by popular demand, Super Grav is the official sequel to the 1998 Net Yaroze coverdisc hit, Gravitation.

name: Evil Robots From N1M
author: Jake Conner
title: Play as a space-faring mercenary on a mission to a distant world in this side-scrolling action shooter.

name: Bumper
author: Artur Rezende
title: BUMPER is a casual game made on Blender Game Engine where the player must to destroy the vehicles as much as possible, trying not to get caught by the police, reach the checkpoints to get time and improve your weapons.

name: Baezult
author: Atapki
title: Baezult is a puzzle/action platformer set in a lost temple hidden for thousands of years behind a waterfall. You play as a brave explorer looking to find riches beyond his wildest dreams. But be careful, the people of the temple have protected their wealth very well.

name: The End o,,,o
author: xrrawva
title: Face the grim reaper at 3 frames per second.

name: Heroes of Issachar - Developer's Edition
author: Blue Mana
title: What is included in the Developer's Edition?Immediate access to development builds - all updates go here firstThis means getting access to everything, even features that get cut or modified from the game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack - Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Thailand
author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Night Vigil
author: Drew Radley
title: After a biological attack turns most of the people in Chicago to monsters it's up to you and your team of Extraordinaries to save the night!

author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack - Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Savanna
author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Gods and Nemesis: of Ghosts from Dragons
author: Chad Meffert
title: Bizarre lands! Fantasy! Chaos! You start off with the main chapter centered in the bizarre alien land as described in the book Gods and Nemesis: Leviathan Seed. Additional chapters will be added allowing you to advance your character.

name: SVRVIVE: The Deus Helix
author: Antler Interactive
title: A challenging mystery adventure game, ranked as one of the best HTC Vive games of 2017 (PC Advisor). With every mission comes entirely new worlds and puzzles. The story takes you through one of the longest VR games to date.

name: Heroes of Dire
author: Spellbook
title: In Heroes of Dire, a new massively-multiplayer tactical role-playing game by Spellbook, players command squads of fighters through strategic turn-based battles to win treasure, fame, and glory for their guilds!

name: In Celebration of Violence
author: Julian Edison
title: A fantasy action roguelike of exploration and murder. Live, kill, die, improve, live again.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Adventure Card Game - Definitive Edition
author: Antihero Studios
title: Build a deck of iconic heroes and challenge the forces of Sauron in this thrilling tactical card game. Travel through famous locations, complete story-driven quests and forge a new legend of Middle-earth on your own or with a friend in cooperative mode. But beware: the Eye of Sauron is searching for you.

name: The Banner Saga 3 - Soundtrack
author: Stoic
title: This package includes the Banner Saga 3 Soundtrack, composed, conducted and produced by Austin Wintory, performed by The London Studio Orchestra, recorded at Air Studios, London UK, and featuring soloists Taylor Davis, Malukah, Peter Hollens, Eivør, and more!

name: BattleTime
author: Foggybus
title: Take a role of a true general of a real army. Join the battle, capture enemies’ castles and raise the power of your army. Lead your clan to the victory!

name: Beachhead 2000
author: Digital Fusion Inc.
title: As a lone gunner you are the last line of defense against an overwhelming onslaught of enemy fire. Keep a steady aim and blast away at land, sea, and air forces as they rush you from every conceivable direction. Engage yourself in limitless levels of white-knuckle action, stunning photo realistic graphics and earth shaking sound effects.

name: Last Stitch Goodnight
author: Well Bred Rhino
title: Last Stitch Goodnight is a side scrolling action adventure that embraces a new mythology. After a near-death experience, you are kidnapped by a doctor who is experimenting on people who satisfy certain criteria. Escape will require new weapons, powers, and a strong stomach for bad science.
