name: Mibibli's Quest - Official Soundtrack
author: Resni
title: 51 track soundtrack for Mibibli's Quest, in MP3 format and with album art!

name: Dead by Daylight: The Last Breath Chapter
author: Behaviour Interactive Inc.
title: The Last Breath is the first Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It provides a glimpse of the effect of insanity in its purest and most violent form, as players gets to visit the asylum Crotus Prenn. You’ll also meet a new Killer, the Nurse, and the Survivor Nea Karlsson.

name: Super VR Trainer
author: Jorge Moreno Aguilera
title: Unleash your power shooting your opponents with your bow, deflecting blaster shots with your laser swords, surviving an infested hospital, being the king of basket or surfing with your hoverboard. Welcome to Super VR Trainer!

name: The Metronomicon - The Original Score
author: Puuba
title: It's mellow, it's cool, it's exciting, it's monstrous. The Metronomicon Original Score features 13 exclusive and original tracks from electronic artist J-Punch.

name: Spikit
author: Blastoid Entertainment
title: Spikit is a bullet hell game developed by a single developer, Igor Petrović. With a soundtrack composed by Dario Malešević. In this game, the player will have to dodge a constant barrage of spikes coming from the side of the screen.

name: RC-AirSim - RC Model Airplane Flight Simulator
author: Fabricated Reality Software
title: Learn to fly r/c model airplanes with this realistic flight simulator! RC-AirSim has been used successfully by many r/c pilots to learn how to fly a model airplane. RC-AirSim has more realistic flight dynamics and ground handling than most of the much more expensive r/c airplane flight sims.

name: HVR
author: Andre Le
title: HVR puts you inside of an armored suit and straps jetpacks to your hands that let you fly, dodge, and shoot in all directions! Live your dreams of being a superhero and take on a horde of enemy fighter jets that won’t give up without a fight.

name: Gebub's Adventure
author: John Wallie
title: Gebub finds himself in a large peaceful world, filled with colorful orbs and many creatures who need his help.

name: VRNinja
author: OutOfBounds Software Solutions Inc
title: VRNinja is a fast-paced virtual reality game that challenges players to dodge their way past flurries of deadly weapons as they train to become the ultimate ninja master. Set in the scenic landscapes and locales of Japan, VRNinja transports players into a fully immersive virtual world where quick reflexes and razor-sharp focus are...

name: Rollout
author: Ryan up in here
title: Rollout is a multiplayer "eat-to-grow" game set in a three(technically four)-dimensional world.

name: Blasting Agent: Ultimate Edition OST
author: Axol Studio, LLC
title: The Complete, Original Soundtrack to Blasting Agent: Ultimate Edition. Music composed by Kristian "Bunnymajs" Caldwell, with additional music by Fat Bard.

name: Clockwork
author: Gamesoft
title: Clockwork is a time-bending puzzle-platformer that tells the story of Atto, a lonely mechanical boy in the great city of Watchtower. Explore the city, discover its mysterious past, control time and fight terrifying boss battles. Clockwork features over 60+ hand-drawn, steampunk-inspired levels.

name: Save Jesus
author: Almighty Games
title: Someone is trying to murder Jesus. Disguised as Caesar with the Roman Empire by his side, an evil impostor from the future has set hundreds of deadly traps. Redirect the traps, kill the Romans and protect Jesus!

name: Erusal
author: Space Wedgie, LLC
title: Discover the secrets of the town of Erusal, escape a horrible maniac, and get spooked by this epistolary horror.

name: TO THE TOP
author: Electric Hat Games LLC.
title: VR Platforming Game, that gives you the freedom to move across the environment with superhuman abilities. Conquer over 35 levels with new obstacles and challenges. Compete for the fastest times or explore the environment. Experience the freedom of movement.

name: Northern Regime
author: Axel Anderson
title: Northern Regime: 1862 is a hardcore survival game set against the backdrop of the American Civil War in the frozen and frigid lands of Northern Dakota. It’s you vs. the environment and all its inherent dangers as you tackle Confederate soldiers, hostile wildlife, and the cold to stay alive.

name: One Night Two Crazies
author: chris_antoni
title: Enjoy a simple, fun, and occasionally frightening simulation. Fun for all ages provided you can handle the scares. No gore, no violence. Just girlish yells followed immediately by nervous laughter.

name: ThrounnelVR
author: Sunnyview
title: ThrounnelVR is a tetris-like puzzler with a first-person view. The goal of ThrounnelVR is to fit the shape of blocks into a distant hole. You control the movement of the blocks by your HMD, and the rotation by game controller or keyboard.

name: Abandoned Hospital VR
author: munsunghyun
title: You have to escape from this insane place. Oculus Rift required to play.

name: Assetto Corsa - Tripl3 Pack
author: Kunos Simulazioni
title: KUNOS Simulazioni and 505 Games are proud to present the "TRIPL3 PACK", the DLC package for ASSETTO CORSA that celebrates the launch of Assetto Corsa on console! The “TRIPL3 PACK” includes the iconic FERRARI FXX K, FERRARI 488 GTB and PRAGA R1!The CARS: Ferrari FXX KFerrari 488 GTBPraga R1

name: Mech Ace Combat Trainer
author: Area 1
title: Mech Ace's action combat gameplay, intuitive controls, and sci-fi atmosphere will completely immerse you within the game world.

name: GalaxIverse
author: Sub Orbital Software
title: GalaxIverse is a top down fast paced vertical blastathon, Battle Fleets and formations of aliens with the occasional boss thrown in for good luck.

name: Lost in Harmony
author: Digixart
title: The first game from DigixArt! Dive into a fantastic musical odyssey, brought by a wonderful soundtrack imagined by renowned composers.

name: Riding Club Championships
author: Artplant
title: Riding Club Championships is a horse riding game focusing on online competitions. Compete in show jumping, barrel racing, pole bending, agility and jump agility. You can play alone, against friends, in ranked games against random players, or in our weekly tournament. You can even create your own courses and share them with the world.

name: Kingdom: New Lands OST
author: Noio
title: The original Kingdom soundtrack plus 9 brand new tracks for New Lands, composed once again by the talented ToyTree.

name: God Simulator
author: Mateusz Kulis
title: God simulator is game wherein you are is god. In this game you are have your own world. You are can create animals and humans. You are can change your own world e.g. add trees, rocks, mountains and lakes. If you are want can make rain, fog, dust storm etc. In the game you are should take care of people.

name: Colony
author: Jamie Cunningham
title: Colony is a space exploration game where you fly around trying to colonize planets, battle alien races, collect resources, and save the human race!

name: Siralim 2 Soundtrack
author: Thylacine Studios
title: This soundtrack features all 23 songs found in Siralim 2 as 320kbps MP3 files.

name: Holos
author: Holos, Inc.
title: Holos is your own web-centric computing space in VR. It’s an all-in-one ecosystem designed to make you feel at home. Whether it's the comfort of having your favorite items around, or the power of easily getting to all of your favorite content, Holos makes you feel right at home in VR.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack - Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Da Vinci
author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: ROD: Revolt Of Defense
author: Rock Wale
title: Explore a random generated space. Find artifacts and treasure maps. Build and develop your base on a flying platform. Attack or defend against enemies and save the universe!

name: PROJECT XINATRA
author: DemonVideogames
title: PROJECT XINATRA is an action game inspired in the old classic arcade games. You will remember those classics games while you are killing hordes of enemies.

name: ZombLabs
author: PatchNoteStudio
title: ZombLabs is an action packed Horror-Survival FPS. Fight your way through an epic battle against endless waves of zombies. Get ready for a ridiculous amount of fun!

name: Soldiers Lost Forever (1914-1918)
author: Jake Olson
title: Soldiers Lost Forever (1914-1918) is a World War 1 top down 2D shooter where armies battle it out in the trenches and fight for control of the battlefield.

name: Signal Decay
author: Nela System
title: Assemble a cyber agent team to infiltrate procedurally-generated bases in this co-op stealth roguelike adventure. Master highly tactical combat, a cache of cyber weaponry, and teamwork to save humanity from mind-control.

name: Triple X Tycoon®
author: Joy-Toilet
title: Triple X Tycoon® is a simulation game in which the player explores the world of adult entertainment from the inside.

name: Domino VR
author: woutwoot
title: Domino VR is a new and simple VR game for the HTC Vive designed to let you experience that "nooooo, they're falling!" feeling all over again. You can build whatever you want in a fun sandbox environment.

name: AnimVR
author: NVRMIND
title: A powerful timeline, virtual cameras, audio recording, fading & editing - combined with frame by frame drawing, and advanced import and export capabilities, make AnimVR the most advanced and versatile VR animation software currently available. Plus it's lot's of fun to use!

name: Project Lounge
author: Aivaras Ivoškus
title: Project Lounge is a 3D social game that encourages people to socialize in enviroments full of interactable objects such as drawboards, vinyl players and even arcade machines!

name: Painted Legend
author: One Guy Studio
title: Imagine that one day, all the worlds that you have created on paper - live. Brave knights, fearsome dragons and terrible monsters, they all live on the page of your notebook.

name: Wheels of Aurelia
author: Santa Ragione
title: A narrative road trip game set in the roaring Italian 70s, it tells the story of Lella, a restless woman driving on the roads of the western coast of Italy, the famous “Via Aurelia”.

name: Fantasy Grounds - A05: Winterflower (5E)
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A 5th Edition compatible adventure for four to six PCs of Levels 4-5The annual Winterflower Festival & Dance is just around the corner! What originally started as a festival to honor the rare Winterflower has grown into an annual gathering for families, soldiers, and hunters to eat, drink, and dance the night away.

name: Flat Heroes
author: Parallel Circles
title: Dodge, jump, and dash your way through hundreds of terrifying geometric levels and epic bosses. Too tough? Bring your friends!

name: Nomad - Variety Skin Pack
author: Diminished Studios
title: Customize your character even further with the Variety Skin Pack!

name: A Tale of Caos: Overture - OST
author: ExperaGameStudio
title: An epic journey begins! Terry, a brilliant, messy girl, is beginning her greatest adventure, following her master, Albion McMaster, whose goals are quite dark and mysterious. With Heimlich, her mechanical owl and best friend, Terry will travel through amazing worlds and many unpredictable dangers!

name: Won't You Be My Laser?
author: Chequered Ink Ltd.
title: An 80s-themed puzzle game in which you avoid the line of sight of lethal gun turrets... while acquiring pick-up sticks.

name: The Lords of the Earth Flame: Original Soundtrack
author: Rhino Games
title: The Lords of the Earth Flame (TLotEF) Original Soundtrack by Alexander "Splinterfeel" Novikov features more than 20 minutes of music created exclusively for the game, fully remastered for this release and with all-new bonus material. MP3-format files will be placed in your TLotEF folder in the Steam Directory: ...

name: Meteor Crush VR
author: XIERRA Games
title: Protect our planet from incoming meteoroids! Use your VR controllers to crush every one coming your way.

name: Zup! X
author: Quiet River
title: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Smell of Death Demo
author: Alkame Games
title: Smell of Death is Horror FPS virtual reality game. The game consist of Story mode and Survival mode.In story mode you can explore the area with teleport.You should find magazines and keys.

name: Mini Z Racers Turbo
author: Coolegion Studios
title: Engage in a fantastic mini race in unexpected places. Choose your favorite ZRacer and fight your way through 16 tracks in 4 awesome worlds. Grab ZBags and unleash power-ups on your foes!

name: Escape Lizards
author: Egodystonic Studios
title: Escape Lizards is simple: Tilt the platforms to roll your lizard egg from the start point to the finishing bell at the end of the level. However, things are never as simple as they seem...

name: Beerman
author: Lee Davidson
title: Take charge of the caped deliverer and help Boston's finest foil The Society Of The Ninth over land, sea and air!

name: Crashday Redline Edition
author: Moonbyte
title: Crashday, the explosive cult classic multiplayer racer, is back! Retooled and remastered, Crashday: Redline Edition brings back the fun and memories of the original with this lovingly crafted tribute edition, featuring all-new and expanded features, including Steam Workshop support. Today is Crashday!

name: Handsome Mr. Frog
author: Cowboy Color
title: Jump, lick, and spit your way through four worlds in a new-school arcade adventure starring the nominal Handsome Mr. Frog, a good looking fellow whose hat was jacked by a bunch of unattractive normies.

name: Sceelix - Procedural Power
author: Sceelix
title: A powerful procedural engine. Generate parameterizable 3D scenes and game objects at design or run time using Sceelix's unique node-based language and integrate your creations directly into your game engine.

name: Okhlos - Encyclopedia
author: Coffee Powered Machine
title: The whole knowledge of all of Ancient Greece in one simple package.

name: Okhlos - Prototypes
author: Coffee Powered Machine
title: Six amazing, half-baked prototypes from the archives of Okhlos. Frenzied local multiplayer, stealthy mob-ness, side-scrolling mayhem and more!

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Deluxe Edition
author: Aeon Dream Studios
title: Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

name: BlackSmith HIT
author: ENTERi
title: BlackSmith HIT – Hit the iron when it is hot! And show who is the real blacksmith!

name: Dragon Knight
author: D.K Studio
title: This a rogue-like 2D ARPG with an amazing storyline. You act as Sue, along with the Dark Knight, slay dragons to get stronger in the process. You'll encounter many a man during your journey to invincible, some could be allies while other have a wish to kill. Group up with different NPC and tell the story of your own.

name: Bacon Tales - Between Pigs and Wolves
author: Uruca Game Studio
title: Bacon Tales is a 2D sideview tower defense game inspired by the famous tale “The Three Little Pigs”. Player must defend the Pig’s Village against the wolves. Choose a hero to help you on your journey and fortify the village to get it more resistant and able to gather more resources.

name: Aussie Sports VR 2016
author: Reload Labs
title: Aussie Sports VR 2016 invites you into Australia’s sporting community to meet the players, see the fans, feel the passion and be a spectator at major events of 2016. Explore Australia's favourite sports and play mini games: AFL, Basketball, Cricket, Football and Rugby.

name: Treasure of a Blizzard
author: Flaming Firefly
title: "Treasure of blizzard" is a fantasy themed visual novel inspiring with beautiful arts and interesting game characters. The fate of the protagonist completely depends on your choice. Probably your character may meet his partner in life; however he may also meet the end of his life.

name: Pan-Pan Soundtrack
author: Spelkraft
title: Like the embrace of a loved one, the Pan-Pan soundtrack envelops you in a 45 minute mix of other worldly sounds, synths and melodies.

name: Pan-Pan Manual
author: Spelkraft
title: Long for the bygone days of crinkly old game manuals? Perhaps you'd simply like to learn more about the world and Ada. Yearn no more with the Explorer's guide to Pan-Pan.

name: Kindred Spirits on the Roof Drama CD Vol.4
author: Liar-soft
title: This Kindred Spirits drama CD set culminates in this two-disc release featuring "Kyuusei Radio" and the original soundtrack from the game, "Kindred Spirits Pop Show." Along with the translated videos, the song lyric translations, voice clips, and wallpapers are all included in this pack!

name: $1 Ride
author: BeHappy Studios
title: $1 Ride is a casual game with a fast paced, timing and reflex testing game-play style. Travel through space at warp speed! Collect power ups to increase your speed or risk your fuel to collect money, missiles and more.

name: Strategy & Tactics: Dark Ages
author: HeroLabs
title: Dark Ages is a tactical digital board game set in the violent world of alternate Middle Ages. Vikings against war elephants, musketeers against the Mongol cavalry, ancient phalanx legions against crusaders; the deadliest armies in history clashing in bloody war.

name: GALER: Plague of Heroes
author: Graham Dodge
title: A new and innovative game combining the old school RPG's from yesteryear with the survival horror element in a zombie apocalypse. Travel the world in search of survivors while learning the truth behind the zombie outbreak. Does God actually exist? Or is something more sinister awaiting....

name: The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack
author: Bulkhead Interactive
title: 'The Turing Test - Upgrade Pack' contains three epic pieces of DLC for gamers who can't get enough of The Turing Test: The Official Art Book, The original pre-alpha prototype build and The Turing Test Original Soundtrack for your listening pleasure.

name: Draconic Order VR
author: Seek n Destroy Studios, LLC
title: The upcoming online world for the HTC Vive has a massive world to explore, with 4 playable races (Revenant, Human, Dwarf, Orc), You will need to explore and discover in order to rise above the rest. Check out DraconicOrderVR.com for more details of player classes, races, and world.

name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Super Pack 1
author: QLOC
title: Extand your experience with new exciting content! 2 new playable characters: Cabbe (with his Super Saiyan transformation) and Frost (Final Form) 1 new master: Hit 5 new attacks 3 new Parallel Quests 2 new costumes 5 Super Souls 2 emotes

name: Halloween H20
author: Miramax
title: Back…with a vengeance. Two decades after coming face-to-mask with Michael Myers, Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis) takes a final whack at one of horror's scariest mass murderers.

name: Cladun Returns: This Is Sengoku!
author: Nippon Ichi Software, Inc.
title: In the land of Arcanus Cella, the souls of the dead gather as they await reincarnation. However, some souls have unfinished business to resolve. Grant peace to these souls by traveling across feudal Japan and fighting your way through dungeons filled with monsters and traps!

name: My Lil' Donut
author: Isaac Cohen
title: Before you lies your Donut. You can pull and twist it, snap and swish it. You have a whole arsenal of settings, presets and tools to play with. You can freeze it, relax it, save any contortion to be viewed later. You can even rip it apart so it returns to the void from which it came.

name: Larry The Cable Guy: Health Inspector
author: Lionsgate
title: Larry the Cable Guy brings a truckload of one-liners to his role as a big-city health inspector whose easygoing life is upended when he's teamed with a straitlaced rookie partner.

name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Graveyard
author: Dragom
title: The Graveyard hides many secrets and many adventures. Build the world of the Undead the way you have always envisioned it! Mix Graveyard and Dungeon together to millions of new maps. You can even mix the Graveyard with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!

name: Boulder Dash Classic Remix World
author: BBG Entertainment GmbH
title: Celebrating the ENTIRE original 'Boulder Dash™' game from 1984! These levels have been Re-Mastered for today's 30th Anniversary edition, complete with Power-ups and Star ratings!

name: Boulder Dash The Bouldering Comp World
author: BBG Entertainment GmbH
title: Videogame legend Peter Liepa returns to the game he created 30 years ago with 20 of the most mind-bending, unique, diabolical, head-scratching and puzzling caves ever devised for Boulder Dash fans!

name: Valentino Rossi The Game Compact
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: Valentino Rossi The Game Compact enables you to choose all the official riders, teams and tracks in the 2016 MotoGP™ season.

name: Runbow Soundtrack
author: 13AM Games
title: Track Listings:Runbow OST 1 1. A Scroll in the Park 01:462. Tree's a Crowd 02:293. Tropical Ointment 02:564. Solitary? Who's Solitary? 02:415. It's Spooky Without You 02:546. Belly of the Beast 03:007. Let's Slow it Down 01:558. Mamma Loves Runbow 01:369. Two Feet and a Heartbeat 02:5010. Leaf It on the Dance Floor 02:3611.

name: Draft Day
author: Summit/Oddlot
title: It's NFL Draft Day and General Manager Sonny Weaver Jr. (Kevin Costner) faces the biggest decision of his life - the #1 pick. Will he pull off the draft of a lifetime or lose it all?

name: Fantasy Grounds - AAW Map Pack Collection IV
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: AAW Map Pack (Volume #4) contains 56 maps of various types and sizes.Inside you will find:- Maps of various residential buildings from rich palace to poor tent- Five wild forest maps and several forest shrines- Maps of different cavern lairs.- Three city maps.- Eight overland maps.- Two maps for city encounters.

name: Four Rooms
author: Miramax
title: It's Ted the Bellhop's (Tim Roth, Pulp Fiction) first night on the job...and the hotel's very unusual guests are about to place him in some outrageous predicaments.

name: Rise of the Tomb Raider 20 Year Celebration Pack
author: Crystal Dynamics
title: In the wake of her father’s death, Lara’s uncle challenges her ownership of Croft Manor. Lara must explore her childhood home in the new “Blood Ties” story mode. In “Lara’s Nightmare” hordes of the undead overrun Croft Manor, and Lara must defend it before the nightmare overwhelms her!

name: Stream Buddy
author: Stardale Studio
title: Enhance your online Twitch stream with Stream Buddy. Use Stream Buddy to provide mini games for your viewers, adding a new level of viewer interaction! Even more, our 3d avatar system allows you to use a Stream Buddy character without need of webcam, including voice to mouth movement!

name: Dirty 30
author: Lionsgate
title: On the eve of Kate's (Mamrie Hart) 30th birthday, friends Evie (Grace Helbig) and Charlie (Hannah Hart) offer to throw her a party. But the celebration quickly spirals out of control.

name: Let Them Come
author: Tuatara Games
title: Let Them Come is a fast paced pixel art shoot ‘em up. Twitchy trigger fingers and focused battle tactics are the order of the day as wave after wave of alien-like creatures try to take you down.

name: Antihero
author: Tim Conkling
title: Run a Thieves Guild in a gas-lit Victorian city! Antihero is a fast-paced digital board game with an (Oliver) Twist. Recruit street urchins, hire thugs, start a gang, upgrade your guild, steal everything... and bribe, blackmail, and assassinate your way to victory.

name: Galaxy Reavers: Cruiser DLC
author: Good Games
title: This is a free DLC of “Galaxy Reavers”, unlocking the middle warship Cruiser to upgrade your fleet!

name: The Crystal Nebula
author: Tristan Hodges
title: Fly your spaceship from wormhole to wormhole, navigating dangerous space station obstacle courses and collecting crystals from the wreckage of fallen enemies. The Crystal Nebula demands your highest dexterity and accuracy in order to shoot and dodge your way through its waves of opposition!

name: Glaive
author: Nest Egg Games, LLC
title: Battle monsters of the darkness with a kinetic blade! Intense combat and blade throwing action in adrenaline inducing VR! Skirmish through progressive levels of challenge and adversity to find ultimate victory or your fatal demise.

name: Anyland
author: Anyland + Manyland
title: Anyland is an open virtual reality universe to create your home, chat with others, explore & live in! Made from the ground up for VR, explorable via just PC & keyboard, and shaped by all of us together.

name: Always Higher Demo
author: AntiAnti
title: Always Higher is a single-player sci-fi adventure shooter VR game. Play as a secret agent, collect data modules, avoid enemy soldiers and escape underground facility!

name: Switch 'N' Shoot
author: Matt Glanville
title: Endless arcade action with just ONE button - Switch directions whenever you shoot!

name: Catyph: The Kunci Experiment Demo
author: Simon Says: Play!
title: This is the demo version of Catyph: The Kunci Experiment. You can play 1 region (Kynan and the Dome) in Normal mode. It will allow you to discover if you like this peculiar "retro" point&click adventure, and also check if the game is working well on your PC.

name: Runbow - Satura's Space Adventure
author: 13AM Games
title: Pick up Satura's Space Adventure and get 36 new Adventure levels, 13 new Multiplayer levels, 2 new costumes and 3 new songs!

name: Neon Exile
author: Mythical City Games
title: Build, climb, explore and fight back against a robotic threat in an open-world persistent MMO created from the ground up for VR.z

name: Warcube
author: craigz
title: Become the WARCUBE. Crush your enemies, siege castles, and bring glory to your six-sided self! These cubes were made for battle, not building.

name: Secrets of Me
author: Dogenzaka Lab
title: "Secrets of Me" is a game where, after getting plastic surgery, you can stalk a hot guy to get him to fall in love with you! If you're tired of typical otome games, then this one's for you!

name: Gakuen Club
author: OperaHouse Corporation
title: Gakuen Club is a school life love story that begins when you discover a secret at your academy, setting off a chain of events that you never imagined. Enjoy the different distinct and unique characters along with their own stories and wonderful voices.

name: The Charming Empire
author: OperaHouse Corporation
title: “The Charming Empire” is a dating simulation game set in the Taisho Roman era of Japanese history. Popular voice actors known for their talent in anime and video games bring our five main characters to life. Your ears will thank you to hear their performances across all the main scenarios.

name: UnReal World - Video greetings
author: Sami Maaranen (creator)
title: Video greetings from developers to thank You for supporting the game. Available for free for UnReal World Steam players. The package currently contains six videos, and more will follow in time.

name: Ghost Pursuit VR
author: Raf1Dev
title: Your goal: Escape to the ghosts and collect bonuses to destroy them! Be strategic and use the destructible environment to your advantage.

name: Eliosi's Hunt
author: TDZ Games
title: Lead Eliosi, a wanna-be bounty hunter, into making his dream come true in this hardcore top-down shooter and platformer.

name: Tribe Of Pok
author: Poking Water Games
title: Tribe Of Pok is a tribal survival strategy game featuring a deeply simulated environment. You manage a tribe of hunter-gatherers, helping them survive and thrive in a savage world.

name: ChuSingura46+1 S - Chapter 2 & 3
author: インレ
title: The second DLC package from ChuSingura46+1 S which contains chapter two, Edo radicals which is the story of Horibe Yasubee and her comrades in Edo. And we also have Harbinger of spring which is the story of Ohishi Chikara.

name: Carmageddon: Max Damage
author: Stainless Games Ltd
title: CARMAGEDDON: MAX DAMAGE is HERE! And it's the antidote to Racing Games.

name: King of Spin VR
author: Wicked Witch
title: Shane Warne King of Spin is a fun, pick up and play batting game for the HTC Vive where you can have a quick hit with your friends, or even simulate a full team in a one-day match innings, facing 50 overs at various difficulty from Shane Warne!

name: Pathologic 2
author: Ice-Pick Lodge
title: Pathologic 2 is a groundbreaking open-world horror RPG. Resist the plague. Make medicine. Heal people. Perform an autopsy. Trade to get what you need. Fight and kill if necessary. Survive. Struggle with an outbreak in a secluded rural town that is rapidly turning into hell.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Rolemaster Classic: Fantasy Weapons
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Rolemaster Classic: Fantasy WeaponsA Rolemaster Classic library module for Fantasy GroundsSixteen weapon attack tables for Rolemaster Classic and RMSS/FRP:

name: Fantasy Grounds - Rolemaster Classic: The Armoury
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Rolemaster Classic: Armoury ModA Rolemaster Classic library module for Fantasy GroundsGive your Hero an edge!Welcome to the Armory. The ICE armsmasters have selected over 50 new weapon attack tables for your combat enjoyment. So retire those old worn out weapons and take these new attack tables for a spin.

name: The Food Run
author: Battenberg Software
title: The Food Run is a colourful, classic puzzle game with a few tasty twists. The aim is simple - just eat everything you can see on the screen! Enjoy 64 unique puzzles across eight themes. Can you get three stars on them all?!

name: Super Rock Blasters!
author: QuadraTron Games
title: Ready up a space ship and destroy your friends in this frenetic multiplayer Asteroids reimagining! In Super Rock Blasters, up to 4 players will wheel around space rocks, dodge ricocheting bullets and blast each other into tiny neon colored giblets.

name: Apocalipsis
author: Punch Punk Games
title: Apocalipsis is a point-and-click adventure game, in the vain of Samorost and Machinarium, where all puzzles have a hidden meaning. With a unique artstyle inspired by 15th century engravings it tells a story about heartbreak, redemption and, quite literally, the end of the world.

name: Chapter Two: Time, Dreams and Underwater Travel
author: Deceptive Games Ltd.
title: Join Blithe and Aphonic on the continuation of this epic adventure through time. Here we find the duo travelling through time, meeting a host of unique characters.

name: Diamond Joyce and the Secrets of Crystal Cave
author: Rake in Grass
title: Diamond Joyce and the Secret of Crystal Cave is an action puzzle game with quest for long-lost treasures buried in pitch black caves, pyramids and temples of ancient civilizations.

name: Soundtrack for Divinia Chronicles or (Buy us coffee)
author: Team Monkey
title: This is the Original Soundtrack of Divinia Chronicles: Relics of Gan-Ti! The soundtrack currently features 24 tracks with more tracks being added as the game expands.

name: Punch! ViaCAD 2D/3D v9 - Tips, Tutorials, and Techniques eBook
author: Evolution Software
title: Do more with ViaCAD. The new Tips, Tutorials and Techniques eBook guides the way with 280 useful tips for new users and seasoned pros alike.

name: Maze Roller Demo
author: Meerkat Gaming
title: Meet Bernard. He enjoys long rolls along the beach and candlelit maps but what he loves most is cheese. Unfortunately, the cruel developers at Meerkat Gaming have placed his favorite treat at the end of a series of complex mazes and he needs your help to find it.

name: SaberSaw VR
author: James Oliver
title: Take the role of warrior controlling giant SaberSaws to defend yourself from waves of ever more challenging bots.

name: Broomball
author: Rushil Reddy
title: Experience the thrill of flying from the comfort of your broomstick. Blast enemies with fireballs and make your way across the field to score the winning goal!

name: Narcissu 10th Anniversary Anthology Project - Narcissu: Zero
author: stage-nana
title: This is a story about two kids growing up. About the wall between those leaving, and those left behind. It is about the origins of the Seventh Floor hospice. And finally, the origins of "the rules".

name: Tears Revolude
author: WorldWideSoftware
title: A classic command-based RPG with 3D map interface and smooth battle animation! A century ago, there was a unique artist named Orwiel. Sion and Michelle set off on a journey to discover his final works. The two meet a girl with no memories named Liara. What the girl carries will shake both the path they travel and their fate!

name: Woven
author: Alterego Games
title: Explore a woollen world where stuffed animals once lived in peace. Search for hidden secrets and customize your character with different animal shapes to solve puzzles. An epic adventure with two very unlikely heroes and a story narrated in rhyme.

name: Blockships
author: Dr Davient
title: The illegitimate love child of Space Invaders and Tetris. Blockships is a game about building a big bad ship and blasting your buddies’. A local multiplayer party game where you strike the balance between speed, firepower, and size. Build, blast, and rebuild your ship – all in the heat of battle.

name: Music Maker 2017 Steam Edition
author: MAGIX Software GmbH
title: With the Music Maker Steam Edition, making your own music has never been simpler. Produce your own songs easily on your PC using the mouse and keyboard. Start pumping feel good sounds through your speakers in just a few clicks!

name: Slavistan
author: Free Candy Games
title: Hello Comrades ! You think you got what it takes to be tru slav? Then we have game for you ! Prove to all your gopnik friends that you are the superior alpha slav your babushka always wanted you to be.

name: Along the Edge
author: Nova-box
title: Along the Edge is a visual novel set in the European countryside, where your choices impact the main character's personality and appearance.

name: Fables from the Den
author: Might and Delight
title: Take a peek beyond the hedges and delve deeper into the woods. Might and Delight invites you to join the woodland creatures in their den as they share tales and fables on life, love and everything in between.

name: Brick Stack VR
author: Andrew French
title: Surround yourself by three walls of falling bricks as you work as fast as you can to clear them.

name: Castle Invasion: Throne Out
author: Cat Trap Studios
title: Castle Invasion is the fun, frantic challenge of defending your castle against an army of misfits. Who better to lead the army than the king, a spoiled man child who wants everything he can’t have. Well...he's not taking this castle.

name: Fantasy Grounds - A08: Search For The Tri-Stone (PFRPG)
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A Pathfinder/3.5 Compatible Adventure for four to six PCs of levels 6-9When you are successful , your reputation will spread farther and more widely than you might imagine. And when that reputation reaches those who believe that “the enemy of my enemy is my firend,” you might just find yourself working with and for some interesting...

name: Pixel Puzzles 2: RADical ROACH
author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles 2: RADical ROACH is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game in a RADical style.

name: 39 Days to Mars
author: It's Anecdotal
title: Embark on the 19th century's most unreliable spaceship in this 2 player couch co-op adventure. 39 Days to Mars is a unique game designed to be played with a friend, where both players have important roles in the expedition. Solo players are aided by the computer-controlled ship's cat.

name: DreamBreak — Special Edition
author: Aist
title: Soviet Bloc Edition contains DreamBreak game with good Russian stuffs like:Original 19 track soundtrack recorded by Egor Gritsukov (.mp3 & .wav)Digital art book (.pdf)Pack of 5 WallpapersWalk-through (yeah good luck with that!) in Russian and 'English' (.pdf)

name: Elves Adventure
author: Patryk Taranek
title: Fate of the hero is in our hands, he is a stranger on new planet. He had occasion to return, but finally he stays and decides to help local people.

name: VoxVR Viewer
author: Broken Vector
title: VoxVR Viewer enables you to view your voxel models from a whole new perspective! You can import all common voxel file formats like .vox, .qb, and more from other voxel software like Magica Voxel, Qubicle or Voxelshop to explore them from within VR.

name: Chernobyl VR Project
author: The Farm 51 Group SA
title: Visit Chernobyl without leaving home! Chernobyl VR Project is a unique project by The Farm 51, as it combines video games with educational and movie narrative software. It is the very first virtual tour around the Chernobyl and Pripyat area, compatible with VR headsets.

name: Freemium Way
author: unbeGames
title: Freemium Way is an adventure game with tactical turn-based battles and sandbox elements. Find all pieces of the puzzle to identify why does Freemium come to the world of modern games and try to curb it.

name: Planet Nomads
author: Craneballs
title: There's a whole planet of diverse biomes waiting for you to explore. Gather enough materials to build a mobile base that will carry everything a Nomad needs on a journey through an unknown land.

name: Trap House OST
author: Hive Mind Studios
title: Enjoy the soundtrack of Trap House from the safety of your own home.

name: 3..2..1..Grenades!
author: Banyango
title: 3..2..1..Grenades! is a snowball fight with high explosives. Help save Grenades Co from the terrible monster it's unleashed in this LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ADVENTURE GAME. Save the day or battle it out by yourself with bots, or with up to 4 of your friends!

name: Russian VR Coasters
author: Funny Twins
title: Collection of Russian VR Coasters. Experience 4 types of different VR Coasters that will bring you new amazing impressions!

name: SHENZHEN I/O
author: Zachtronics
title: BUILD CIRCUITS. WRITE CODE. RTFM.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroes of High Fantasy: Creaking in the Dark (5E)
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: When an injured child collapses in the street, will you venture into the cellar he fled from to discover what hides, creaking in the dark?This variable difficulty module is designed to act as a single session encounter or as a side quest to your existing campaign.

name: Graveyard Smash
author: Four Mans Games L.L.C.
title: Graveyard Smash is a tongue in cheek, small, retro-style, skill-based action game in which you play the protagonist Manuel Rodriguez, the main groundskeeper of a local cemetery. Each night Manuel will run around on a randomly generated map using his shovel to smash the ever growing number of Undead back into the grave and prohibit the...

name: Happy Pong
author: Poppgames
title: SEIZURE WARNING! Happy Pong is a psychedelic arcade game with crazy visual effects. Your job is to destroy waves of campers in an onslaught of distortion. Whatever happens, you are in for one wild ride.

name: The Cold War Era
author: Alina Digital
title: The Cold War Era is strategy game based on the historical conflict between the USA and the USSR

name: Gangs of Space
author: Little Big MMO
title: Gangs of Space is a massively-multiplayer Rogue Shmup where Gangs of players compete for the conquest of the galaxy.

name: The Cooking Game
author: Play Spirit Limited
title: Start The Cooking Game, learn to cook, serve and manage your own restaurants. Show your skills and feed the hungry customers!

name: Starter Pack
author: Blam! Games LLC
title: The Starter Fighter Pack will give you everything you need to become the best in RoShamBo arena!

name: Battlerite
author: Stunlock Studios
title: BATTLERITE​ ​is​ ​an​ ​action-packed​ ​team​ ​arena​ ​brawler.​ ​Experience​ ​the​ ​unique​ ​combination​ ​of​ top-down​ ​shooter​ meets​ ​fast-paced​ ​fighting​ ​game and challenge ​friends​ ​and​ foes​ ​in​ ​a​ ​battle​ ​of reaction. The Arena awaits!

name: Detective Hayseed - Hollywood
author: Zima Software
title: The list of Oscar winners has been stolen as part of a nefarious plot to overturn the established Hollywood order. Our hero has to struggle through a series of tests and tasks in order to uncover the clues as to who has done it. And, of course, to stop him carrying out his threat.

name: Fractal Space | Soundtrack
author: Haze Games
title: Soundtrack of Fractal Space

name: Optika
author: PlayZilla.tk
title: Discover the world of light physics: play with lasers, prisms, mirrors, magnets and dozens of other optical devices. Explore the world of Optika with Prof. Opticus and his assistant, Sofia! Research and complete more than one hundred challenging puzzles!

name: Escape from Pleasure Planet
author: Up Multimedia
title: Escape from Pleasure Planet is a gay-themed science-fiction adventure game with bright colourful graphics, a fun story and character art by Joe Phillips.

name: Malazard: The Master of Magic
author: Invictus Games Ltd.
title: Unleash the magic inside you!Purify the demonic legion with a set of powerful abilities.The collapsing world relies upon you, experience what it means to control all Magic!

name: StarSmashers
author: Wayne Jackson
title: You are Captain Carter, of the Space Beagle. Ahead lies an army lead by the scumbag Kaldor Seth, he will obliterate all who oppose him in his pursuit of power. Carefully manage your ships weapons and defenses to bring your enemies to their knees!

name: Team Racing League
author: Gamious
title: In this unique 3 on 3 racegame, it's up to you and your teammates to finish before the opposing team does. Mastering the high quality vehicle handling, special abilities, and optimal Team Strategy are key to win the race.

name: Salvaged
author: Opposable Games
title: The human race explores the stars, but a keen focus on the future has left a trail of desolation in the past. You are Alex Pieterson, commander of the salvage ship Thaddeus and its team of hardened agents. You are a remnant of that past, fighting for survival in a huge new galaxy.

name: The God's Chain
author: CRASS Studios
title: Finally the day came when we found our GOD.Human Beings are an experiment done by them.The human beings are evolving and have become one of the greatest powers in the universe which is becoming a great problem for other colonies in the universe.So our god decides to end the experiment but now human beings will fight for their existence.

name: Hover Havoc
author: Canalside Studios
title: Grab 3 friends, 4 controllers and pick your craft... then battle, bump and bounce opponents into ‘hoverific’ submission! A fun fueled pickup 'n play party game; drift through a multitude of arenas in a blur of hover-fueled rampage!

name: NEO-NOW! Demo
author: ma_mutte
title: Explore wonderful worlds and battle Several creatures in search of his destiny

name: DYE
author: Bat Country Games, LLC
title: DYE is a challenging precision platformer where you help Hue rescue Pigments and defeat the nefarious Necrolights in order to restore color to the world! Jump, wall jump and float your way through 4 unique worlds with hundreds of challenges ranging from beginner to advanced level.

name: 911 Operator
author: Jutsu Games
title: Game about the difficult work of people that manage emergency lines and services. Answer incoming calls and react properly - give first aid instructions, advise, dispatch correct number of firemen / police / ambulances, or sometimes - just ignore the call. Play on ANY CITY in the world!

name: Duck Season
author: Stress Level Zero
title: The game of your dreams just dropped, DUCK SEASON, a hunter with ridiculous graphics. Luckily, it's summer vacation and Mom just surprised you with a one day rental of it! Unfortunately, as you binge play it becomes apparent that all is not right with Duck Season...

name: Fictorum
author: Scraping Bottom Games
title: Fictorum is an action RPG featuring destructible environments, a procedural node-based world map, and dynamic magic shaping.

name: INVASION!
author: Baobab Studios Inc.
title: Narrated by Ethan Hawke and created by the director of Madagascar, INVASION! is a colorful VR animated short about a duo of aliens with grand ambitions to take over our world. Instead, they are greeted by two adorable, white bunnies…..and you are one of them! Come experience what happens!

name: Heroes from the Past: Joan of Arc
author: Green Sauce Games
title: Save the day in this epic story of honor and courage

name: The Seeker
author: VisualTech48
title: Welcome to the Seeker! Run, hide and hack in this indie top-down game that gives a whole new meaning to the word "random!" Explore a virtually infinite number of levels as you avoid dangerous turrets, enemies and alarms. Find the exit to destroy the AI and avenge all of humanity!

name: Starship Disco
author: Solus Games, Inc.
title: Starship Disco™ is a music-driven rhythm shooter with user music imports. Blast aliens to the beat in VR with 1 or 2 hands with HTC Vive or Oculus Touch controllers.

name: Fall of Freya
author: GOTY LLC
title: Sci-Fi Survival Shooter created by a small indie team. Powered by the Unreal Engine 4.

name: Void
author: Pathless Games
title: Feel the inhuman tension of outer space - floating between bits of debris - struggling to conserve air and fuel - experiencing a hauntingly personal tragedy.

name: Hero Siege - Nethermancer (Skin)
author: Elias Viglione
title: The new Supporter skin for Pyromancer is here! Help us cover server costs and the further development of Hero Siege! We thank you for all your support!

name: Saving Harmony
author: Daniel Mercier
title: It is March 15, 1920 and the town of Nikolayevsk-on-Amur has been overrun by mad men killing and burning everything in sight. You are the last survivor of the Japanese expeditionary force in Siberia. You must fight to survive and in the end find a way to save Harmony.

name: Splash Blast Panic
author: Team KwaKwa
title: SPLASH BLAST PANIC is a multiplayer competitive party game where you must shoot, ram, dodge and overall bully your opponents outside the screen with a variety of watergun-based weaponry.

name: Elven Assassin
author: Wenkly Studio Sp. z o.o.
title: Take a bow and kill hordes of orcs in the epic town defense game. You can play alone to conquer the leaderboards or unite with other assassins in online co-op mode. PS. Be careful to avoid massive axes thrown at you by orc warriors.

name: Ice Caves of Europa
author: Io Normal
title: Ice Caves of Europa will challenge your reflexes and your mind, blending free-flowing precision flight with confronting science fiction ideas about the nature of humanity. An inquisitive flying robot exploring the hazardous caves beneath Europa stumbles upon a sinister interplanetary conspiracy.

name: Kisaragi no Hougyoku Demo
author: Waiting for you guys
title: Fujiwara Toru is a transfer student. At first glance he seems to be a generic, awkward teenager, but there is more to him than meets the eye. Sangu academy has a tradition called Ren. each year student choose a different grade partner, and all non partnered people are alone.

name: Ian's Eyes Demo
author: Sindie Games
title: First days at school are usually tough, but they can be even tougher if you’re helping a blind 8-year-old boy named Ian who doesn't know the terrifying dangers that lurk around in every hallway. You play as North, Ian’s lifelong canine companion. Can you help him escape alive?

name: A Detective's Novel
author: Amaterasu Software
title: On a cold November night in a desolate estate deep in the mountains an innocent life has prematurely perished and its up to the player to find out who did it.

name: The Life Of Greather
author: GreatherGames
title: You are just a simple farmer, your wife has not returned. Venture across this open medieval world and find her.

name: Patterna
author: Sebastian Schöner
title: Patterna is a logic puzzle game for people who think that HexCells is far too easy. It features a highly customizable random level generator, a level editor, more than 70 levels, and an enchanting minimalist soundtrack by Alex Cottrell.

name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Commercial License
author: Dragom
title: Virtual Battlemap Commercial License allows the purchaser royalty free commercial usage of maps and images exported from within Virtual Battlemap.

name: Turner - Soundtrack
author: Bean Boy Games
title: Get the iconic soundtrack for the video game "Turner" by Bean Boy Games. This 20 track soundtrack includes high quality versions of the songs heard in Turner, plus four bonus tracks. Created by Kevin Thomas. This soundtrack doesn't include the main menu song written by Dane Coburn.

name: Candy Smash VR
author: Wadup Games
title: Satisfy your hacking and slashing needs in colorful and mushy candy world. Experience the most fun you can have with VR and HTC Vive controllers smashing stuff!

name: Structure
author: Extent5
title: Mankind tried to colonize other worlds when natural resources of Earth had run out. In order to discover new planets and to make them habitable A.I. robots were sent deep into the outer space. However something caused a global system malfunction and the terraforming process was interrupted.

name: Basketball Court VR Demo
author: Chun Y.
title: Check out this quick demo if you are considering to purchase the full game.

name: Star Tactics
author: Devil's Dozen Games
title: Turn-based strategy game full of spacefleet battles. 30+ hours of gameplay, randomized battles, huge campaign with different ways of completion. Experience infinite tactical situations and outsmart the tricky AI using dozens of ships and special abilities.

name: Will of the Gods
author: Comrades Inc.
title: Will of the Gods is an arcade, strategy 1v1 game where players play as Gods, each trying to guide as many followers as they can to their temple, while punishing those who choose to follow the other God.

name: Detective Hank and the Golden Sneeze
author: Obsessive Science Games
title: When the Golden Sneeze is stolen from the Museum of Ancient History, it’s up to you, Detective Hank, to catch the thief. That will not be easy, as the culprit changes every new game. Puzzle your way through this steampunk themed, interactive whodunnit visual novel and bring the thief to justice!

name: Leviathan: The Last Day of the Decade - Art Assets
author: Lostwood
title: A free add-on for everyone who wants to build his (or her) own Leviathan game. This DLC comes with a complete set of graphic assets of Leviathan: the Last Day of the Decade.

name: Azulgar: Star Commanders
author: SZEINER
title: Azulgar: Star Commanders is a Sci-Fi open world sandbox game that puts you in a command of your own custom made space ship. Explore aftermath of the Azulgar event that reshaped the face of the solar system.

name: Personal Gold: An Underdog Story
title: The inspirational film of 4 women who become America's medal hope at the London Olympics when top men are banned during the Lance Armstrong drug scandal.

name: Curvatron Soundtrack
author: Brave Bunny
title: The full soundtrack for Curvatron. Each track by a different artist.

name: Red is Dead
author: Theodore Palser
title: Red is Dead is an intense action game with a randomized obstacle course containing over 120 levels. While playing this game you get an insane rush while being heavily amused. There are many physics in the game that you can interact with. Overcome insanely hard levels and beat your personal high score.

name: Dungeon Punks
author: Hyper Awesome Entertainment
title: Dungeon Punks is an old-school arcade beat-em-up, packed with new features like tag-team fighting gameplay and an RPG adventure! Nothing beats the thrill of freeze-blasting foes with a genie, as your dwarf tags in to incinerate them with bombs and napalm.

name: Frantic Freighter
author: Phr00t's Software
title: THIS GAME IS OPTIMIZED FOR VR*, BUT DOES NOT REQUIRE IT. Frantically attempt a delivery across space in a freighter. Unfortunately, your ship is constantly falling apart. Trade spare parts, find stashes & evade pirates along the way. Succeed to unlock challenges!

name: miniLAW: Ministry of Law
author: Lasso Games, LLC
title: Roam the dystopian future city of New Babel, Mankind's Last Hope, in search of crimes in progress. Use lethal weapons, non-lethal force, and diplomacy to take down bad guys.

name: Hurricane
author: Because I Can
title: Hurricane is a 3rd person multiplayer survival game in open fantasy world.

name: The Ember Series: A New Fire Demo
author: The Southern Gaming Syndicate
title: The Order, a powerful organization that has existed for over 3000 years, never interferes with the politics of the nations of Mörja. But everything is not as it seems because The Order has a dark secret. Four friends-- Jason, Sophie, Jerome, and Alex --must save their friend Derek but uncover a secret that could shake the very...

name: DUO Demo
author: NiVision
title: DUO is an arcade game designed from the ground up for virtual reality (for HTC VIVE). If you like bricks breaker games DUO is for you! Now you can immerse yourself in a virtual world with a classic retro game.

name: Marble Land
author: Devious Technologies
title: Marble Land is a physics-based VR puzzle game in which the objective is to guide a marble into a designated target area by using various contraptions scattered across the level.

name: Maraiyum: Rise of the Setting Sun
author: Humdrum Software LLC
title: The coup has finally come! After the disastrous rule of the previous Emperor, the Imperial army have placed you, a distant relative with no training, on the throne. With rebellions, religious insurgency, widespread famine, and a rapidly dwindling treasury, time is not on your side.

name: Super Star
author: Dream Works
title: You are a star agent in show biz as well as a fan of video games and animation as well. You have recently set up your own management company and are looking for someone with the talent. Although you have been trying hard, no one talented has been spotted yet. On night, you decided to play H-Game to cheer yourself up.

name: Dig 4 Destruction
author: COLOPL, Inc.
title: The first of its kind! A first for VR! An intense online multiplayer deathmatch game where you must dig through the earth and excavate weapons to battle your enemies! *Coming Soon to the Oculus Touch!

name: White Noise 2
author: Milkstone Studios
title: Enjoy a 4vs1 asymmetric horror experience like no other. Be a part of the investigator team, or take control of the creature and devour them!

name: Hospitalize
author: Illeris
title: Find the most effective way to construct and manage a hospital. Build your hospital smart and avoid excess time and resources consumed by examining your patients unnecessary. You can choose to micromanage your patients or hope that your doctors are able to identify the cause of their symptoms.

name: Roomscale Tower
author: DuplicatorStudio
title: Roomscale Tower is a photogrammetric experience built for the HTC Vive. Become a knight of the Middle Ages and leave in search of wealth through towers filled with traps. Fight skeleton's army in intense survival mode. Climb mountains, catch piglets, throw knifes or relax at the tavern.

name: Four Last Things
author: Joe Richardson
title: Four Last Things is a point-and-click adventure game made from Renaissance-era paintings and public domain recordings of classical music. It is about sin, and the Four Last Things – Death, Judgement, Heaven and Hell – and strives to be intelligent and ridiculous in equal measures.

name: Zombie Camp
author: Void Dimensions
title: Zombie Camp is a room-scale VR shooter! Experience 360 degree virtual reality shooting in a desperate attempt to protect your campsite from crazed ZOMBIES!!

name: Color Syndrome - Soundtrack
author: Thrill Pill Games
title: The soundtrack of Color Syndrome game. Background ambient music.

name: Take the Cake
author: Ebenit
title: Take back Frank’s stolen cake from evil robots by navigating neon-lit worlds filled with puzzles, obstacles, and electronic music.

name: SpaceEngine - Uranus System HD
author: Vladimir Romanyuk
title: This DLC for SpaceEngine improves the texture quality of Uranus and its satellites.

name: SpaceEngine - Neptune System HD
author: Vladimir Romanyuk
title: This DLC for SpaceEngine improves the texture quality of Neptune and its satellites.

name: Emergence Fractal Universe ᵠ
author: 17th Dimension
title: Fractal Explorer and editor for VR

name: Fist of Physics
author: Midas Touch Game
title: Punch a robot in the face! Robots are running wild in San Francisco. Fight through multiple rounds against different opponents to save the city. Fist of Physics uses Midas’ VR physics to let players literally reach out and touch their opponent. Every response and movement looks real.

name: Simple VR Video Player
author: simplevr.pro
title: Watch your videos in virtual reality with Simple VR Video Player, an easy to use video player with full motion control support and an intuitive interface. Simple VR Video Player can play your saved video files with 2D/180°/360° and 3D/SBS/OU support.

name: TANE DLC: The Flying Scotsman 1920s
author: N3V Games
title: The passenger run takes you on a massive 125 mile drive down the ECML from Edinburgh through to Newcastle while driving the world famous Flying Scotsman from the 1920s.

name: Breached - Bonus Content
author: Drama Drifters
title: Digital artbook, a prequel comic, wallpapers and fictional news pack.

name: Mahjong Deluxe 2: Astral Planes
author: EnsenaSoft
title: Mahjong Deluxe 2: Astral Planes is an out-of-this-world Mahjong game produced by award-winning game developer EnsenaSoft, challenging you to complete increasingly complex mahjong puzzles rendered in glorious 3D.

name: Puppy Dog: Jigsaw Puzzles
author: EnsenaSoft
title: Puppy Dog: Jigsaw Puzzles is the perfect game to dog lovers and jigsaw puzzle game enthusiasts. The game includes 84 challenging jigsaw puzzles with beautiful pictures of irresistible cute puppies.

name: Star Realms - Fleets and Fortresses
author: White Wizard Games
title: This expansion contains 12 cards that you can use in online play, versus the AI or a friend, or in the 8th Chapter of the campaign.

name: WyVRn
author: Studio Asterism
title: Fly and crawl through levels on a mythical beast, killing dudes with magic (and dragon stuff).

name: Glider Island
author: Joey Sipos
title: Experience the adrenaline of hang gliding in VR! Compete for the high score to win Monthly Prizes. Collect all hoops placed around each island before time is up. Use your rocket boosters to keep from falling from the sky and avoid the dangers tossed your way!

name: Gazzel Quest, The Five Magic Stones
author: DemonVideogames
title: Gazzel is the bravest warrior of the armies of Pharaoh. So tired of war, he decides to finish a life full of struggle and death. But Pharaoh, furious with the decision of leaving by his best warrior, kidnaps his beloved Salama and orders to be imprisoned behind the Asorom door. Asorom's door is sealed with the five sacred locks.

name: Wildlife VR
author: Rocket Science Club
title: A virtual reality hunting game, where you can shoot ducks, a deer, a boar, cans and TVs.

name: Time Gap
author: Absolutist Ltd.
title: Only you can solve the secret of sudden disappearance of the mankind. Time Gap — New Hidden Object Game!

name: Alteric - Soundtracks
author: Audio Insurgency
title: This is Original Soundtrack of Alteric game. Composed by Audio Insurgency from Toronto, CA.

name: Ayumi: Enhanced Edition
author: Lord Rutsah
title: A space horror adventure, featuring Lovecraftian Yellow themes.

name: Urlaubsflug Simulator – Holiday Flight Simulator
author: Caipirinha Games
title: Without doubt flying virtual aircraft from your PC is one of the most interesting simulations – at the same time, it is one with a very steep learning curve. Holiday Flight Simulator, though, makes it especially easy to relive the last holiday trip from the cockpit’s view.

name: Epic Flail
author: Noxus Limited
title: Epic Flail is a fast paced 2D brawler with a gladiator theme that mimics the action packed fighting scenes from Japanese anime. Epic Flail has the player trapped in the arena, fighting through different modes and defeating other arena legends and even the gods themselves.

name: Firefight
author: Sean O'Connor
title: Firefight is a World War II real-time simulation game similar in style to the old Close Combat series but brought up to date with better AI, individual soldier modelling, a faster frame rate to give more intense and realistic combat and an easy to use command interface.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: Connecticut Add-On
author: Chris Bell - Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: Connecticut for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: Massachusetts Add-On
author: Chris Bell - Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: Massachusetts for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: Pennsylvania Add-On
author: Chris Bell - Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: Pennsylvania for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: Rhode Island Add-On
author: Chris Bell - Creative Design Studios
title: Night Environment: Rhode Island for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Pilatus PC-9/A Add-On
author: Iris Flight Simulation Software
title: Developed by IRIS from the Royal Australian Air Force’s PC-9/A pilot manual, the Pilatus PC-9/A for FSX: Steam Edition offers a wealth of realistic detail along with accurate flight dynamics and systems operation.

name: TS Marketplace: Sherman Hill Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
author: High Iron Simulations
title: Sherman Hill Scenario Pack 01 – featuring 10 highly realistic career scenarios – brings to life challenging contemporary freight railroading on one of America’s busiest and most famous railroad routes – Union Pacific’s Sherman Hill.

name: Train Simulator: North London & Goblin Lines Add-On
author: Dovetail Games
title: Stretching across North and East London, the Gospel Oak to Barking Line – affectionately known as the ‘GOBLIN’ – has grown into a major part of the extensive London Overground network; a network which has specialised in re-vitalising neglected routes throughout the Capital, converting them into railways which are fit to serve a modern-day

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 402 '2-HAL' EMU Add-On
author: Dovetail Games
title: The Southern Railway’s 2-HAL, a once-classic on the commuter scene, makes a comeback in this detailed add-on for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: GWR 7800 'Manor' Class Loco Add-On
author: Just Trains
title: Climb aboard classic steam power with Just Trains’ GWR 7800 ‘Manor’ Class.

name: TS Marketplace: Köln Koblenz Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
author: Skyhook Games
title: Köln– Koblenz Scenario Pack 01 includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Köln - Koblenz route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this scenic part of the West Rhine.Take the controls of Sgns Hopper Pack, Rnoos Hopper Pack and Sgns Container Pack to haul passengers and freight on regular train services along the line...

name: TS Marketplace: Metronom Scenario Pack Add-On
author: Trains & Drivers
title: Metronom Scenario Pack includes 10 challenging and enjoyable scenarios for the Hamburg-Hanover Route on Steam, covering passenger operations in this commuter route.

name: Weather Lord: Legendary Hero Collector's Edition
author: Yustas Games Studio
title: Call upon the gods of Olympus to help you rescue your beloved before all hope is gone! Unfolding with the scope of an epic fantasy adventure, Weather Lord: Legendary Hero – Collector's Edition will capture your imagination even as it draws you into hours of compelling gameplay!

name: FSX Steam Edition: Final Approach Add-On
author: TakeFlight Interactive
title: Are you ready to fly real approaches in fully-loaded airliners? Learn what it feels like to make the decision to continue the approach or go missed. Do you have what it takes to get your passengers to their destination when Mother Nature gets in the way?

name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna C152 II Add-On
author: Carenado
title: Found in flight schools around the world, the classic Cessna 152 has landed on FSX: Steam Edition.More than 7,500 C152s have been produced, with various options and modifications being introduced by the factory and added by owners over the years. The C152 II variant includes an enhanced standard avionics and navigation package.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna C172N Skyhawk II Add-On
author: Carenado
title: Said to be the most successful training aircraft ever produced, the Cessna 172 Skyhawk first entered production in 1958, since when more than 40,000 have been built. The ‘N’ model was introduced in 1977 and featured an upgraded engine, with additional options such as air conditioning and larger fuel tanks becoming available before the...

name: CS:GO Player Profiles: Fer - SK Gaming
title: From team SK Gaming, learn more about Fer

name: CS:GO Player Profiles: Dupreeh - Astralis
title: From team Astralis, learn more about Dupreeh

name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna 182 Skylane RG II Add-On
author: Carenado
title: The Cessna 182 Skylane is an American four-seat, single-engined light airplane, built by Cessna. First brought to market in 1956 as a tricycle gear variant of the 180, one year later the Cessna 182A was introduced, the first to carry the Skylane name.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna® 182Q Skylane® II Add-On
author: Carenado
title: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Cessna® 182Q Skylane® II is a detailed and highly accurate aircraft. This 182Q comes in nine paint schemes across three liveries, multiple different aircraft models and features an accurate virtual cockpit with realistic instruments, superb exterior modelling and exacting...

name: Red vs. Blue: Volume 12

Pariahs are in the habit of asking favors no one can't refuse, and you might become one of those unfortunates. Dive into a brand-new storyline involving pirates, sabotage and gang wars.

Find the best way to survive, but be careful, since each wrong step will ensure your demise. The environment is your main enemy.

Fresh.

You can slow down time, reverse it or bring it to a halt. Explore the scene, unlock the story's branch points and unravel the mystery.

Collect resources, build up and defend your base, amass your army of orcs or humans and ultimately crush your opponents!

In Red Chains, the characters must travel to the city of Marg, home base of the Crimson Slavers who terrorize much of the continent. Their quest is simple: Rescue the son of an important chieftain from the clutches of Marg’s slavers.

name: Galactic Civilizations III - Lost Treasures DLC

name: The Making of Grim Fandango Remastered: Developing the Game

name: Kikoriki

Engines up to 120 horsepower can be fitted, giving this light-sport/ultralight aircraft a possible cruising speed of 133mph (214km/h) and a...

name: FSX Steam Edition: YMML Melbourne International Airport Add-On
author: Orbx

This is the third version of YMML, which includes the most recent infrastructure changes at Melbourne including the Terminal 4 building and Pier G, transport hub and approach road plus the control tower.

name: FSX Steam Edition: Night Environment: California Add-On

name: Orc Hunter VR Demo
