author: IMCGAMES Co.,Ltd.
title: [IMPORTANT]- This is a Beginner's Pack for Tree of Savior which is Free to Play.- You may only use this DLC product on servers located in the EU region. Please make sure you are purchasing a product for your region.- You do not need to purchase this in order to play the game as the game is Free to Play.

name: Demetrios - The BIG Cynical Adventure Demo
author: COWCAT
title: Demetrios is a full-length adventure game packed with cynical humor. 8 to 12 hours of fun!

name: Ortus Regni
author: Jon Sudbury Games
title: Ortus Regni is a new and novel card game inspired by the late Anglo-Saxon period of English history. The Late Anglo-Saxon era in English history is a time of warring Earls. Minor kings all, they claim whatever lands they can. All the while, the Vikings roam not just the sea, but the land.

name: Crusader Kings II: Full Plate Metal
author: Paradox Development Studio
title: Outfit your dynasty with the power to rock! Due to popular demand, a new pack of metal music is now available for Crusader Kings II. From Tobias Gustavsson, composer of “Viking Metal” and “Guns, Drums and Steel”, five completely original compositions have been created to add intensity to your Crusader Kings experience, with inspirations...

name: Bloons TD Battles - Club Starter Pack
author: Ninja Kiwi
title: The Club Starter Pack contains: * Unlimited Club Access (which also grants a permanent 2x medallions on all future purchases). * 5000 Medallions. * A Large Energy Potion (50 energy). * 5 exclusive decals to show off on the battlefield (Angry, Smile, Nuked, Super Monkey, LOL).

name: Duke Grabowski, Mighty Swashbuckler
author: Venture Moon Industries
title: Duke Grabowski: Mighty Swashbuckler is a classic point-and-click adventure, created with love by an indie team that includes LucasArts alumni, Bill Tiller (The Curse of Monkey Island, Steven Spielberg's The Dig, Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine).

name: Istrolid - Paint Job
author: treeform
title: A lot of players have asked how they can support the game, so we’re releasing our first pack of cosmetic features for players who want to show their love for the game, and help with our rising server costs! For $10 you get all these cool decals that you can add anywhere on top of armor or batteries on your ship.

name: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience
author: Steelehouse VR Studios
title: Rexodus: A VR Story Experience is based on the Dark Horse Graphic Novel Rexodus. This is a VR narrative experience set in a universe where dinosaurs didn't go extinct, they left Earth. Those dinosaurs, utilizing their own advanced technology, are traversing the galaxy.

name: .EXE
author: Two Man Army Games, L.L.C
title: .EXE is a platformer/rogue-lite game set inside the very computer you once had. Moto, a rogue emoticon is about to be replaced when a new upgrade is downloaded and as a result, he is set to be deleted.

name: Greedy Guns
author: Tio Atum
title: Inspired by classic shooters like Gunstar Heroes, Metal Slug, and Contra, Greedy Guns brings the run-and-gun formula into the 21st Century! Help these greedy mercenaries survive their most epic contract yet. Explore, explode, survive!

name: K Station
author: Maya Games
title: It's New Year's Day, 2319, and the happy denizens of K Station are disappearing, one at a time. You are Maya, a lab assistant, trying to find a way out as she weaves her way through the altered lives of the friends and colleagues that remain.

name: Rocket Ski Racing
author: nocanwin
title: Hold the line as your booster rocket pushes you to increasingly insane speeds after every lap in this high speed, unforgiving, 3rd person racer! Watch out for blocks of ice and the edge of the track or you'll explode into a scattered pile of parts. Drift off the fast line and an opponent will edge their way to 1st!

name: Stories: The Path Of Destinies Original Soundtrack
author: Spearhead Games
title: Enjoy the original soundtrack of Stories: The Path of Destinies, written and performed by Vibe Avenue.

name: Stories: The Path Of Destinies Artbook
author: Spearhead Games
title: The official Art Book of Stories: The Path of Destinies

name: URSA
author: HellconX™ Games
title: This DLC is a character costume, and has a dual attack.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: To Worlds Unknown
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A New Universe of Adventure AwaitsTo Worlds Unknown is an adventure for 2nd to 5th-level characters which can be played as a standalone adventure or as the first main chapter in the Legendary Planet Adventure Path, bringing your heroes into the midst of a battle beyond the stars for supremacy over myriad alien worlds and alien cultures.

name: In Case of Emergency, Release Raptor
author: Arcen Games, LLC
title: A passion project that never found its footing. But we thought the (very) early pieces of the game were cool, so we wanted you to have it for free. Run around, be a raptor, and kill robots!

name: Dolphin Defense - Soundtrack
title: This is the soundtrack for Dolphin Defense. It contains 29 tracks including 3 with Cyber Diva.

name: CODE OF PRINCESS - Original Soundtrack
author: Studio Saizensen
title: Composer Ace brings you these exciting tunes from Code of Princess! It includes character theme songs, stage and boss background music, with 34 tracks in all!

name: AFL Evolution Demo
author: Wicked Witch
title: AFL Evolution - FanHub BETA is a player creator for AFL Evolution, coming 2017

name: FSX Steam Edition: F-105D Thunderchief Add-On
author: Virtavia
title: The Republic F-105 Thunderchief, first flown in 1955 and often known as "Thud" by its pilots, was a rugged and reliable multi-role fighter with an emphasis on low-altitude, high-speed penetration strikes with a single nuclear bomb.

name: FSX Steam Edition: C-17 Globemaster III Add-On
author: Virtavia
title: The C-17 Globemaster III™ is a high-wing, 4-engine, T-tailed military-transport aircraft used by the US Air Force and its allies. The multi-service C-17™ can carry large equipment, supplies and troops directly to small airfields in harsh terrain anywhere in the world day or night.

name: Pan-Pan
author: Spelkraft
title: Pan-Pan is an open plain adventure that expands on the concept of environmental narrative storytelling with puzzle solving and exploration elements at its core.

name: Moonshot Galaxy™
author: Liftoff Labs
title: Planetary challenges in exotic branches of the galaxy!

name: Romopolis
author: Lonely Troops
title: Construct an idyllic ancient Roman city with plenty of houses and keep your residents happy by providing all the services they need. You'll be rewarded with money, fame and honor. You can work your way to the top in the comprehensive campaign mode or you can create and play your own custom scenarios.

name: Melody
author: Verge of Brilliance LLC
title: Melody currently features one of the most expressive instruments in VR. From resonance sensitivity to 4 track audio recording, this experience pushes the boundaries on what we expect from performance / composition in VR.

name: Don't Drop the Bass
author: RadishBox
title: Cooperate with friends and keep the bass in the air for as long as possible or compete to become the bass emperor in this local multiplayer game.

name: Natural Selection 2 - Shadow Fade
author: Unknown Worlds Entertainment
title: The Shadow Fade is a terrifying new variant of the sinister Kharaa Fade.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Call of Cthulhu: Secrets of San Francisco
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A 1920s Sourcebook for the City by the BaySECRETS OF SAN FRANCISCO provides excellent background for a Call of Cthulhu campaign set in the Bay Area of the 1920s. It includes urban geography, civic history, research venues, and mythos lore.

name: Osozaki 遅咲き Late Blooming - First
author: Kurisu no Patto
title: Late Blooming is a romantic comedy about drama and tragedy set in Thais, a quiet little town lost in the world. You will have to play the role of the protagonist, an ordinary young man whose life has given him a second chance.

name: Leave The Nest
author: Kaio Interactive
title: A high octane, high flying, fast dodging, gentle gliding, quick ducking, manic swooping (and occasionally crashing) game that redefines the word addictive.

name: Axe, Bow & Staff: The Soundtrack
author: Clewcat Games
title: Axe, Bow & Staff: The Soundtrack by Kazuhiko Naruse (a.k.a. naruto). Enjoy 1 hour and 10 minutes of chiptunes as 320kbp/s MP3 files in the game folder on your computer: 01 Title 02 Axe Theme 03 Bow Theme 04 Staff Theme 05 Cave 06 Rat Boss 07 Goblin Base 08 Goblin Boss 09 Valley 10 Skeleton Boss 11 Elevator 12 Castle 13 Axe Theme...

name: Versus Squad
author: DiezelPower
title: Versus Squad is a fast action twin-stick shooter from the creator of Nation Red. Build your own sandbox defense and battle thousands of zombie mutants in top down combat! Face up to a dozen bosses. Simultaneously. Collect loot, build and repair. Play single player, on-line or local coop!

name: Urban Pirate
author: Baby Duka
title: The original petty crime simulator. A flammable mix of turn-based survival and action-packed mini-games.

name: Best of Us Demo
author: Hosted Games
title: It's the dawn of superpowers! Grab a cape and stand among the first heroes—or become the first villain!

name: Space Jammers
author: Spread Shot Studios LLC
title: Space Jammers is a 1-4 player Sci-Fi rogue-ish top-down shooter. Guide an alien rock band of space kitten pirates through a fractured multi-verse. Fly starfighters, board space ships and loot local populations to fund your musical tour.

name: I and Me Original Soundtrack
author: Wish Fang
title: I and Me Original Soundtrack

name: Nine Parchments
author: Frozenbyte
title: Nine Parchments is a co-operative blast'em up game of magic mayhem from Frozenbyte, creators of the Trine series!

name: Grandpa's Table
author: Kivano
title: Relaxing logic game with beautiful 3d graphics and more than one hundred and fifty levels!

name: UNO Demo
author: Ubisoft Entertainment
title: UNO makes its return with new exciting features! Match cards by color or value and play action cards to change things up. Race against others to empty your hand before everyone else in Classic play or customize your experience with House Rules.

name: moto RKD dash
author: rkd.zone
title: Timeless arcade racing action from the future of our past! Moto RKD Dash revives old electromechanical toys like 'Tomy Turnin' Turbo Dashboard' Driving and 'Sega Moto Champ'. Ten levels, simple arcade gameplay, extremely fast 3D graphics at 60FPS, a bonus game and amazing soundtrack by Kliment and approxima astrolabos!

name: Infinity Wars - Wealthy Noble's Lock Box
author: Lightmare Studios
title: Unlock the Secrets of the Wealthy Noble's Lock Box.

name: Subterrain - Original Soundtrack
author: Pixellore
title: Subterrain - Original Soundtrack includes soundtracks that are used in the game and the trailers.

name: Spangled Wrastor
author: Dan Fornace
title: A Promotional Color for Wrastor. This color features a Red, White and Blue Wrastor with Stars and Stripes effects and an American Flag Taunt.

name: Panda Maypul
author: Dan Fornace
title: A Promotional Color for Maypul. This color comes with a Cherry Blossom version of Lily and Panda style colors for Maypul.

name: Demolish & Build 2017
author: Noble Muffins
title: Become a boss of Demolition & Build company. Destroy small wooden huts and huge concrete buildings. Manage your workers. Invest earned cash in your own land properties and rent them for profit in open sandbox world. Use various hand tools, buy new machines and customize their parts.

name: Battlezone 98 Redux - The Red Odyssey
author: Big Boat Interactive
title: With war escalating in the wide reaches of space, the Americans take to Jupiter and its moons in pursuit of the Russians and powerful technology. On the previously quiet satellite of Ganymede, the US forces discover an unexpected threat, with the power to carve its own place in history...

name: Antiflux
author: UAA Software
title: Antiflux is a challenging but fun puzzle platformer with upgrades, building complexity over time.

name: Mini's Magic World - Soundtrack
author: Magory.net
title: Soundtrack for Mini's Magic World composed by Tomasz Kucza

name: She Remembered Caterpillars
author: jumpsuit entertainment UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
title: A fungipunk fantasy about love, loss, and holding on, told in the format of a color-based puzzle game. A tale as the bond between parent and child, this lush and bewildering title will have players testing their wits against a variety of challenges, all beautiful and very strange.

name: Mecha Ritz: Steel Rondo OST
author: HEY
title: The Mecha Ritz: Steel Rondo Soundtrack is a collection of the 36 original tracks from the one-person developer, and all recorded with a FM Synthesizer to perfectly emulate the retro aesthetic. Songs will be places in your Mecha Ritz: Steel Rondo folder in the Steam Directory: ..Steam SteamApps common Mecha Ritz Steel Rondo Soundtrack

name: WarFire
author: D&K Games Studio
title: Your Mission is to kill all enemies

name: Seven: Enhanced Edition
author: IMGN.PRO
title: Seven: Enhanced Edition is an open-world, isometric stealth and action role-playing game, in which you play as Teriel, a master thief sent on a mission that will shake the foundations of the Vetrall Empire. Includes the Drowned Past expansion.

name: Funklift
author: Mostly Harmless Games
title: Wreck your friends in a wild race for logistical glory! Deliver the most items before time runs out in the ultimate forklifting party experience. Reinventing musical party games as we know them. Who will become the champion of the storage?

name: Funklift Demo
author: Mostly Harmless Games
title: Wreck your friends in a wild race for logistical glory! Deliver the most items before time runs out in the ultimate forklifting party experience. Reinventing musical party games as we know them. Who will become the champion of the storage?

name: Evangeline™
author: Raconteur Games
title: Evangeline™ is a short first person experience (FPX) where color guides you through the world. At the end, you have to ask yourself one simple question: If you could make one last call to a loved one, what would you say?

name: Revolution 60: Special Edition
author: Giant Spacekat
title: The Revolution 60 Special Edition DLC adds additional scenes that weren't available in the original release.

name: Defend your Crypt: Soundtrack + Extras
author: Ratalaika Games S.L.
title: This additional content includes the original soundtrack of the game and some extra materials like, wallpapers for PC/mobile device and some images for your social profiles

name: Rocketbirds 2 Evolution
author: Ratloop Asia
title: The original Coq of War returns in a glorious explosion of finger-licking fun; with enhanced controls, new upgrade systems, a full single player campaign in “Part 1: The Cockup” with full VO and OST - and a 1- 4 player campaign in “Part 2: The Rescue” with procedurally generated maps.

name: UNO
author: Ubisoft Entertainment
title: UNO makes its return with new exciting features! Match cards by color or value and play action cards to change things up. Race against others to empty your hand before everyone else in Classic play or customize your experience with House Rules.

name: March of the Living - Soundtrack
author: Benedict Nichols
title: Original Soundtrack to March of the Living composed by Benedict Nichols.

name: DEMIAN
author: Studio Goindol
title: After being accused of stealing military secrets, Dr. Demian escapes from custody and expose corruption within the military; but he's pursued by a strike force that operates an experimental robot that he developed.

name: Break Ups
author: Goindol
title: A young, feuding couple who, through the power of time travel, realize how strong their relationship really is.

name: Event[0]
author: Ocelot Society
title: Event[0] is a sci-fi narrative exploration game where you build a relationship with a lonely spaceship computer to get home to Earth.

name: Tribal Pass
author: Tribe Tea
title: A genre-twisting tactical runner where you maneuver, fight, think, sacrifice and evolve – all ON THE RUN.

name: Winged Sakura: Demon Civil War
author: WINGED SAKURA GAMES
title: Incarnated into a world of demons, you find yourself caught up in a middle of a demon civil war. Form contracts with demons and aid the Rebellions to take back what's rightfully theirs in this beautifully illustrated turn-based RPG!

name: Matris
author: Leaghorn
title: Matris is an easy to play but challenging logic puzzle game for everyone - casual and hardcore gamers.Relax in Puzzle Mode or fight for the High Score in Combo Mode and Time Attack. Play custom levels or create your own thanks to Level Editor.

name: Where's My Helmet?
author: Mega Boss Game Studio
title: A challenging platform style game combined with aesthetic elements of the Nordic culture and doses of humor are the charming elements that make "Where's my Helmet?" a must-have title in the Steam library of all gamers.

name: RollerGirls From Beyond
author: Stonepunk Studios
title: RollerGirls from Beyond brings side scroller action into VR. Skate, Jump, Ride and Stomp your way to save the Cows of the planet Bovina from Dr Creepy and his Alien Army.

name: PlayClaw 5 - Chroma Key for overlays
title: The Chroma Key extension for the PlayClaw overlays composites captured gameplay video with a real time overlay render based on color hue (chroma range). In other words, "Green Screen".

name: Barony Extended Soundtrack by Chris Kukla
author: Turning Wheel LLC
title: The complete soundtrack of Barony, composed by the talented Chris Kukla. This soundtrack contains over two hours of original in-game music in mp3 format.

name: In The Shadows
author: Colorspace Studio
title: In The Shadows is a puzzle platformer where lights scare away shadows monsters that transform into everyday objects you can use to your own advantage. Confront your fears, solve puzzles, find secrets!

name: Disney Movies VR
author: Walt Disney Studios
title: Transport yourself into the wonderful world of Disney from your very own living room with Disney Movies VR. This app is a fully-immersive Disney experience where you can visit themed worlds, including Disney, Marvel, and Lucasfilm, and interact with some of your favorite characters in their natural environments.

name: John Wick
author: Lionsgate
title: When sadistic thugs attack John Wick (Keanu Reeves) - a brilliantly lethal ex-assassin - he hunts them down with the skill and ruthlessness that made him an underworld legend.

name: Mercenary Action Figure
author: Leadwerks Software
title: This high-quality character, designed exclusively for Leadwerks Game Engine, includes high-res 4096x4096 textures, an assault rifle, and a prefab set up to work with the Leadwerks soldierAI script. Drop him into your game, set his team to "good" or "bad", and watch him fight!

name: Monsters' Den: Godfall
author: Monstrum
title: The popular dungeon-crawling RPG series returns! Take your party into procedurally-generated dungeons, fight in turn-based battles, loot and level up! Explore the land and uncover the mysteries of the Godfall!

name: Super Mega Neo Pug
author: SnowFlame
title: Turbo Pug is back! and this time, he's airborne! Fly through deserts, green fields and more stunning environments. Dodge an onslaught of enemies and go head to head with giant bosses! Unlock new costumes for Turbo Pug and new creatures to play as. Please try not to squish your pug!

name: Heart&Slash Soundtrack
author: AHEARTFULOFGAMES
title: Like the music in the game? With the Heart&Slash soundtrack DLC you can listen to the amazing tracks by Michael Chait whenever you please!

name: The Escape DLC
author: Kamil Szczepanik
title: Story of the Survivor: The Escape is short story about escaping from prison in zombie apocalypse world. If You think that would be easy then come and try! Think up a plan to escape and find out what obstacles will be waiting for you!

name: Linelight
author: My Dog Zorro
title: Linelight is an elegant puzzle game set in a world of lines.

name: Evolution
author: North Star Digital Studios
title: Predators lurk, food is scarce, you must adapt - or go extinct. Evolve your species to survive and dominate as you explore the campaign or go head-to-head with the skill-based matchmaker.

name: Genital Jousting
author: Free Lives
title: Genital Jousting tells the story of "John", a penis who needs to find a date for his high school reunion. Genital Jousting is also an online and local multiplayer party game about flaccid penises and wiggly anuses for up to eight players at once.

name: Fantasy Grounds - 5E: Champion's Rest
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A 5E Compatible Adventure for 4-6 PCs of Levels 2-3. The Loi’Tok burial mound of the Vikmordere was abandoned long ago. The party is hired by the mayor of the local town to locate some soldiers who went missing after entering Loi’Tok.

name: Atulos Online - Reaper & Orc
author: Parallaxian Pty Ltd
title: Atulos Online - Reaper & Orc is a paid expansion of Atulos Online, the free to play medieval MMORPG.

name: Space Codex
author: takk
title: Space Codex is a casual retro arcade minimal awesome top-down shooter featuring waves of enemy spaceships with different attacks in what is, literally, a bullet hell. To beat them, you will have power-up options available through the map. The game only gets harder. How long can you stay alive?

name: Paradox Paradigm
author: Josh
title: Warp space & time in this creative new puzzle-platformer genre.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Wild Thing - PFRPG
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: A Pathfinder/3.5 Compatible Adventure for four PCs of levels 5-7. The PCs are hired by the Black Gold Consortium to track down passengers of the Wasp, a ship which has wrecked somewhere in the Vast Swamp. One passenger in particular interests the consortium more than any other: a woman named Sandalia.

name: hackmud
author: Drizzly Bear
title: hackmud is a text-based multiplayer hacking simulator for Intel-compatible personal home computers. Crack protected systems and solve puzzles as you explore the abandoned internet of the future. Write scripts to protect your winnings and trick other players. Lose everything. Get it back.

name: Fantasy Grounds - The Sinking: Complete Serial - PFRPG
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Welcome to The Sinking, a campaign serial designed for use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.This book contains twenty adventures set in the Great City. The adventures are tied to one single catastrophic event, a giant sinkhole opening in the very hearth of the Great City.

name: Legend of Miro
author: VisualPath
title: Legend of Miro is a storytelling RPG, that will put life into a different perspective. It is a story that will make you reconsider what is important in life and how much the simple things are worth for us.

name: NEKOPALIVE
author: NEKO WORKs
title: The catgirls of La Soleil takes to the stage and steps into the spotlight with their very own live concert. Dancing, singing, MIX'ing and purring, this is the NEKOPARA event that comes right home to you, and you got the best seat in the house! No idol can compare to a catgirl, nyaaa~

name: RefRain - prism memories - ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK
author: RebRank
title: Turn up the bass and enjoy these upbeat electronic tunes composed by Ryu-Lighter.

name: SnarfQuest Tales, Episode 1: The Beginning
author: Cellbloc Studios
title: In this point-and-click adventure game from the mind of Larry Elmore, you play as Snarf, a Zeetvah from Zeetville on an epic quest for fame and fortune. (Mostly fortune.) Can you help Snarf earn the gold, help the woman, and win his place on the throne?

name: Just Bones
author: Elephant Games
title: Just Bones is a platformer inspired by old-school pixel art and gameplay. After a powerful experiment, a mage is reduced to a skeleton of his former self. Join Bones as he puzzles his way through rich environments to collect special tools, recover his body parts and restore his human appearance.

name: Spellgear
author: SkyRiver Studios
title: Non-target action role-playing game, with MOBA and MOBA-style arenas, an open world to explore and relax, a fresh and unique combat system, and many other exciting features.

name: 1917 - The Alien Invasion DX
author: Andrade Games
title: 1917 - The Alien Invasions is a bullet hell memorization shooter. Dr. Brunhild Stahlmüller upgrades an WW1 Triplane with superior alien technology to attack the invaders. She will avenge mankind and take the battle into the darkness of space until she reach an ancient alien world.

name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided™ DLC - Season Pass
author: Eidos Montreal
title: The Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Season Pass, which is composed of Narrative DLCs and in-game items, is loaded with content that will help to further flesh out the lore of the Deus Ex Universe.

name: Perraw - Official Soundtrack
author: Christian Piano
title: Official Soundtrack of Perraw FPS Clone War

name: Sector Six OST
author: Small Moons
title: 20 tracks of the original music composed by Bert Cole for Sector Six.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Tome of Horror Complete - PFRPG
author: SmiteWorks USA, LLC
title: Tome of Horrors Complete. Starting from the original Tome written with the 3rd Edition rules along with the later releases of Tomes 2 and 3 for version 3.5, Necromancer Games was in the unique position to bring you updates of the classic monsters not formally released by the OGL, as well as, loads of new ones never sprung upon...

name: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality
author: Owlchemy Labs
title: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality smashes together the absolute VR chaos of the award-winning Job Simulator with the ridiculous, all-out, take-no-prisoners comedy of Rick and Morty.

name: Tabletop Simulator - Simurgh
author: Berserk Games
title: Simurgh is a game for 2-5 players who become heads of powerful clans in a fantastical world where humans and dragons live, hunt and go to wars together.

name: Tabletop Simulator - Wizard's Academy
author: Berserk Games
title: Wizard's Academy is a co-operative game of magical experimentation for 1-6 players. In each game, the players select a scenario, such as summoning and binding a demon to steal its powers, defending the academy against an attack by an army of Imps, or (in the most difficult scenario) facing an academy inspector whom they must impress with...

name: Tabletop Simulator - Three Cheers For Master
author: Berserk Games
title: Three Cheers for Master is a fast-paced, multi-player card game where each player creates their own cheerleading tower of cards depicting Master’s violent, war-hungry minions.

name: Tabletop Simulator - Viticulture
author: Berserk Games

name: Tabletop Simulator - Tiny Epic Defenders

name: Tabletop Simulator - Tiny Epic Western
author: Berserk Games

name: Tabletop Simulator - Xia: Legends of a Drift System
author: Berserk Games
title: Xia: Legends of a Drift System is a 3-5 player sandbox style competitive space adventure. Each player starts as a lowly but hopeful captain of a small starship.

name: Tabletop Simulator - Abraca...What?
author: Berserk Games
title: Abraca...What? is a family game of deduction and spellcasting.

name: Snow Fortress
author: Mythical City Games

name: The Concourse
author: A & B Game Studios, LLC

Use your wits and reflexes to conquer randomly generated courses while staying ahead of your opponents. Win and influence the future races by choosing a modifier, increasing the challenge.

name: Lemurzin - Pterodactyl Edition
author: Kut Stupid

name: The Real Texas - Part 2, Part 1 - Cellpop Goes Out At Night
author: Kitty Lambda Games Inc.

name: Arkshot
author: Code Avarice
title: Arkshot combines the fluidity and skill of an arena shooter with the lighthearted fun of a party game. It's Quake meets Duck Game.

name: Titans of Space PLUS
author: DrashVR LLC
title: Just how big is big? Journey through this holographic Solar System, and then squint your eyes in the intense light of a few of the largest known stars. Enjoy various accidentally-educational activities along the way. Great care has been taken to ensure a comfortable VR experience. VR optional.

name: 3D Sprite Renderer and Convex Hull Editor
author: DMD 'Ware
title: Want to make art for isometric strategy games or RPGs? Good at MilkShape 3D or not able afford a modelling tool like 3D Studio Max or unable to master it? Just import your 3D models and this tool will export all animations to sprites from all 8 sides.

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator
author: Bit Golem
title: Bored of waiting for a bite? Would you like to catch some fish? You're lucky - in Ultimate Fishing Simulator, fish bite like crazy! Spinning, float fishing, ground fishing and more!

name: Phantaruk
author: Polyslash
title: Phantaruk combines survival horror with adventure and stealth mechanics. Expect true shivers down your spine as you fight for your life not only facing the dangers of the Purity-02 spaceship, but most of all - when you try to get rid of toxins continually destroying you from the inside.

name: Frederic Resurrection of Music Director's Cut: Soundtrack
author: Forever Entertainment S. A.
title: Original Frederic: Resurrection of Music Director's Cut Soundtrack!

name: Soundtrack + Audiobook
author: Stellar Jockeys
title: Brigador Audiobook plus over three hours of original soundtrack for the game by Makeup and Vanity Set, in a double album and two EPs.

name: She Wants Me Dead
author: Hello There AB
title: Max is in trouble. He pissed off his cat Lula and now she’s out to get him. And Lula is far from sweet. She is vicious, cold and unforgiving. More dangerous than Lula are her traps – deadly and brutal killing contraptions with Max’s name written all over them.

name: Echoes of the Past: The Revenge of the Witch Collector's Edition
author: Orneon
title: Save the kingdom of Orion from the evil witch!

name: OddPlanet
author: Indievision
title: OddPlanet is a side-scrolling adventure game inspired by Limbo and Oddworld.

name: Astral Domine Demo
author: Spectral Illusions
title: After crash landing on a mysterious planet, you must explore the ruins of an ancient alien kingdom to retrieve the energy sphere that can restore power to your spaceship. A single player interactive VR adventure designed for the HTC Vive. REQUIRES VIVE HEADSET AND MOTION CONTROLLERS TO PLAY

name: Farm Tribe
author: CrioGames
title: Help Anny organize a farm in Farm Tribe!

name: Grave Mania: Undead Fever
author: Anino Games
title: Put zombies to rest!

name: Ori and the Blind Forest (Original Soundtrack)
author: Moon Studios GmbH
title: The Ori and the Blind Forest soundtrack features almost 90 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game.

name: Shiver: Vanishing Hitchhiker Collector's Edition
author: Artogon
title: Find the Vanishing Hitchhiker!

name: Spa Mania
author: Blue Lizard Games
title: Deliver 5-star service in San Francisco.

name: Surface: The Pantheon Collector's Edition
author: Elephant Games
title: How did the Capital Express vanish?

name: Witches' Legacy: The Ties That Bind Collector's Edition
author: EleFun Games
title: A stranger reveals Edward's past.

name: White Day: A Labyrinth Named School
author: SONNORI Corp
title: Notorious cult-classic Korean horror. Sneak into school at midnight to return your sweetheart's diary and get caught in a terrifying game of cat and mouse. Explore haunted hallways, solve classic survival horror puzzles and escape the clutches of a killer Janitor who is out for your blood.

name: Yesterday Origins
author: Pendulo Studios
title: John Yesterday becomes immortal following an occult ritual. However, not everything goes to plan. He and his girlfriend Pauline must embark on an investigation to try to reproduce the immortality ritual. But his former acquaintances have other plans for him...

name: Moto Racer 4 - Skewer
author: Artefacts Studio
title: Moto Racer - The Truth pack

name: Moto Racer 4 - Space Dasher
author: Artefacts Studio
title: Moto Racer 4 - Space Dasher

name: Moto Racer 4 - The Truth
author: Artefacts Studio
title: Moto Racer 4 - The Truth pack

name: Ricerca VR
author: The Family, LLC
title: RICERCA, which in Italian means “search,” is an animated installation experience. In it, we follow the life of a man on a search who travels through different memories and worlds to find something he has lost.

name: Aselia the Eternal Soundtrack
author: Xuse
title: The official soundtrack to Aselia the Eternal.

name: Abrix the robot - bonus soundtrack DLC
author: EJR ZZS
title: Thrilling electronic music for you. 4 original tracks from "Abrix the robot" soundtrack and 4 bonus tracks composed by Ree-D. The DLC contains 8 files in mp3 format.

name: SteamWorld Heist: The Outsider
author: Image & Form Games
title: Captain Piper stumbles upon a new ally with a past shrouded in mystery. Dive into the action and take on new missions with brand-new weapons, gear and a shipload of hats!

name: Uprising: Join or Die
author: Cyclone Studios
title: Uprising offers more strategy than a military sim, and more action strategy than a shoot'em up. Using your hi-tech assault tank, loaded with powerful weapons, you need to establish tidal bases, mine for power, build factories and direct legions of allied units against the enemy

name: Tank Brawl Demo
author: Thang Phung Dinh
title: This is the perfect game to play local co-op with your kid or partner with entertaining top-down view and simple controls. It is a full effort 3D modernization of the classic Battle City with tons of added features to give it more depth and visual appeal.

name: Robot
author: HellconX™ Games
title: Deadly Robot-I56 of old time

name: Deadstone Demo
author: Timeslip Softworks
title: Based on the inhospitable frontier world of Mars, against the backdrop of a bacterial outbreak, Deadstone offers a compelling blend of frantic combat and tower defense, backed by a highly nuanced character development system and strategic elements of resource management.

name: Aplowcalypse
author: Biodrone Studios
title: Snow Plows vs Aliens: 4 player, local co-op chaos

name: iOMoon
author: Headtrip Games llc
title: iOMoon is a made for VR first person exploratory experience where you pilot a research vehicle equipped only with a flare and camera, into the heart of Jupiter's moon iO. Explore and survive while gathering photographic evidence in a fantastic world full of surprises.Original Soundtrack by award winning composer Garry Schyman

name: Vertigo Demo
author: Zach Tsiakalis-Brown
title: This is the demo of the unreleased game Vertigo. It is coming summer 2016. Vertigo is a first person story-based shooter for the HTC Vive. Explore the sprawling underground facilities of Planck International Energy Solutions' Quantum Reactor, filled with dark secrets, adorable drones, and parallel universes.

name: 100% Orange Juice - Breaker Pack
author: Orange_Juice
title: 100% Orange Juice - Breaker Pack adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice's games - Star Breaker and Sweet Breaker, and a new campaign for both. Both characters come fully voiced!

name: Stellar Tactics
author: Maverick Games
title: A Sci-Fi role-playing game featuring turn-based ground combat, space exploration, deep character customization and a massive living universe with over 160,000 star systems. Equip your ships with the best equipment you can find, gather a powerful crew of mercenaries and set out into the void!

name: Sinful Eden
author: Dualhaze
title: Sinful Eden is a point 'n' click adventure with dating sim and RPG elements. You take on the role of a young man living in Karigon Island, Karigon law states that all males who're of age are duty-bound to marry, failure to comply will result in execution, as ordained by the high priestess Aurora.

name: PRICE
author: YETU GAME
title: The hero Ivry wakes up from a nightmare and finds himself in a weird room. To escape from fear and darkness, he has to search and explore on his own until he discovers the truth and finds his sister Iva.A puzzle game 《PRICE》

name: Amaranthine - Original Soundtrack
author: Roman Kozhukhov
title: This DLC contains 8 music tracks from Amaranthine and 1 bonus track.

name: Adventure World
author: Alibi
title: Fantasy ARPG

name: Retool Demo
author: Hut 90
title: Retool is a 3D hacking puzzle game where you try to escape incomplete orbital stations by hacking into computers to rewire outputs of electronics.

name: Adam and Eve: The Game - Chapter 1 Demo
author: Religious Studios
title: In the beginning everything was good... So what went wrong? Adam and Eve: The Game - Chapter 1, is the first chapter of 2D platform game that retells the biblical story of Adam and Eve. After Adam wake up and notice the lack of Eve, he begins a journey through paradise in search of his mate.

name: ParaKrieger
author: HellconX™ Games
title: Der Paraphone Krieger ist ein Kostüm Item. Besondere Fähigkeiten: Keine

name: VRMark
author: UL
title: Is your PC ready for VR? Find out with VRMark, the virtual reality benchmark. VRMark includes three VR benchmark tests and a free-roaming Experience mode to enjoy with a VR headset or on your monitor.

name: City Z - Soundtrack
author: Little Cloud Games
title: The City Z soundtrack provides all of the game's music in cleanly-edited MP3 format. It contains 8 music tracks with a clear old-fashioned Zombies influence but also with rock and western inspirations.

name: Ghostbusters Classic Suit Pack
author: FireForge Games
title: Blast ghosts wearing this classic uniform and capture them them in a trap based on art from the original movie!

name: Out of the Park Baseball 18
author: Out of the Park Developments
title: Out of the Park Baseball 18 - officially licensed through MLB.com and the MLBPA - is the follow-up to Metacritic's PC Game of the Year 2016 and the ultimate baseball game! Guide your favorite MLB franchise to glory, play any historical season or create your own fictional baseball world.

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 3
author: Out of the Park Developments
title: Franchise Hockey Manager 3 is the deepest, most authentic hockey strategy game you can find! Now officially licensed by the NHL®, so you can take the reins of your favorite franchise, FHM3 includes real 2016-2017 rosters for 22 playable leagues, a new gameplay mode that makes the game much more approachable, and tons of other new...

name: Project G
author: Nebula Interactive
title: In this retro-styled side-scrolling shooter, you pilot a sleek submarine through earths oceans (25+ levels) fighting rogue cybernetic fishbots. The future's a difficult place and you must earn credits/ pick up materials as you progress, using them to upgrade/ change your ship to match your playing style.

name: Pixel Puzzles: UndeadZ - Original Soundtrack
author: The Digital Puzzle Company
title: Pixel Puzzles: UndeadZ - Original Soundtrack

name: Monsters and Medicine
author: Clockwork Acorn
title: Monsters and Medicine is a turn-based puzzle game where adaptation is key; players try to build and expand their own hospital while injured monsters are knocking at the door, wanting treatment.

name: ChuSingura46+1 S
author: インレ
title: ChuSingura46+1S is an award-winning Japanese visual novel set in an alternate Edo Japan where all the Samurai are inexplicably female. You can get to know the “intimate” side of the characters from the classic Japanese tale of the 47 Ronin, all without any of the dangly or rough bits of the original!

name: Resette's Prescription ~Book of memory, Swaying scale~ Original Sound Track
author: Liz-Arts
title: Tracks from the game Resette's Prescription ~Book of memory, Swaying scale~

name: Twisted Worlds
author: Absolutist Ltd.
title: The most extraordinary hidden object casual game!An unknown event dated back at the turn of the common era affected the timeline and caused the two worlds collide. Now you must start the time machine and find hidden objects associated with the core events of the passed years to reconstruct the world chronology. Beware!

name: One Thousand Lies Soundtrack
author: Keinart Lobre
title: One Thousand Lies soundtrack. It's composed of 31 songs from differents artist, all of them free to the public. Check them out, they all are amazing!

name: Don Bradman Cricket 17
author: Big Ant Studios
title: Don Bradman Cricket 17 brings a new revolutionary control system delivering the best batting, bowling and fielding experience by providing you an even greater level of variety and precision of play. You Are Invincible!

name: Puzzle Box - Soundtrack OST
author: BplusGames
title: 10 tracks of the original music composed by BplusGames for Puzzle Box + 2 Bonus Tracks

name: Stars in Shadow
author: Ashdar Games
title: Stars in Shadow is a turn-based 4X strategy game and a vivid tribute to the genre classics. Compete with alien factions to explore and colonize nearby starsystems, build fleets to defend against rivals, negotiate or conquer them. Win by unifying the galaxy, through diplomacy or force.

name: Pitfall Planet
author: Bonfire Games
title: Pitfall Planet is a couch co-op puzzle-solving adventure game set on a distant planet, where you'll need to use teamwork to complete levels and explore the caverns below! Pitfall Planet will put your friendship to the test; will both of you make it out alive?

name: Sketchfab VR
author: Sketchfab
title: Teleport yourself to Rome, hold a beating heart, or walk among dinosaurs. Open Sketchfab VR to discover a showcase of explorations through remote places, fantastic creatures, game worlds, cultural heritage, science and other wonders.

name: Sumer
author: Studio Wumpus
title: A new type of digital board game where strategic planning and swift platforming meet. As nobles vying for power in a mysterious ancient civilization, players harvest resources and bid in real-time auctions in a contest to worship the almighty goddess Inanna!

name: The Culling Of The Cows - Original Soundtrack
author: DL Softworks
title: The Culling Of The Cows - Original Soundtrack

name: Event Horizon
author: Pavel Zinchenko
title: Take command of a space fleet and start your galaxy exploration mission.

name: Quantized
author: Chris Mahoney
title: Quantized is an audio reactive, procedurally-generated sensory experience. Play your own local songs to generate a fun, exhilarating musical journey.

name: Sector Six
author: Small Moons
title: Sector Six is a side-scrolling, sci-fi shooter with a silhouette aesthetic, procedural loot, extensive customization, and story missions.

name: Seinarukana Soundtrack
author: Xuse
title: The official soundtrack to Seinarukana.Soundtrack files will be downloaded inside your Seinarukana game folder.Tracks:01 Seinarukana02 Orichalcum Name03 The Bravery04 Fight it out05 Cross Sword06 Last Battalion07 Eternal Warrior08 Glorious Brilliance09 Raise our Mind10 Inevitable Confliction11 Gathering Heart12 The Lamentations13 Face...

name: Grey Phobia
author: Blackturn Ltd
title: Grey Phobia is a Hack and Slash, third person shooter game, which is based on post apocalyptic, sci-fi, comix scenario.

name: EXZEAL
author: TRIANGLE SERVICE
title: A sequel that isn’t afraid to be different. EXZEAL is the followup to TRIZEAL Remix, but it’s much more than a simple rehash. Choose between multiple ships and specialize in each one’s weapon system. Will you focus on shooting, shot charging, or close-range attacks? In EXZEAL, it’s your choice.

name: TRIZEAL Remix
author: TRIANGLE SERVICE
title: Transform or die. TRIZEAL Remix has classic shoot-’em-up style with a refined depth just below the surface. Strategically transform your ship to switch between and upgrade three distinct weapons: a wide shot, a narrow laser, and guided missiles. Shoot with intelligence!

name: LUNA The Shadow Dust
author: Lantern Studio
title: LUNA The Shadow Dust is a fully hand-animated Point&Click puzzle adventure, brought to life through wordless storytelling, beautiful cinematics and a breathtaking original soundtrack.

name: Seduce Me 2: The Demon War Demo
author: Michaela Laws
title: Seduce Me 2: The Demon War is the sequel to the popular free-to-play otome game, Seduce Me the Otome. It follows the story of Mika Anderson as she is suddenly thrown into the Abyssal Plains right before she is about to be married to one of the five Incubi Brothers featured in the first game.

name: Wicce
author: Alpheratz*
title: Enter the town of death to save the dear daughter!

name: Mars Odyssey
author: Steel Wool Studios
title: Mars Odyssey is a single player VR simulator experience. Land on Earth’s sister planet. Walk the surface of Mars in your living room and interact with full-scale, realistic NASA Landers and Rovers. Learn about the Red Planet, its history, and its geography in this interactive experience. Play time: 20 min.

name: Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily
author: One More Level
title: Stop the mysterious killer!

name: One day in London
author: Owl Studio
title: Take active part in a nonlinear, interactive visual novel set against the atmospheric backdrop of the 19th century England.

name: Wailing Heights - Original Soundtrack and PDF Comic Artbook
author: Outsider Games
title: Wailing Heights Original soundtrack and PDF artbook, including high-res versions of in-game comics.

name: Spellweaver - Soldier Reverence Deck
author: Dream Reactor
title: Soldier Reverence Deck (1 hero + 60 cards) - Assault your enemies with tough and versatile soldiers with this deck. Manipulate combat with clever tricks and spells. If your opponent is still standing, overwhelm him with an endless army using your hero skill.

name: Syberia 3
author: Microids
title: The next generation in adventure games, Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you'll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.

name: Screeps: World
author: Screeps, LLC
title: Screeps: World is an open source MMO RTS sandbox game for programming enthusiasts, wherein the core mechanic is programming your units AI. You control your colony by writing JavaScript which operates 24/7 in the single persistent open world filled by other players on par with you.

name: 3030 Deathwar Redux - A Space Odyssey
author: Bird in Sky
title: 3030 Deathwar is a unique mix of Adventure and Space Sim. Explore star systems, mine and hunt pirates in top-down mode. Leave your ship and switch into classic Adventuring mode, where you explore derelicts, talk to shady characters or head over to the space bar for a drink.

name: Bounce
author: Steel Wool Studios
title: Bounce is a VR physics-based puzzle game for HTC Vive and Oculus Touch. Players are tasked with helping their playful robot companion, D1G-B, bounce, sling, shoot, and roll his way through an increasingly complex labyrinth of rooms on a galactic spaceship making his way to his final destination.

name: Annie Amber
author: Pantumaca Barcelona
title: [VR Only] Annie Amber is a VR Puzzle Game that leads you on an intense and dreamy journey through the life of a person condensed in a surreal and poetic experience. Annie Amber makes you explore this strange and beautiful scenery that is life itself through her memories.

name: DoDonPachi Resurrection
author: CAVE Interactive CO.,LTD.
title: The legendary bullet-hell shoot-’em-up series has come to Steam! DoDonPachi is ressurected after a Blissful Death with enough modes to satisfy the beginner and the expert player alike. Tonight we dine in bullet hell!

name: XO-Planets OST
author: Bohfam
title: This DLC contains the full original soundtrack from XO-Planets. All 13 tracks plus 5 bonus tracks.

name: BloodGate
author: Outsmart
title: A one-of-a-kind action puzzle RPG adventure. Players are unleashed into fast paced battles where they must balance intense real-time combat with precision rune matching in an attempt to defeat unspeakable demons.

name: The Afterglow of Grisaia
author: Frontwing
title: A side story to The Labyrinth of Grisaia, this game explores protagonist Kazami Yuuji's past, focusing on his life with Kusakabe Asako, the CIRS agent who rescued him at a young age from a terrorist organization. Secret passages of The Labyrinth of Grisaia are revealed within...

name: The Melody of Grisaia
author: Frontwing
title: A side story for The Labyrinth of Grisaia, this episode takes place just after Kusakabe Asako officially names Kazami Yuuji her successor as number 9029, and details his globe-hopping exploits thereafter. Yet more secret passages of The Labyrinth of Grisaia are revealed within...

name: Black Rose
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Black Rose'.

name: Japanese Iris
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Japanese Iris.'

name: Bande Dessinee
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Bande Dessinee'.

name: Red Swan
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Red Swan.'

name: Amazonic Green & Amazonic Turquoise
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume items 'Amazonic Green' and 'Amazonic Turquoise.'

name: Cutie Marine (Blue) & Cutie Marine (Yellow)
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume items 'Cutie Marine (Blue)' and 'Cutie Marine (Yellow).'

name: Jet Spanglette (Black) & Jet Spanglette (Red)
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume items 'Jet Spanglette (Black)' and 'Jet Spanglette (Red).'

name: Fizzy & Dizzy (Berry) & Fizzy & Dizzy (Cider)
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume items 'Fizzy and Dizzy (Berry)' and 'Fizzy and Dizzy (Cider).'

name: Golden Kagura Pigtails
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Golden Kagura Pigtails.'

name: Golden Saaya Ponytail
author: TAMSOFT
title: Includes the costume item 'Golden Saaya Ponytail.'

name: 猫肉「Cat Meat」
author: 2D Heroes
title: Oh noes! Meteors are raining down and your loved ones are at home alone! Race back to make sure they're safe, but be careful - cats only have 9 lives!

name: Colosse
author: Colosse Team
title: 'COLOSSE' is a real-time virtual reality storytelling experience. A hunter crosses paths with a mysterious titan.

name: Double Action: Boogaloo
author: Double Action Factory
title: Double Action is a free stylish multiplayer game about diving, flipping, and sliding your way into action movie mayhem.

name: Qubicle Commercial License
author: Minddesk Software GmbH
title: Commercial license for Qubicle Voxel Editor.

name: The Guest - Soundtrack
author: Team Gotham
title: The Guest Original Soundtrack

name: Order of Battle: US Pacific
author: The Artistocrats
title: In Order of Battle: U.S. Pacific you take control over the American army and fleet in some of the most iconic land and naval battles of the Pacific Theatre of WW2.

name: Order of Battle: Rising Sun
author: The Artistocrats
title: Rising Sun puts the player in command of the Imperial Navy - built around a powerful fleet of battleships and aircraft carriers, as well as the Imperial Army - hardened from years of war with the Chinese.

name: Led It Rain
author: Ataverti
title: Motorcycles, guns, monsters and bikini-babes. Led It Rain is first person shooter motorcycle driving racing game. Faster you drive and shoot monsters more score you obtain. Each race track has three laps of horror and adrenaline. Scream!!

name: Siralim 2
author: Thylacine Studios
title: Siralim 2 is an old-school monster catching RPG. Summon and customize hundreds of creatures to fight for you as you battle your way through endless dungeons. Find rare treasure and use it to upgrade your castle, empower your creatures, craft powerful artifacts, learn new spells, and much more.

name: Secret Of The Royal Throne
author: Apar Games
title: Hidden object adventure set in mystical India discovering the ancient secrets.

name: Action Legion - Soundtrack
author: Aeonic Entertainment
title: Get your hands on the Action Legion original soundtrack! With 9 tracks of explosive interplanetary action, this work of art pays homage to the greatest film composers of the 80s!

name: Empty Soul - S&S Edition
author: ClorithStudio
title: EMPTY SOUL takes you into the story of Solan Walls, a young scientist girl who suffered a terrible accident. Now she must escape from horrible nightmares. Face the fear in this horror indie game!

name: Day D - Ice Age
author: Creobit
title: We know why the dinosaurs disappeared! Fight off hordes of dinosaurs! Build defensive towers and survive in the Ice Age!

name: Day D - Time Mayhem
author: Creobit
title: - New epic episode! - More new enemies! - New exciting adventure comics with professor and robot.

name: Vroomist
author: Syrena Interactive
title: Vroomist is a physics based game about engineering, construction and survival in harsh multi-player arenas. Players build vehicles of various sizes, and purposes, engineer your car and battle other players in multi-player and claim victory!

name: Maui
author: Kokua Games
title: Maui is a free action-adventure game based on Hawaiian mythology. The game features an innovative "stat grid" that lets you switch stats on the fly to face any situation.

name: Counter-Strike: Source
author: Valve
title: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source™ technology.

name: Arcade Saga
author: 2 Bears Studio
title: 3 distinct games in one package - Fracture (40 levels), Smash (20 levels), and Bowshot (24 levels). As a newly born A.I. entity, battle through 3 different futuristic sports—Fracture, Smash and Bowshot—to escape slavery at the hands of the Overlords.

name: Super Puzzle Galaxy
author: 2 Bears Studio
title: Come play with the sands of fun in our outer-space physics sandbox. Sculpt sand to direct the ball into the goal in this physics puzzle game. Race for position on the leader boards and make your own levels with the in-game editor and post them to the community.

name: Log Drive Runner
author: Proud Camel Games
title: A both relaxing and super-hectic game, a new variant of the endless runner genre, based on the log flume in Notodden, Norway.Run as far as you can, get your score on the leaderboards, beat your friends!

name: Heroes Must Die
author: Heroic Games
title: Heroes Must Die is an action-RPG with aesthetics inspired by the best roleplaying games of the 16 bit era, with the sophisticated story and design of modern epics. Follow a grand and fun story of trying to break the world and then save it. Combat is easy to learn and difficult to master. Best of all, it's free.

name: RUINER
author: Reikon Games
title: RUINER is a brutal action shooter set in the year 2091 in the cyber metropolis Rengkok. A wired psychopath lashes out against a corrupt system to uncover the truth and retrieve his kidnapped brother under the guidance of a secretive hacker friend.

name: Diorama Battle of NINJA
author: X-STREAM DIGITAL Co., Ltd.
title: A ninja survival game where you wage combat in an expansive diorama landscape. Defeat hordes of enemies using shuriken throwing stars! Play with others online.

name: Kyoto Colorful Days
author: InterOne Inc.
title: "Kyoto Colorful Days" is a Visual Novel, set in the sightseeing hotspot of Kyoto.This visual novel is populated by various different characters and the story can be enjoyed like a TV drama.　Fully voiced in Japanese (the Kyoto dialect)

name: Factotum 90
author: TACS Games
title: You’re in deep space and something’s collided with the ship. Main power is offline and you’re trapped. It’s lucky you have access to this walker control terminal. It’s a little old but with these two robots and some clever thinking you might be able to get power back online and save the day.

name: Xcinerator
author: iolo
title: Introducing Xcinerator, the specialized privacy tool from iolo technologies that safely and permanently erases data, superseding Department of Defense security standards and ensuring that your most sensitive files can never be recovered.

name: Moonchild - Super Savefiles
author: Aldorlea Games
title: The SSF (Super Save Files) pack features 3 amazing savefiles for the RPG Moonchild to boost your adventure!

name: MXGP2 - The Official Motocross Videogame Demo
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: Download MXGP2 DEMO and prepare to experience Motocross' true heart. Official licenses, real bikes, rosters and tracks!

name: Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs
author: Pixelated Milk
title: Regalia: Of Men And Monarchs is a tactical RPG set in a cheerful fantasy world full of weirdness and wonder. Assemble your party, go adventuring, manage your kingdom, make new friends, and defeat your opponents in challenging turn-based combat.

name: Summer Fling - Soundtrack
author: Dharker Studio
title: The complete soundtrack of 20 songs from musician Sam L. Jones for the Summer Fling game.

name: Parasite
title: They messed with Mother Nature....Now she wants revenge.

name: Ifrit
author: SANDLOT
title: A rocket equipped with multiple incendiary bombs that separate and disperse over a wide area. These incendiaries will ignite whatever they come in contact with, causing massive damage.

name: Blood Storm
author: SANDLOT
title: A convergent missile cannon. Missiles launched from this weapon will separate in the air and rain down on the enemy's head. Their damage pattern isn't limited to a single target, but an entire area.

name: Spark Lancer
author: SANDLOT
title: The first prototype of a new short-range weapon currently under development. Emits rays of energy to destroy its target. Has massive firepower, but since the energy dissipates immediately, its range is short. When the energy hits a target, it refracts to strike multiple targets at once.

name: BM03 Vegalta Gold
author: SANDLOT
title: Gold coated model of the BM03 Vegalta. Only a small number of these were ever manufactured. This model is coated in gold so that it reflects radar waves. However, this is not very effective. After jumping, pressing the jump button again will activate the jet thrusters.

name: Gigantus Tank, Bullet Girls Marking
author: SANDLOT
title: A specially painted Combat Vehicle Gigantus, armed with a smooth-bore gun with armor piercing ammo that can fire through multiple enemies. To celebrate its debut, its makers painted a goddess of war on its frame.

name: Gigantus Tank, EDF IFPS Markings
author: SANDLOT
title: A custom Combat Vehicle Gigantus with a Vulture cannon. To celebrate its debut, its makers painted heroes on its frame. People believe that the paint will protect them from the enemy’s attack...but it has no such effect, at least not any more so than any other good luck charm.

name: World of Guns: Sniper Rifles Pack #1
author: Noble Empire Corp.
title: World of Guns: Sniper Rifles Pack #1 includes 10 sniper rifles for interactive disassembly/assembly.

name: Gigantus Tank, Natsuiro HS Markings
author: SANDLOT
title: This Gigantus was about to be discarded for technical flaws, so an engineer 'adopted' it and personally remodeled it for fun, giving a summer theme. Its body has been painted after “Natsuiro High School : Seishun Hakusho.'

name: Colours of Magic: Aqua Teeter
author: RunServer
title: As an apprentice magician and alchemist, you learn from different alchemy masters. They teach you to mix elixirs, create potions and control them on alchemist table. Prove everyone that you are a born alchemist!

name: Detective Hunt - Crownston City PD
author: pixepob
title: You are Damien Hunt, a junior detective of the Crownston City Police Department. Together with your partner, you are to investigate criminal activities around the city.

name: Warhammer Vermintide - Bardin 'Studded Leather' Skin
author: Fatshark
title: Experience the End Times in style! This DLC contains a bold new look for the Dwarf Ranger Bardin Goreksson. The new skin is applied when downloaded (to revert, simply uninstall).

name: Xeno Crisis
author: Bitmap Bureau
title: Xeno Crisis is an arena shooter in which up to two players take control of battle-hardened marines embarking on a deadly mission to confront an alien menace! Run and gun your way through thousands of adversaries, searching for survivors, and ultimately facing the origin of the outpost's demise.

name: Real Events: 2015 MotoGP™ Season
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: This additional content will allow you to relive the most exciting events of the 2015 MotoGP™ season.

name: Rossi Ford Focus Rally car 2009
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: Add the Ford Focus that Valentino Rossi drove in the 2009 Monza Rally Show to your garage and, like him, race on the track to win! You can also download 11 new liveries for your Focus that you can use with drivers from the Academy.

name: Radio Controlled Cars mode
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: Challenge Valentino Rossi on the radio-controlled car MotoRanch track in Tavullia. Choose one of the three available layouts, start the engine and race to the finish line!

name: Real Events 1: 2016 MotoGP™ Season
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: These 9 challenges, one more thrilling than the other, will allow you to relive the overtaking, the bends and the triumphs which have been such a feature of the first 9 races of the championship.

name: Real Events 2: 2016 MotoGP™ Season
author: Milestone S.r.l.
title: Relive the most exciting events of the 2016 MotoGP™ season by taking on 9 thrilling challenges from the last 9 races of the official championship!

name: Spellweaver - Vampire Overlord Deck
author: Dream Reactor
title: Vampire Overlord Deck (1 hero + 60 cards) - Use your solid defensive cards to establish a board presence early on with this deck. Once you have done so play Vampirism and use your hero skill to completely dominate the game.

name: StreetCraft
author: Lambda
title: StreetCraft is an online shooting game for fun. We are trying to provide funny and hilarious battle experiences for shooting game players. Just do it!

name: Hero Siege - Doom Bringer (Skin)
author: Elias Viglione
title: Developing Hero Siege takes alot of time, effort and sleepless nights. Buy us some Energy Drinks and help us with server costs so we can keep on supporting this great game!Show your commitment to us and get this awesome skin you can brag about to your friends!

name: Official Guide - Inexistence
author: Jonathan BRASSAUD
title: Officiel Guide about Inexistence, discover all the secrets and information about the game.

name: Retool OST
author: Hut 90, Inc.
title: The Retool OST includes all of the game's ambient-inspired music in high quality MP3 format.

name: Dungeon Souls Original Soundtrack
author: Lamina Studios
title: The Original Soundtrack for Dungeon Souls, the hit roguelike action-adventure game!

name: Runeyana
author: Blackturn Ltd
title: In this deep Hack and Slash enhanced RPG you’ll explore a huge world inhabited by different races. Cope with social tensions, get armed and customize your character physically and psychologically to successfully get through this adventure.

name: Mount & Blade: Warband
author: TaleWorlds Entertainment
title: In a land torn asunder by incessant warfare, it is time to assemble your own band of hardened warriors and enter the fray. Lead your men into battle, expand your realm, and claim the ultimate prize: the throne of Calradia!

name: Puzzle Galaxies
author: Evermore Game Studios
title: Puzzle Galaxies is a groundbreaking puzzle video game similar to games like Bejeweled and Candy Crush. You must match jewels stored in a space station in a manner similar to Bejeweled, but there's a twist - there are enemies that will come by and try to take matching jewels on you!

name: American Truck Simulator - Arizona
author: SCS Software
title: The Grand Canyon State welcomes you! Drive through the streets of its largest city and capital, Phoenix, and discover the distinctive southern centers Flagstaff and Tucson. Enjoy the sweeping, ever changing scenery of this corner state.

name: Kindred Spirits on the Roof Drama CD Vol.1
author: Liar-soft
title: When Ano starts attracting too much attention, Hina suggests a 'Fake Couple Strategy' to fool her persistent fans into thinking she's taken.

name: The Beggar's Ride
author: Bad Seed
title: The Beggar’s Ride is a unique and innovative Platform Puzzle Adventure Game where the player can manipulate the environment to solve puzzles in a deep and intriguing story of discovery.

name: Lion Quest Soundtrack
author: Dracula's Cave
title: Treat your ears with the Lion Quest soundtrack. Includes two albums and a single – a total of 17 tracks from the game.

name: Warhammer Vermintide - Saltzpyre ' Estalian Leather Coat' Skin
author: Fatshark
title: Experience the End Times in style! This DLC contains a bold new look for the Witch Hunter Victor Saltzpyre. The new skin is applied when downloaded (to revert, simply uninstall).

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Karak Azgaraz
author: Fatshark
title: Explore 3 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel outside of Ubersreik’s walls to the snowy Karak Azgaraz

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Quests and Contracts
author: Fatshark
title: Have you been dying to get a splendid new hat for your favourite hero? Or how about that axe that you just never seem to roll for? Well, the wait is finally over! In this new FREE DLC for Vermintide we are introducing a means for you to get the loot of your dreams. All you have to do is complete the objectives and collect your reward.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Stromdorf
author: Fatshark
title: Explore 2 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel outside of Ubersreik’s walls to the ever-rainy town of Stromdorf

name: Warhammer Vermintide - Sienna 'Wyrmscales' Skin
author: Fatshark
title: Experience the End Times in style! This DLC contains a bold new look for the Bright Wizard Sienna Fuegonasus. The new skin is applied when downloaded (to revert, simply uninstall).

name: Warhammer Vermintide - Kruber 'Carroburg Livery' Skin
author: Fatshark
title: Experience the End Times in style! This DLC contains a bold new look for the Empire Soldier Markus Kruber. The new skin is applied when downloaded (to revert, simply uninstall).

name: Warhammer Vermintide - Kerillian 'Tirsyth Garment' Skin
author: Fatshark
title: Experience the End Times in style! This DLC contains a bold new look for the Waywatcher Kerillian. The new skin is applied when downloaded (to revert, simply uninstall).

name: FreeHolder
author: RogueWare
title: Blending strategy, survival, and roguelike elements with RPG style character development, FreeHolder is the story of three escaped slaves in the time of the Roman Republic. Farm, hunt, craft, and cook your way through the years as you live on the edge of the beginning of the Empire.

name: Bridge Constructor - Trains - Expansion Pack
author: ClockStone
title: The "Trains" DLC let's you visit the "Choonited Kingdom" island group, with a total of 18 new levels across three islands.

name: Half-Life 2
author: Valve
title: 1998. HALF-LIFE sends a shock through the game industry with its combination of pounding action and continuous, immersive storytelling. Valve's debut title wins more than 50 game-of-the-year awards on its way to being named  Best PC Game Ever  by PC Gamer, and launches a franchise with more than eight million retail units sold worldwide.

name: Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
author: Valve
title: Fast multiplayer action set in the Half-Life 2 universe! HL2's physics adds a new dimension to deathmatch play. Play straight deathmatch or try Combine vs. Resistance teamplay. Toss a toilet at your friend today!

name: Half-Life 2: Lost Coast
author: Valve
title: Originally planned as a section of the Highway 17 chapter of Half-Life 2, Lost Coast is a playable technology showcase that introduces High Dynamic Range lighting to the Source engine.

name: Day of Defeat: Source
author: Valve
title: Valve's WWII Multiplayer Classic - Now available for Mac.

name: Garry's Mod
author: Facepunch Studios
title: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

name: Total War: MEDIEVAL II – Definitive Edition
author: CREATIVE ASSEMBLY
title: Spanning the most turbulent era in Western history, your quest for territory and power takes you through Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and even onto the shores of the New World.

name: Portal
author: Valve
title: Portal™ is a new single player game from Valve. Set in the mysterious Aperture Science Laboratories, Portal has been called one of the most innovative new games on the horizon and will offer gamers hours of unique gameplay.

name: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne
author: Remedy Entertainment
title: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne is a violent, film-noir love story. Dark, tragic and intense, the in-depth story is a thrill-ride of shocking twists and revelations. Love hurts.

name: Total War: EMPIRE – Definitive Edition
author: CREATIVE ASSEMBLY
title: Command the seas, control the land, forge a new nation, and conquer the globe.

name: Left 4 Dead 2
author: Valve
title: Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008. This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans across five expansive campaigns.

name: Metro 2033
author: 4A Games
title: Set in the shattered subway of a post apocalyptic Moscow, Metro 2033 is a story of intensive underground survival where the fate of mankind rests in your hands. In 2013 the world was devastated by an apocalyptic event, annihilating almost all mankind and turning the earth’s surface into a poisonous wasteland.

name: Mass Effect™ 3 N7 Digital Deluxe Edition (2012)
author: BioWare
title: It's time for Commander Shepard to fight for the fate of the human race and save the galaxy.

name: Grand Ages: Rome
author: Haemimont Games
title: Raise massive armies, embark on epic campaigns to expand the Empire, and take control of the known world! Engage in grand-scale city building and create magnificent cities with creativity and control like never before.

name: Dead Space™ 2
author: Visceral Games
title: Three years after the Necromorph infestation aboard the USS Ishimura, Isaac Clarke awakens from a coma, confused, disoriented, and on a space station called The Sprawl. Explore this world and its zero-g environments to discover the truth about the Unitology and its role in the Necromorph epidemic.

name: RIFT
author: gamigo US Inc.
title: Dive into a world of epic adventure! Create your perfect hero thanks to a uniquely customizable class system. Collect, craft, and customize your gear. Go it alone or group up to challenge dungeons, raids, dynamic open-world content, and your fellow players.

name: Total War: SHOGUN 2
author: CREATIVE ASSEMBLY
title: Total War: SHOGUN 2 is the perfect mix of real-time and turn-based strategy gaming for newcomers and veterans alike.

name: Portal 2
author: Valve
title: The "Perpetual Testing Initiative" has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

name: Terraria
author: Re-Logic
title: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

name: F.E.A.R. 3
author: Day 1 Studios
title: F.E.A.R. 3 delivers all the hallmarks that define the F.E.A.R. brand: terrifying paranormal experience, frenetic combat and a dramatic storyline.

name: From Dust
author: Ubisoft Montpellier
title: Immerse yourself in a world as exotically beautiful as it is dangerous in this modern God-Game where Nature is the Star!

name: Bastion
author: Supergiant Games
title: Discover the secrets of the Calamity, a surreal catastrophe that shattered the world to pieces.

name: Airline Tycoon 2
author: b-Alive
title: Run a modern airline, design unique airplanes and grow a run-down carrier into a globally recognized company that passengers practically beg to fly

name: RAGE
author: id Software
title: Powered by id’s revolutionary id Tech® 5 technology, RAGE is an intense first-person shooter with breakneck vehicle combat, an expansive world to explore, and jaw-dropping graphics!

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
author: Bethesda Game Studios
title: EPIC FANTASY REBORN The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year, Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Trinity®
author: Ironclad Games
title: In Sins of a Solar Empire: Trinity, you are the leader of a civilization embroiled in a galactic war, fighting for the survival of your entire race against relentless foes.

name: Serious Sam 3: BFE
author: Croteam
title: Serious Sam 3: BFE is a prequel to the original indie fast action FPS and Game of the Year sensation - Serious Sam: The First Encounter!

name: Among Us
author: Innersloth
title: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

name: Serious Sam Fusion 2017 (beta)
author: Croteam
title: Serious Sam Fusion is a central hub for several existing Serious Sam games developed by Croteam. Cool new features, engine upgrades, patches and updates will be released to existing owners for FREE!

name: Crusader Kings II
author: Paradox Development Studio
title: Explore one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Grand Strategy.

name: Alan Wake
author: Remedy Entertainment
title: A Dark Presence stalks the small town of Bright Falls, pushing Alan Wake to the brink of sanity in his fight to unravel the mystery and save his love.

name: Port Royale 3
author: Gaming Minds Studios
title: Develop a successful trading company, lead your ships in naval battles and force your opponents to their knees!

name: Alan Wake's American Nightmare
author: Remedy Entertainment
title: A thrilling new storyline, hordes of creepy enemies, serious firepower and beautiful Arizona locations, combined with a fun and challenging new game mode!

name: FTL: Faster Than Light
author: Subset Games
title: This "spaceship simulation roguelike-like" allows you to take your ship and crew on an adventure through a randomly generated galaxy filled with glory and bitter defeat.

name: Hitman 2: Silent Assassin
author: Io-Interactive A/S
title: Enter the realm of a retired assassin, forced back into action by treason. You may be a hired killer but you still have a sense of loyalty and justice. Visit the dark recesses of a world corrupted by crime, greed, degradation and dishonor. And a past that catches up with you.

name: Hitman: Blood Money
author: Io-Interactive A/S
title: Money Talks. Silence Pays. Prepare to Make a Killing. When assassins from Agent 47's contract agency, The ICA, are eliminated in a series of hits, it seems a larger, more powerful agency has entered the fray. Sensing he may be a target, 47 travels to America, and prepares to make a killing.

name: Hitman: Codename 47
author: IO Interactive A/S
title: As the enigmatic Hitman, you must use stealth and tactical problem solving to enter, execute and exit your assignment with minimum attention and maximum effectiveness. For a price, you have access to the most devious devices, but how you use them will determine if you retire as a millionaire or get permanently retired.

name: Hitman: Absolution™
author: Io-Interactive A/S
title: The original assassin is back! Betrayed by the Agency and hunted by the police, Agent 47 finds himself pursuing redemption in a corrupt and twisted world.

name: Max Payne 3
author: Rockstar Studios
title: No longer a New York City cop, Max Payne moves to São Paulo to protect a wealthy family in an effort to finally escape his troubled past. This complete edition of Max Payne 3 includes the complete original game and all previously released downloadable content.

name: Darksiders II
author: Vigil Games
title: Awakened by the End of Days, Death, the most feared of the legendary Four Horsemen, embarks upon a quest to restore mankind, and redeem his brother’s name.

name: Guns of Icarus Online
author: Muse Games
title: Assemble your crew, take to the skies in the premier PvP airship combat game. Guns of Icarus Online is all about flying massive airships, shooting big turret weapons, and working as a team for supremacy of the skies. Everyone as one, victory or death, together.

name: I Am Alive
author: Ubisoft  Shanghaï
title: I Am Alive casts the player as a lone survivor in a believable, dark and insecure post-apocalyptic world.

name: The Testament of Sherlock Holmes
author: Frogwares
title: Become the greatest detective of all time in The Testament of Sherlock Holmes, a twisting, turning investigation game set in a faithfully-reproduced London of 1898. As Sherlock Holmes, you must find clues, interrogate suspects and unveil a mystery in a story full of twists!

name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown
author: Firaxis Games
title: The XCOM: Enemy Unknown - Slingshot Pack is Now Available!

name: Chivalry: Medieval Warfare
author: Torn Banner Studios
title: Besiege castles and raid villages in Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, a fast-paced medieval first person slasher with a focus on multiplayer battles

name: Imperium Romanum Gold Edition
author: Haemimont Games
title: The city builder strategy game Imperium Romanum is set in the time-honoured Roman Empire. As governor of a Roman province, you will devise a strategy to build a well organised, prosperous and commanding settlement. Its fortune very much lies in your own hands.

name: Patrician III
author: Ascaron Entertainment ltd.
title: Patrician III - sequel to the award winning game Patrician II - features advanced in-game AI, which adjusts its difficulty based on experience and ability. In this economic sandbox game you can gain wealth and power in multiple ways - what you will do with it is up to you.

name: Patrician IV
author: Gaming Minds Studios
title: You are a merchant in northern Europe in the late Middle Ages when the Hanseatic League was flourishing. Your goal is to rise to the most successful and influential member of the Hanse, ultimately being elected Elderman, leader of the trading league.

name: Primal Carnage
author: Lukewarm Media
title: A savage online shooter, where players do battle as man or beast in class-based deathmatches and a frantic escape mode. Unleash your inner dinosaur!

name: Painkiller Hell & Damnation
author: The Farm 51
title: Evil has returned! Demonic powers are manifesting themselves as a myriad of dark creatures, fighting over the fates of imprisoned souls caught in Purgatory.

name: Magicka
author: Arrowhead Game Studios
title: Magicka is a satirical action-adventure game set in a rich fantasy world based on Norse mythology. The player assumes the role of a wizard from a sacred order tasked with stopping an evil sorcerer who has thrown the world into turmoil, his foul creations besieging the forces of good.

name: Omerta - City of Gangsters
author: Haemimont Games
title: Omerta - City of Gangsters is a simulation game with tactical turn-based combat. Taking the role of a fresh-from-the-boat immigrant, with dreams of the big life, the player will work his way up the criminal hierarchy of 1920’s Atlantic City.

name: Aliens: Colonial Marines Collection
author: Gearbox Software
